summary: Access your phone’s notifications, calls, apps, photos & texts on your PC.
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
comments: Makes calls and texts, but there is a problem which is that there is no way to interact with in-call prompts (e.g. "Press 1 for English"), which is a huge issue when so many companies use these prompts for their answering service. Also makes it impossible to check my voicemail through the app. Please add this functionality.

!PLEASE fix! Big issue is that the app keeps trying to reconnect whenever my laptop is on (Your Phone App still not launched) BUT the link to windows is TURNED OFF from my phone which drains a lot of battery for no reason and it is very frequent. Clicking on disconnect in the ongoing notification on the phone doesn't help either Love to use this app for connectivity with my pc don't know why screen mirroring lags even though you're sitting right next to the router.

As soon as I installed this, my pc backup and sync started re loading photos i have too many copies of as is. Plus, why not enable pc info to go ontp phone, such as music. Anything that just makes a user happy...it's not happening. It's like selling your soul to the devil. Electronics are sucking up my time and making it hell.

When it works, it's good enough. However, it doesn't work more often tha not. A lot of people have complained about the connection and syncing here and I have the same problem. I have signed into the same microsoft account, connected to the same wifi, made sure low power mode is off, and deleted and reinstalled the app. Stop suggesting the same things to every response and just fix the problem. It is a well designed app that has a lot of features that would up my productivity immensely, please!

Great functionality - but it takes A LOT OF TIME to get it to work correctly. I want to primarily use the screen mirroring function such that I can write with my computer keyboard (running Windows 10) instead of typing with my fingers on the phone screen (Samsung Galaxy S10e). Sounds simple enough... but no. First, my keyboard layout changes to US English despite any settings I change on the computer or the phone, i.e. the common characters åäö of my language are not accessible which makes any typing unusable. I searched like hell on different forums and finally I got it to work by enabling accessibility services for the app. Common - this needs to work by default. Second, the other text handling option that I need is copying a text on my computer (from any application) and then pasting it into the window with the phone screen mirroring. BUT IT DOESN'T WORK. HELP! Somehow the clipboard of the screen mirroring window is not shared with the clipboard of all other PC applications. I've tried changing settings on the phone, in the My Phone app, and on the PC. Nothing has worked. Any suggestions?

title: HP Print Service Plugin
description:
The HP Print Service Plugin is the only print driver that you'll need to easily print documents, emails and pictures from print-supported applications to a variety of HP Printers, including HP OfficeJet, HP LaserJet, HP DesignJet, HP Photosmart, HP DeskJet and HP Envy.

You can discover and print to HP printers that are:
• Connected to the same network as your mobile device
• Broadcasting a Wi-Fi Direct network
• Connected to the mobile device via a USB On-the-Go cable

Just select Print or Share to PSP when you need to print. Just tap the menu button to reveal the print option. Location of menu button may vary depending on your model of Android™ device. 

The HP Print Service Plugin simplifies printing on your Android™ Lollipop™ (v5.0) and newer devices. If you use Android 6 (Marshmallow) or earlier, you might need to enable the HP Print Service Plugin in your device's settings

For more information on using the HP Print Service Plugin or details on supported HP Printers, go to:
https://support.hp.com/us-en/document/c04024231/?openCLC=true

For more information on Mobile Printing in general, go to:
https://www.hp.com/go/mobileprinting

recentChanges: • Reliability and performance improvements
comments: Ever since the plug in was introduced my devices do not print right. I had everything up and running smoothly and ever since I downloaded the Plug-In app I have two of my printer on all my devices and sometimes I simply cannot get things to print anymore. I really wish you would try again and get an app that is all inclusive and doesn't need a separate plug in in order to continue working because for whatever reason it seems to cause confusion between devices and the actual printer.

It seems to work fine gives me an error message til it 'wakes up". I'm still getting used to it but its sure nice to print from my phone so easily. updating review to 5 stars. excellent service and user interface, like it v much Another edit. I can fax without hooking up to a phone line, this app just keeps getting better and better!! I really love this app. While occasionally it can be a chore to set up, once it's up and running it's phenomenal. Highly recommend it.

I never used to be able to print from my phone using this app however we used to have an old WiFi printer. Now we bought a new printer the app works really well with the same phone - it's a shame that my HP laptop doesn't like printing as I have to reboot to the printer every time I want to print. So it's just easier using this app I'm my phone now anyway.

Works after several tries keeps asking for me to keep signing in wish it would just print when I want it to what happened to just clicking print and it printing now they want access to all the information about the stuff your printing as well. It's too much, simplify things please one button I push print and no more questions unless it's about printing, and you don't need all my information about how I'm using my own printer I bought.

It's great! Super easy to print on a network set up from my phone! One caveat is im not sure if it's the printer or app but after setting the setting for glossy paper photo print the quality seems to be the same on the photo. The app does not make it obvious when i go to print from another app whether that additional setting remained persistent when I clicked back to the app and printed out not. Prints look identical...

title: Alarm Clock for Me free
description:
Alarm Clock for Me turns your Android device into an alarm clock that plays your favorite tunes, a bedside clock with gorgeous themes, and a reliable daily helper perfect for every timing situation.

Main features:

•  Alarm clock: wake up to your favorite music and decorate your home screen with beautiful alarm clock widgets
•  Sleep Timer: fall asleep to your favorite songs or sounds from our collection;
•  Current temperature: check it in the morning to pick out a perfect outfit for your day;
• Unlimited support: set as many alarms you need —  and you’ll never oversleep or miss an important event; 
•  Nightstand mode: see what the time is at night while your Android is charging;
•  Background support: alarm will go off even if the app is not running;
• Two new ways to turn off an alarm: math alarm clock to kick-start your brain or shake alarm option to wake up your body;
•  Vibrate / Fade in / Snooze options for making your awakening more gentle.

Other features enhancing the overall experience:

• Use the customizable clock widgets on your Home screen.
• Adjust the screen brightness so that it doesn’t blind you after a good night’s sleep.
• Take advantage of Perfect Bedtime Reminder to go to sleep at the right time in the evening.
• Enable Gentle PreAlarm to enjoy easy and gentle awakening in the morning.
• Use the shortcut on the main screen to go directly to the app’s settings and all active alarms.
• You can also choose between vertical and horizontal modes, or prevent the main screen from auto-rotation by fixing the position of the clock on your screen.

Enjoy a perfect balance of beauty and functionality with this beautiful and reliable alarm clock app!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
California Privacy Notice: https://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#h
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

comments: I like this alarm but it has flaws that I've put up with but I'm tired of it. You can't control the dimmer. So im here with the lights on trying to set the alarm and I can't read ANYTHING! I would have to turn off my light to see anything. You should be able to adjust this. Also setting the date. If i had a alarm for December and now it's February it still has it on December. So I have to set up a new alarm ugh just talking about it is annoying. Im downloading a different appt.

I use to love this app. But the noisy ads are way too much. It scares my partner every time I go to set an alarm at night. And it annoyingly wakes him up in the morning when I go to use the app. I'm going to just attempt to use my phones built in alarm system. I'm really sad because this was my favorite app to use for my ADHD. I'm fine with ads but they need to be silent for this kind of app.

This WAS a great app, but now I am on the verge of Uninstaller it. Loud ads KILL this app!!!! It is so annoying to have the alarm go off and then have to wait 5 or 10 seconds through an annoying ad before I can shut that off. It especially sucks if you have someone else in the bed with you who gets up later. Yeah, the wife gets pissed off because it wakes her up completely. "Sorry honey, just waot for the annoying ad with the jackhammer sound then go back to sleep." Yeah right. Silent ads are ok

Been using this app for a couple of years and it was cool, but yhe ads of the app got so annoying, somehow they keep running even when I close the app and it happens only with this app! Even when Im using other app, the ads are running with sound only. I'll have to uninstall it cuz it put me in awkward situations lately

Customer service was fast and good to work with. Still a great program. Thanks for all the help. Dean Love the program. I purchased it a while back and all was good until just recently. It now has ads. The problem is I have 3 Google accounts for different emails and it is looking at 1 that I didn't use to purchase it with. If I delete the account it shows paid. If I add it back it has ads. It didn't use to do this. Any help would be great.

title: NETGEAR Nighthawk – WiFi Router App
description:
The Nighthawk app gives you convenient access to your router’s features:
- Anywhere Access – Monitor and control your home WiFi from anywhere.
- Smart Parental Controls – Filter content and limit time online automatically with Circle® on NETGEAR. 
- Armor Security – Advanced cybersecurity on your network to protect all devices from online threats.
- Speed Test – See if you’re getting the internet broadband speeds you’re paying for.
- Guest WiFi – Set up a secure and separate WiFi network for guests. 
- Traffic Meter – Monitor internet usage over time.
- Easily pause WiFi, update firmware, and more!

The NETGEAR Nighthawk app (formerly Up App) is a complete upgrade from the legacy NETGEAR genie app. New features are consistently being added. Install it today!

For more information about your router, visit http://www.support.netgear.com

Netgear, Inc.

San Jose, CA
95134
recentChanges: This latest release addresses some stability issues.  Also, make sure you update your router to the latest firmware version using the app in order to explore all the great features it has to offer. comments: Absolute Trash. - Save yourself some headaches and just use the web interface. I have had tons of problems connecting with this app and on many occasions, when I do, it has wiped out my internet connection. I used to be a huge fan of Netgear equipment. I am starting to lose confidence in the company as a whole and in their commitment to quality. Using the Rax 20 as a guest AP and for my IoT devices. Switched to ASUS for my private internal network.

I have to be as honest as possible here. The app is absolute trash. Constant freezing/ crashing on start up and when it doesn't freeze or crash its functions don't work properly 90% of the time. I'd have better luck beating my router with a coat hanger trying to edit its settings than using this app. Just log into the router manually and save yourself the headache of troubleshooting this garbage.

This is one of the worst apps ive ever used. It doesnt remember your passwords to log in, it doesnt correctly save your safety questions. It randomly forces you to log in despite remembering you, and will refuse your password no matter what. If you try to reset the password, it doesnt accept it. It forces a hard reset each time, and simply doesnt work. And dont even get me started on the bs security app it forces you to download. If you dont buy bitdefender, you cant access any website. At all.

Awful. The app crashes without fail every time it reaches the last step of my wifi router set up (verifying the phone's connection to the router's internet) I can't tell you how many times I've logged in, filled out my personalization options, waited for the verification process, only for it to inevitably crash the app. And this is the only way to set this router up? No wonder Netgear was on sale.

When I had a Motorola Z3, this app worked fine. I could control my guest wifi, check my speed and change settings. However, when I switched to Motorola one 5g, it almost never works. Whenever I try to log in, I get a message that my login attempt timed out and I should restart my phone. Restarting doesn't change anything, I still get the same message

title: Google Calendar
description:
Get the official Google Calendar app, part of Google Workspace, for your Android phone and tablet to save time and make the most of every day.

• Different ways to view your calendar - Quickly switch between month, week, and day view.
• Events from Gmail - Flight, hotel, concert, restaurant reservations, and more are added to your calendar automatically.
• Tasks - Create, manage, and view your tasks alongside your events in Calendar
• All your calendars in one place - Google Calendar works with all calendars on your phone, including Exchange.

Google Calendar is part of Google Workspace. With Google Workspace, you and your team can:
• Schedule meetings quickly by checking coworkers' availability or layering their calendars in a single view
• See if meeting rooms or shared resources are free
• Share calendars so people see full event details or just if you are free
• Access from your laptop, tablet or phone
• Publish calendars on the web

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/calendar/

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

comments: The app is good. But since last 1 month the notifications are not working properly. If I click on a particular reminder notification then some other opens. So I always need to open the calendar and go the reminders there to do anything with them. If this issue can be resolved then it will be great.

I have been using this app for years but now you suddenly can't colour code the different appointments as you save them. I used to have a different colour for grandchildren, one for the dogs, red for all doctors or dentists appointments and purple for all the birthdays. Now any that are set stay that colour but all new ones are blue. I can't see at a glance what I'm doing now. It's sooo disappointing. I'm going to have to look for a different one to help me remember everything.

Been using it a few years. However, the app keeps giving me a sync error now no matter what I try. Restarting my phone clearing the app's cache and storage and leaving in-app feedback did nothing. Edit: It works now! But all of the suggestions given didn't fix it. What I did was to remove all my gmail accounts and add them back again.

Really really good, until recently... I've been very happy with the app for many years. However recently I've noticed a bug with the editing of 'Reminders' - the edit window cannot properly identify which reminder it's supposed to be editing. Wonder if this something you might be working on?

Do not erase this review. This is the third time I placed review it might not be a great review. But it's an accurate one. Should not be deleted. I was having trouble with the app trying to figure out how to put backgrounds on events and I was under the impression that it couldn't be done because nobody at support was able to help me. However when I go into place this review I'm looking at the photos of the app at the Play store and it clearly shows that there are backgrounds. Help

title: Google Assistant
description:
Get the Google Assistant for hands-free help

Your Google Assistant is ready to help when and where you need it. Manage your schedule , get help with everyday tasks, control smart home devices, enjoy your entertainment, and much more.

Just start with: "Hey Google"

Play music and videos with your voice

Find music based on a genre, play your favorite songs, playlists, podcasts, and music videos, or find the perfect tunes for activities like cooking, studying, or working out. You can also skip songs and adjust the volume.

"Play workout music"
"Play my Discover Weekly on Spotify"
"Set volume to 5"

Stay in touch with hands-free calls, texts, and emails

Your Assistant makes it fast and easy to stay connected to those who matter most. Make calls, send text messages, and draft emails to your contacts.

"Read my unread texts"
"Call Carly"
"Text Sam 'On my way'"

Get quick directions and local info

Quickly find answers about businesses, restaurants, and attractions, including business hours, traffic info, and Google Maps directions. You can also book a ride with your favorite rideshare company, or find parking lots near your destination.

"How's the traffic to work?"
"Where's the nearest coffee shop?"
"Give me directions to the airport"

Get convenient help throughout the day

Stay on top of your schedule and manage your calendar so you don't forget important appointments and meetings. Set reminders and get alerts so you can check off your daily to-dos. Your Assistant makes it easy to take notes, set timers, add items to your shopping list, and set alarms.

"Remind me to drink water every morning"
"Add eggs and bread to my shopping list"
"Set an alarm for 7 AM"

Search the web and get quick answers

Find fast answers to your questions while you're out and about, or at home. Get real-time weather forecasts and updates, find how-to videos, check sports scores, search the web, or get language translations when you're abroad.

"What’s the weather this weekend?"
"How much is $50 in euros?"
"Tell me the latest news"

*Your device must still meet the requirements in order to use the Google Assistant.
*You do not need this app to use the Google Assistant if you already have the Google Assistant on your device.

recentChanges:
We've added shortcuts to make it easy to launch Assistant actions. Long press on the Assistant launcher icon to try them out.

• Expanded support to Android L and Android tablets
• Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Love it ! You can choose the different voices depending on which one you enjoy hearing the most from American to British even an Australian voice . But it has everything that you need it to. From Making reminders , and adding them in your notes to Making phone calls or texts to checking your weather. There isn't anything it can't do. The jokes are funny at times , and the games you can play with your assistant. Play around with it and you'll see the possibilities.

"Something went wrong. Please try again." This happens very often. Sometimes works again after going in and back out of airplane mode but other times I have to reboot. During these times, every other app has no connectivity problems. I see this on multiple phone models, on different WiFi networks, on cellular data, etc. When it used to work it was decent, though there's always room to make it a little more intelligent but this problem has been around long enough they seem to have abandoned the app. Someone will likely answer this by pointing to a post saying to clear cache, reboot, update etc. None of these has any effect and the latest version is now over 3 years old!?

Assistant has learned a little. Still won't read aloud for me, even after it says "ok" or "got it". And it doesnt seem to know how to help me with that when it says "Sorry. Something went wrong." Or,"I dont see a web page. Try opening a web page and try again." This, while im on a website asking to be read a web page. Smh; its probably me. But cant you give Assistant a better/bigger menu?

It's completely annoying when you ask a question in a room where there's a Google mini, but your PHONE responds, INSTEAD OF the mini. What's the point of having minis all over your house if the phone's going to commandeer the response? (No, I don't want to disable Assistant on my phone -- in case I'm not at home -- and I need an answer.) Grrrr. EDIT: Google Devs responded to this review right away, but it was PAINFULLY OBVIOUS that it was a CANNED reply-- and/or they only skimmed what I wrote.

This app is not working offline. It says "your phone's mobile data is turned off. Can't help at the moment". I wonder why does it need internet for basic tasks like calling, texting, play already downloaded music. It doesn't even wait for the command. Complaints about mobile data immediately after "Hey google". For me this app is useless without an offline mode.

title: Dropbox: Cloud Storage & Drive, Doc & Photo Backup
description:
Dropbox lets anyone upload and transfer files to the cloud, and share them with anyone. Back up and sync docs, photos, videos, and other files to cloud storage and access them from any device, no matter where you are. And with advanced sharing features, it’s easy to share docs and send files—large or small—to family, friends, and co-workers.

Features:
• Automatically upload videos and photos from your camera roll to cloud photo storage—all in the background—for easy video sharing and photo sharing. 
• Access any file in your account—even offline—and preview over 175 different file types with no special software required.
• Easily send large files by copying and pasting a link you can give to anyone, even if they don’t have a Dropbox account. 
• Scan documents, receipts, IDs, photos, and more using your mobile device and transform them into high-quality PDFs, so you can view and send anywhere.
• Sync folders on your PC or Mac to Dropbox with computer backup, and recover older versions or restore deleted files with version history and file recovery. 

Sign up now for your free Dropbox Plus trial. You’ll get 2 TB (2,000 GB) of storage space—that’s enough room to save files from all your linked devices. We’ve also introduced some new features as part of your Plus plan: Dropbox Passwords to store and sync passwords across all your devices and Dropbox Vault to secure and organize your most sensitive documents. And with Dropbox Rewind, you can roll back any file, folder, or your entire account, up to 30 days.

Existing Plus customers can upgrade to Dropbox Professional. With 3 TB (3,000GB), you can store all your stuff—from work projects to personal photos—and have space to spare. You and your clients can comment on most file types without leaving Dropbox. And you can protect your work with a watermark, add shared link controls, or rewind your account up to 180 days.

Before completing payment, you’ll see the plan price. This amount will be charged to your Google Play account and will vary by plan and country. Dropbox subscriptions purchased in app renew monthly or yearly, depending on your plan. To avoid auto-renewal, turn it off in at least 24 hours before your subscription renews. You can turn off auto-renewal anytime from your Google Play account settings.

Dropbox is a secure cloud solutions leader trusted by Fortune 500 companies for their most sensitive data. Over 14 million paid users choose Dropbox because they know they can count on a company that’s also dedicated to their security and privacy—no matter what they do or where they are. Let Dropbox be your all-in-one file storage, file organizer, file transfer, and file sharing solution for all your devices—from Android to iPhone and Mac to PC.

We’d love to hear from you! Join the Dropbox community: https://www.dropboxforum.com
Terms of Service: https://www.dropbox.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.dropbox.com/privacy

comments: This is a terrible app. Yet another useless app from Google. The free version offers 2gb's of storage (fair enough), yet I am unable to open a 2gb file because I "don't have enough storage (on the app)". The device itself is brand new and has tons of storage, so that is not the issue (if that is what you were thinking). This is another predatory service offered by Google that does not work worth a damn, yet has access to your location, contacts, personal/private information, etc.

Simply the best cloud storage app in the world and I thank you sincerely for all your amazing work. It is simple, fast, convenient, good looking, functional, adaptive, and works very well. 🌟 I love to use Dropbox and the use of it helped me many times not only to backup what I wanted, but also to upload files from Dropbox into where I wanted, and that helped me many times. However, I want to have a choice for a small paid plan such as maybe 10GB to 20GB for a personal use.

This is absolutely the best cloud storage app. Thank you! It is dependable and easy to access from all of my devices. It offers plenty of space, which is important because I store a lot of information for schoolwork. I think it's great! Thanks!

I'm extremely unimpressed by Dropbox. It begins by desiring access to things it shouldn't need, with no way of letting you deny it if you need the app. Then it gives you a small amount of space for free, too small for the one thing I needed to download. WORST OF ALL: I can't even see how to delete my account. It only let's me log out. I'd give it a lower rating if I was allowed.

Everyday I find something irksome with this app. The Dropbox service is great, but this app is full of problems. It takes years to upload things - if they upload at all, spontaneous "storage full or unavailable" errors when trying to download, syncing issues, issues moving files, issues renaming files, issues exporting files. It never ends. You're better off just going to the website and working with your files there.

title: Easy Voice Recorder
description:
Easy Voice Recorder is your everyday companion to record important moments. Capture meetings, personal notes, classes, songs, and much more, without time limits!

For students

Record classes and lectures with clear quality, even when the teacher is not right in front of you. Listen to these recordings as many times as you want to help you study for that next exam. 

With no time limits and the option to choose a compressed format, it's easy to record the longest classes and lectures.

For business

Capture interviews and meetings from your phone, tablet, or smart watch, then share them with your colleagues through email or your favourite messaging app. Take advantage of powerful widgets and shortcuts to start a new recording right from the home screen.

For musicians and for everyone

With many options to fine-tune the recording, the app is great for rehearsals and for capturing melodies that pop into your head. Try new ideas fast, hear the results and make adjustments on a new take.

Quickly switch between voice notes, meetings & lectures, and music & raw sound with easy to use settings and presets.

Here is what you get:

★ Record to high-quality PCM and MP4, or use AMR to save space.
★ Quickly start a new recording with widgets and shortcuts, and record in the background.
★ Share recordings easily through email or your favourite app, or set one of them as a ringtone.
★ Android Wear support - record from your smartwatch.
★ Light and dark themes, and many other cool features.

Want more?

The Pro version also includes the following features (available on supported devices):

- Upload new recordings automatically to your Google Drive or Dropbox.
- Record to MP3 and AAC, in addition to all the formats available in the free version.
- Record using a Bluetooth microphone.
- Trim recordings and remove unwanted sections with Edit mode.
- Manage and organize your recordings with folders, and save recordings to your SD card.
- Control the recorder from anywhere using the notifications bar, or through our Tasker and Locale plugins.
- Bonus features: record in stereo, import files, skip silence, volume boost, custom bitrates, and more.

Easy Voice Recorder is exactly what the name says: an easy to use audio recorder and sound recorder. Reliable, fast and flexible, it adapts to your needs.

Need help?

Please note that Easy Voice Recorder is not a call recorder and can’t record phone calls on most phones. If there are any problems, please contact us at support@digipom.com. We are always happy to assist you.

Terms of Use

Terms of Use: http://www.digipom.com/end-user-license-agreement-for-applications/
Privacy Policy: http://www.digipom.com/privacy-policy-for-applications/

Permission details

Photos/Media/Files - Save recordings to your external storage.
Microphone - Record audio from your microphone.

comments: This is a great reliable app. Not only does it record the events & conversations I need to save. I use it to help me remember stuff. I have memory issues and I record little clips on this then have my phone alarm play the clip. This really helps. I don't have to pick up the phone to know what the alarms about. I already know because it's telling me.

This is one of the absolute best apps I have ever downloaded. Whenever I have a thought or want to record something for posterity this does the trick. Sound quality is exceptional. The process to record and save is so simple and it keeps a record of each recording by date. Is easy to retrieve each recording and listen back to it along with the option of saving again or deleting. It's so nice to have an app that is effective and simple but so valuable. 10 stars.

I'm a journalist, and this is the only recording app thus far that doesn't spontaneously delete my recordings. Saves audio automatically, and tells you how much recordable time you have left, which is a huge plus especially when I have a long event. Plus, it's free and ads don't play as soon as you stop recording. Love this app, I've recommended it to everyone I work with. Great job.

I've recently picked up my guitar, again, after a stroke a few years ago. I'm struggling (well, it feels like a struggle to me...) to find my singing voice again. Recording as I practice lets me see/hear that it's going better than I thought! The app is easy to use, which is important. Lets me concentrate on what I'm doing, rather than on figuring out how to opperate and record. Really glad I blundered into it!

This is the best free App for recording. My mum is in a nursing home. She is not well. My sister visits her. I am hundreds of kms away. So, I write, then record my family stories. My sister plays them to mum's great delight. The recordings are very clear, bright & precise. Very very Audible. Mum is pretty deaf, but, hears the storys well. I recommend this Audio Application. Brilliant. Thank you to the Developers. A great professional job you have given to society. Jeanette

title: AT&T Mobile Transfer
description: AT&T Mobile Transfer allows you to transfer your content (contacts, pictures, videos, music, messages and more) from your old device to your new device wirelessly. Simply download the app to both devices, follow the prompts to connect the devices and transfer your content.
descriptionHTML: AT&T Mobile Transfer allows you to transfer your content (contacts, pictures, videos, music, messages and more) from your old device to your new device wirelessly. Simply download the app to both devices, follow the prompts to connect the devices and transfer your content.
summary: Allows you to transfer content from your old device to your new one over Wi-Fi.
developerAddress:
208 S Akard St,

Dallas, TX 75202 USA
recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: At first it said it was transferring but no progress. After 2+ hrs called at&t for help. Service rep stated it could take multiple hrs and have faith in app. Waited an additional 2 hrs then closed and reinstalled app. Ran again and it showed options on what to transfer then showed progress. Within 10 mins it was done. Great app bad support.
Wonderful app to use for transferring all data to your new device!!!
Great! Easy to transfer all my data
Good I activated the att transfer app started it and set back .

The instructions seemed clear. I haven't used the phone to verify the transfer but at this time my only issue would be the transfer time est was 11 min which was only the first phase. The populating that followed was several hours! Also one document wasn't transferred but I don't know what it was yet. It would have been convenient if the name was provided.

title: SHAREit Lite - Share & File Transfer App, Share it
description:
Developed by the SHAREit team, Compatible with SHAREit, transfer files with SHAREit without barrier. Ads free!  Provide transfer features only. Smaller app size to save your mobile storage. Faster transfer speed with no data required, making your life more convenient. 

SHAREit Lite enables to share photos🖼️, videos🎬, music🎵, any files with friends "face to face OR far away", and no limitation on file type or file size, or the number of files. 

[Main Features]

🚀100% SHAREit Transfer any files face to face with friends, no Internet needed, with lighting speed. 

🆓AD-free  No ads interruption while using the app. SHAREit lite provides a simple and user-friendly interface for file transfers.      

💡Share Anytime SHAERit Lite lets you keep in touch with friends, you can share any files at any time. 

🔥Any File Type Transfer all types of files without losing quality: photo, video, ebook, docs, music, app, zip, txt, etc.

🗂️Any File Size Share movies, videos, photos, music, apps, documents, and any other file types of unlimited file size. 

👍Any Number of Files Send many files as one collection: photo album, video collection, music album, movie collection, documents, etc. 

NOTE: We need several system permission for a better transfer experience, SHAREit Lite will not access permissions that are irrelevant to our functionality. By accessing Location, SHAREit Lite can help to discover nearby users (when face to face sharing, we need to scan nearby receiver devices but this capability was embedded in Location permission by Android System). By accessing Bluetooth Connection, SHAREit Lite can discover nearby users more quickly so as to connect with Sender/Receiver more efficiently.❤️

comments: Very good. It took the fast and easy sharing from shareit and made it AD-free. Very fast,simple and easy to use.

Everything is great but you have to fix at when we are sending it's so many time that it disconnection. But I give you five star because the file is very like the original. Thank you forgive me easy way to sending file.

this seemed really nice. it's super clean and light. i really liked it but then unfortunately, THE FIRST APPS I RECEIVED CAN'T BE INSTALLED. please fix this problem because i really want to keep this app!

honestly my experience with share it was a disaster 😑 but this app is totally different it's far better than the original version, it's Light and has a very friendly UI..but without a reason sometimes this app crashes and get disconnect when file transfer is ongoing.. please fix it 🙏🏽
It was good,but after the update,it keeps getting more complicated,now you must open your browser?! Huh?! So its mean this app is nothing but the working hard is browser?!

title: MEGA
description:
MEGA provides user-controlled encrypted cloud storage and chat through standard web browsers, together with dedicated apps for mobile devices. Unlike other cloud storage providers, your data is encrypted and decrypted by your client devices only and never by us.

Upload your files from your smartphone or tablet then search, store, download, stream, view, share, rename or delete your files any time, from any device, anywhere. Share folders with your contacts and see their updates in real time. The encryption process means we cannot access or reset your password so you MUST remember it (unless you have your Recovery Key backed up) or you will lose access to your stored files.

End-to-end user-encrypted MEGA video chat allows for total privacy, and has been available through the browser since 2016. It has been extended to our mobile app, with chat history accessible across multiple devices. Users can also easily add files to a chat from their MEGA cloud drive.

MEGA offers a generous 20 GB free storage for all registered users with bonus achievements, and offers paid plans with much higher limits: 

PRO LITE subscription: 4.99 € per month or 49.99 € per year gives you 400 GB of storage space and 1 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO I subscription: 9.99 € per month or 99.99 € per year gives you 2 TB of storage space and 2 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO II subscription: 19.99 € per month or 199.99 € per year gives you 8 TB of storage space and 8 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO III subscription: 29.99 € per month or 299.99 € per year gives you 16 TB of storage space and 16 TB of transfer quota per month.

Subscriptions are renewed automatically for successive subscription periods of the same duration and at the same price as the initial period chosen. To manage your subscriptions, simply click on the Play Store icon on your handset, sign in with your Google ID (if you haven't already done so) and then click on the MEGA app. You'll be able to manage your subscription there.

App Permissions:
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE -> Download your files from MEGA to your device and upload files from your device to MEGA
CAMERA -> Take a picture and upload your photos to MEGA
READ_CONTACTS -> Easily add contacts from your device as MEGA contacts
RECORD_AUDIO & CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT (mic and camera) -> MEGA provides for end-to-end encrypted audio/video calls 

To enhance users' confidence in the MEGA system, all of the client-side code is published, so interested security researchers can evaluate the encryption process. The code of our mobile app is located on: https://github.com/meganz/android

For more info, please check our website:
See https://mega.nz/terms 

Desktop - https://mega.nz/
descriptionHTML:
MEGA provides user-controlled encrypted cloud storage and chat through standard web browsers, together with dedicated apps for mobile devices. Unlike other cloud storage providers, your data is encrypted and decrypted by your client devices only and never by us.

Upload your files from your smartphone or tablet then search, store, download, stream, view, share, rename or delete your files any time, from any device, anywhere. Share folders with your contacts and see their updates in real time. The encryption process means we cannot access or reset your password so you MUST remember it (unless you have your Recovery Key backed up) or you will lose access to your stored files.

End-to-end user-encrypted MEGA video chat allows for total privacy, and has been available through the browser since 2016. It has been extended to our mobile app, with chat history accessible across multiple devices. Users can also easily add files to a chat from their MEGA cloud drive.

MEGA offers a generous 20 GB free storage for all registered users with bonus achievements, and offers paid plans with much higher limits:

PRO LITE subscription: 4.99 € per month or 49.99 € per year gives you 400 GB of storage space and 1 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO I subscription: 9.99 € per month or 99.99 € per year gives you 2 TB of storage space and 2 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO II subscription: 19.99 € per month or 199.99 € per year gives you 8 TB of storage space and 8 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO III subscription: 29.99 € per month or 299.99 € per year gives you 16 TB of storage space and 16 TB of transfer quota per month.

Subscriptions are renewed automatically for successive subscription periods of the same duration and at the same price as the initial period chosen. To manage your subscriptions, simply click on the Play Store icon on your handset, sign in with your Google ID (if you haven't already done so) and then click on the MEGA app. You'll be able to manage your subscription there.

App Permissions:
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE -> Download your files from MEGA to your device and upload files from your device to MEGA
CAMERA -> Take a picture and upload your photos to MEGA
READ_CONTACTS -> Easily add contacts from your device as MEGA contacts
RECORD_AUDIO & CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT (mic and camera) -> MEGA provides for end-to-end encrypted audio/video calls

To enhance users' confidence in the MEGA system, all of the client-side code is published, so interested security researchers can evaluate the encryption process. The code of our mobile app is located on: https://github.com/meganz/android

For more info, please check our website:
See https://mega.nz/terms

Desktop - https://mega.nz/
summary: Secure, private cloud storage and communication. Get 20 GB storage free.

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Perfect for saving videos and audio. Though this is a bit of a "first world problem" request, it would be nice to have a speed option on videos and audio. It gets sometimes irritating that I have to constantly download and then upload them when dealing with speed issues. Other than that, very nice app. I prefer it more than the desktop one for it's simplicity.

I do not know what your problem is with your tokens or whatever they are. You reach the middle of a download and then the 'tokens' end and once the hour is through you have to restart the download. That is like saying you will never download the file you had in the cloud. Very disapointed in you.

it's a great cloud storage, for me bettee that google drive where you are bound by unnecessary rules. only one complain: their is a daily transfer limit for free users,, if it was only limited storage then I could rate it 5 stars. bit sometimes I have to download a very important file and the app says I'm over my limit,, that's a little irritating for me. but I can understand, It's business after all.

I appreciate mega, however it is very slow and choppy and it's not like I have a weak device. Whenever I upload something, the estimated uploaded data in the notification bar is not correct nor do I have the faintest idea of how many of my files have been uploaded. It might show that there are 58.8MBs uploaded, then go back to 54MBs.

Features are great for free user. Uploading speed is downside even in faster WiFi. Uploading bunch of files is a headache, should have been upload one file at a time or option to choose from settings. Every file is uploading at varied speed. And that daily limit is another headache

title: DocuSign - Upload & Sign Docs
description:
DocuSign eSignature is the world’s #1 way to send and sign agreements from practically anywhere, at any time. Your signature is your word, so no wonder millions of people around the world trust our eSignature solution. From any device and anywhere, streamline how business gets done with the free DocuSign mobile app.

UNLIMITED FREE SIGNING  |  Sign documents on the go.

• Step 1: Create your customized signature directly on your device.
• Step 2: Upload documents easily via email, Google Drive, DropBox, Box, Evernote, Salesforce, or photo scanning.
• Step 3: E-sign your documents for free with no monthly limit.


SEND & MANAGE AGREEMENTS  |  Send & manage files straight from your device.

• Step 1:  Import files to prepare and send out for signature directly from your device.
• Step 2: Prepare your document with “Sign Here” tags that show precisely where to sign, initial, or add additional information.  Set the signing order and workflow for multiple signers.  DocuSign supports in-person and remote signing.
• Step 3: Remind signers to sign with a single tap or void a document that has already been sent for signature.
• Step 4: Receive real-time push notifications when a document has been signed.



E-SIGNATURE IS LEGAL & SECURE.
• Legally binding agreements—DocuSign’s complies with the eSign Act.
• Complete audit trail to see who signed when and where.
• Documents are encrypted—safer and more secure than paper.
• DocuSign is ISO 27001 SSAE16 compliant.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In addition to our free signing experience, we offer advanced features through our premium plans, take a look and see which plan might be right for you:

Standard Plan
• Send documents out for signature.
• Access to advanced fields including DocuSign’s most popular.
• Manage signing on-the-go. Remind, void, in-person signing, and reusable templates.

Real Estate Plan
• Send documents out for signature.
• Powerful real estate features including zipForm Plus integration and web branding.
• Managing signing on-the-go. Remind, void, in-person signing, and reusable templates.

Personal Plan
• Limited document sending. Send up to 5 documents monthly.
• Access to essential fields. Request signature, date, and name.
• Reusable templates so you can standardize your documents.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Supported file types:
• PDF
• Word
• Excel
• Images (JPEG, PNG, TIFF)
• Text
+ more

Common documents to sign with DocuSign
• NDAs
• Sales contracts
• Health care documents
• Financial agreements
• Waivers
• Permission slips
• Lease agreements

For questions or feedback email us:
mobilefeedback@docusign.com

Find out more about DocuSign and electronic signatures: https://www.docusign.com/products/electronic-signature/how-docusign-works

Subscription information: 
Payment will be charged to Google Play at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's account settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Takes just a minute to sign forms sent in an email! No more printing, signing, scanning, then emailing. Love it. And it's FREE!!

A great app for doing properly-protected digital signatures (that is, they can't be copy-pasted to another document if shared) - if you can log into it. It has additional collaboration features I've never used like being able to send the same document to someone else with a prompt to sign. I'd previously had trouble with it forgetting who I was constantly, and now it's doing that, and refusing to accept the code it e-mails, which means I can't log in or use the app.
It helps my Approvals, Signs, and other related Authorization at ease. I'm happy that I have used the DocuSign.

Every time they updated it thinks your Android is a new device. Their two factor authentication doesn't work because it requires uses Chrome. Which by the time you go to your email to get the code, and go back to Chrome it refreshes the screen to a screen that can't be accessed or loaded. Essentially permanently locking you out of your account. Otherwise when it works it's great
For now, they are the best scanning and signing app. I recommend you use it. Thank you. August 2021.

title: ClevCalc - Calculator
description:
This calculator allows you to easily handle all the calculations necessary for everyday life with a single application. A free calculator app with a clean interface and practical functions!


1. Calculator ( + Scientific Calculator )
• Supports the four fundamental arithmetic operations, square, root, parentheses and percentage operations.
• Supports scientific operations such as trigonometric, exponential and logarithmic functions.
• Possible to modify incorrectly entered expressions with a freely movable cursor.
• Simple and easy.
• History available.

2. Unit Converter
• Supports length, weight, width, volume, time, temperature, pressure, speed, fuel efficiency, and the amount of data.
• Supports all unit conversions commonly used in everyday life.

3. Currency Converter
• Supports 135 currencies in the world, including dollar, euro, yen, yuan, etc.
• Automatically calculates using the real time exchange rate.

4. Percentage Calculator
• You can easily calculate the percentage increase or decrease.
• You can also calculate what percentage one number is of another.

5. Discount Calculator
• Get a discount price by entering the original price and the discount rate.

6. Loan Calculator
• You can calculate the total interest and total payments by entering the loan principal and interest rate.

7. Date Calculator
• A feature that calculates the specific date or anniversary to be remembered!

8. Health Calculator
• You can measure the body mass index (BMI) and the basal metabolic rate (BMR).

9. Automobile Fuel Cost Calculator
• You can calculate the fuel costs required for driving a car or traveling.
• Enter a distance and a fuel efficiency to get a fuel cost.

10. Fuel Efficiency Calculator
• Enter the amount of fuel used to get the fuel efficiency.

11. GPA Calculator
• You can correctly calculate your GPA!

12. Tip Calculator
• The tip amount to be added will be automatically calculated if you enter the billing amount and tip percentage.
• There is a function not to calculate tips on tax.
• You may calculate the amount per person by dividing final amount by the number of people.

13. Sales Tax Calculator
• Get a total price by entering the original price and the tax rate.

14. Unit Price Calculator
• Enter the price and the quantity and you will get the unit price.
• You can compare unit prices of various goods.

15. World Time Converter
• Transforms the time of 400 or more cities around the world.
• Daylight savings time will also be reflected in this calculation.

16. Ovulation Calculator
• Calculates the time of ovulation and fertility using the menstrual cycle!
• You can also create notes by date.

17. Hexadecimal Converter
• Converts between decimal and hexadecimal with ease and convenience.

18. Savings Calculator
• If you enter deposit amount, interest rate and time period, the interest after tax and final savings balance will be calculated.


[ Disclaimer ]
Cleveni Inc. makes no warranty as to the accuracy or reliability or suitability of any calculation results or information provided through the ClevCalc app. Cleveni Inc. is not also responsible for any damages, direct or indirect, which may occur by the calculation results or information provided through the ClevCalc app.

comments: I liked the app on the beginning, however, the number grid and math functions (+,×,÷,=,-,) have since disappeared and has been replace with a top grid of numbers and a side grid of letters (A,B,C,D,E,F) I cannot for the life of me figure out how to get back to original number/function page. So at this point the app sucks big time.

I installed this App today, and I should say it's ok! The layout/design, beautiful themes and many calculators combined in one make it stand out! But the loan calculator seems a bit confusing to me. The 20% of 50,000 should be 10,000, but the calculator said it's 11,074.79. For example, equal total payment for 50,000 @ 20% for 24 weeks should be 60,000 divided by 24 = 2,500 per week, but the calculator said it's 2,544.79. Please is there something I'm missing?

I had a "unit converterr", a "currency calculator", a "loan calculator" and a normal calculator. This app proves that they can all be combined in an intuitive interface, plus some more obscure "calculations". Definitely 5 stars. If anything, the possibility to choose where the exchange rates are updated could be introduced... and a few (very few) details I will inform the developer after some more use. Thank you!

It is a very good app !!!! It meets all my needs as a calculator !!!!! I don't have anything to complain about on this one. : ) Stephie : ) Ivermectin is pretty much a wonder drug !!! I used to like this calculator, now i have changed the smartphone to a Xiaomi redmi note 10S and it seems that the app just doesn't work anymore. I open it and it closes instantly if i tap a key or just after a few seconds if I don't press anything. I've reinstalled it and still doesn't work. I'd like to use this app if an update will fix this. Thanks!

title: Google Slides
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate on presentations from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Slides app. With Slides, you can:

- Create new presentations or edit existing ones
- Share presentations and collaborate in the same presentation at the same time
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
- Add and respond to comments
- Add and rearrange slides, format text and shapes, and more
- Present straight from your mobile device
- Never worry about losing your work – everything is saved automatically as you type
- Make beautiful slides, instantly - with smart suggestions
- Present slides to video calls - scheduled meetings will automatically appear
- Open, edit, and save PowerPoint files

Google Slides is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Slides features, including:
- Collaborating on a single presentation online with your business partner, your whole team, or external contacts. You control who gets permission to edit, view, or just add comments.
- Starting from scratch or expediting the process by choosing a template. You can enhance your presentations with videos, images, drawings, and smooth transitions.
- Working across PCs, Macs, mobiles, and tablets—View or even present your slides from your phone or tablet, so you always have the option to practice your presentation up until the last minute.

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/slides/

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

Permissions Notice
Calendar: This is used to join video calls from calendar invites.
Camera: This is used for camera mode in video calls and to insert images taken with the camera.
Contacts: This is used to give suggestions of people to add to files and share with.
Microphone: This is used to transmit audio in video calls.
Storage: This is used to insert images and to open files from USB or SD storage.

title: Microsoft Excel: View, Edit, & Create Spreadsheets
description:
The Excel spreadsheet app lets you create, view, edit, and share your files with others quickly and easily. Sheets can easily be checked, edited and shared on the go. Excel makes it easy to review and analyze data, budgets more while you view and edit workbooks attached to email messages.

Edit documents for data analysis, accounting, finance, or any other fields with confidence. When on the go, your data and office move with you. Create charts, run analyses and annotate your documents from your phone at any time. Accounting on the go is even easier, with quick access to any spreadsheets and a chart maker for any type.

Create formulas and spreadsheets, review your charts or start a budget on the go. Make spreadsheets and data files your way with robust formatting tools and great features. Excel lets you build your charts and spreadsheets to meet your specific needs. Keep a worksheet for your financials and edit anytime.

Get data analysis, spreadsheets and business collaboration tools on your phone with Microsoft Excel.

Microsoft Excel Features:

Spreadsheets & Calculations
• Manage charts, budgets, task lists, accounting, or financial analysis with Excel's modern templates.
• Use data analysis tools and familiar formulas to run calculations on spreadsheets.
• Rich Office features and formatting options make your workbook sheets easier to read and use.
• Spreadsheet and chart features, formats, and formulas operate the same way on any device.

Data Analysis
• Chart maker to annotate, edit and insert charts that bring your data to life.
• Data analysis features like Add and Edit Chart Labels to highlight key insights.
• Budget tracker to keep up-to-date on expenses.

Review and Edit
• On the go? Review your Excel files from any device.
• Edit documents, charts and data or update your task list from anywhere.
• Data analysis features like sort and filter columns.
• Create spreadsheets, duplicate, hide, and unhide easily.
• Annotate charts, highlight portions of your worksheet, create shapes, or write equations with the draw tab feature on devices with touch capabilities.

Collaborate and Work Anywhere
• Share files and charts with a few taps to quickly invite others to edit, view, or leave comments.
• Edit and copy your worksheet in the body of an email message or attach a link to your workbook.

Create formulas, edit documents, manage budgets and design spreadsheets with Microsoft Excel today.

REQUIREMENTS:

1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size smaller than 10.1 inches.

Unlock the full Microsoft experience with a qualifying Microsoft 365 subscription for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.

Microsoft 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365 on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula

• Data analysis features like Add and Edit Chart Labels to highlight key insights.
• Budget tracker to keep up-to-date on expenses.

Review and Edit
• On the go? Review your Excel files from any device.
• Edit documents, charts and data or update your task list from anywhere.
• Data analysis features like sort and filter columns.
• Create spreadsheets, duplicate, hide, and unhide easily.
• Annotate charts, highlight portions of your worksheet, create shapes, or write equations with the draw tab feature on devices with touch capabilities.

Collaborate and Work Anywhere
• Share files and charts with a few taps to quickly invite others to edit, view, or leave comments.
• Edit and copy your worksheet in the body of an email message or attach a link to your workbook.

Create formulas, edit documents, manage budgets and design spreadsheets with Microsoft Excel today.

REQUIREMENTS:

1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size smaller than 10.1 inches.

Unlock the full Microsoft experience with a qualifying Microsoft 365 subscription for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.

Microsoft 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365 on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula
summary: Create powerful spreadsheets. Easily edit documents and collaborate on the go.
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges:
﻿Thank you for using Excel.

We regularly release updates to the app, which include great new features, as well as improvements for speed and reliability.

Did you know that with a Microsoft 365 subscription, you can unlock the full power of Office across all of your devices? Find special offers in the app.
comments: Mostly really good. There are some functions that are missing from the real excell that makes things really irritating when trying to use this as a tool professionally. Also, somewhere I read there is a "premium" version of I think the office package or excell, if it includes more functionality then I would take it, but i can not seem to find any information about this. In general a great tool, just lacks some functionality.

It's a lot harder than I thought! My 8" tablet is sooooo much different than a regular computer. Somethings are a lot harder. I have moderate to sevear carpal tunnel. Ever once in a while my hand or finger's have an extra twitch. Some times it plays tricks. I may have three in the same sentence. Other wise, it's just like your computer!

Latest version won't work with Android 11 One UI 3.1 Galaxy Note10+. Cannot save edited files. It just go around in circles asking you where to save. What's wrong with this version? Why won't anybody fix this problem? I can't use Excel in my primary phone. It works only in older or lower model phones. Same account still works seamlessly in Note 9 Android 10 One UI 2.5. UPDATE: Problem FINALLY fixed. Version 1.0.1 (16.0.14228.20138) THANKS.

I use Excel in conjunction with my Onedrive to keep a medication log while away from home. My only complaint is that it periodically tends to fall out of sync with my laptop Onedrive and the file stops updating. The only way I've found to fix the issue is to do a full reinstall of the mobile app.

Purchased premium microsoft 365 to be able to work efficiently and hassle free but after I got charged for ONE MONTH the next day I need to resubscribe for another month. In short I paid a bil. Of one month for a service less than 24hrs. And by the way, Ive already contacted microsoft and google play but it seems like they can't do as much. I hope you could still fix this tho I can edit on my apple device but cannot on my andriod tab which is frustrating. Thanks

title: Content Transfer
description:
With the Content Transfer app, it's easy to transfer your contacts and other content from your old phone to your new phone, without the need for wires, subscribed services or additional equipment. Our quick three-step process makes it simple to: 


Install and run the app on both devices to easily copy your personal data from one phone to another. 


Choose to transfer content to and from any device or transfer data by just scanning a QR code. 


Select the content you want to transfer, such as photos and videos, as well as contacts, calendars and reminders. Track the progress of the transfer on the go. 


Transfer all your stuff easily and begin enjoying your new phone with the Verizon Content Transfer app.
descriptionHTML:
With the Content Transfer app, it's easy to transfer your contacts and other content from your old phone to your new phone, without the need for wires, subscribed services or additional equipment. Our quick three-step process makes it simple to:


Install and run the app on both devices to easily copy your personal data from one phone to another.


Choose to transfer content to and from any device or transfer data by just scanning a QR code.


Select the content you want to transfer, such as photos and videos, as well as contacts, calendars and reminders. Track the progress of the transfer on the go.


Transfer all your stuff easily and begin enjoying your new phone with the Verizon Content Transfer app.
summary: Transfer photos, videos, music and more from your old device to a new device.
developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
comments: Keeps shutting down before transferring. Kept searching for or gathering messages, waited a couple hours, as it gets close to complete before transfer step it just shuts down completely and restarts the whole process. Wasted hours waiting for it to work and trying it again thinking it was user error or I interrupted it somehow. Six times and several hours later I'm giving up, I guess I can't transfer info from old to new phone after all.

App didn't allow me to download my contacts which is what I needed. Told me to go to the Cloud and didn't provide any instructions on how to get there. When I did it would only allow me to see my contacts on the old phone and my new phone. No way and nothing on how to transfer the old contacts over. It is a waste if you have any contact on your phone. Also, if someone sends you a contact it saves it to the phone and not the 'Cloud'. Store told me they couldn't transfer my number like B4.

My phone's content was NOT transferred, all this app did was re-download the original apps that I had downloaded previously. What I wanted was the CONTENT from my apps - such as my list of to-do items, the specific notes taken from my meetings saved on my phone, my saved text messages and more of my personal items saved INSIDE of these programs. False advertising. If they lied about what the program was supposed to transfer, are they also lying about how they are using my persal information?

Transfered everything easily. Gets pretty laggy (thought my new phone had crashed a couple times) when I had to make selections towards the end, but eventually it pulled thru and otherwise worked perfectly.

Needed to use app several times to get all the way through the process, app still dropped hundreds of images that I will need to transfer manually now. App kicked me out of transfer halfway through several times telling me I'm done and asking me to rate it. Well, here's my rating. Thanks.

title: myAT&T
description:
Now, staying on top of your AT&T accounts is much easier with the myAT&T app. 
• Check data usage: Want to keep tabs on your wireless or Internet data usage? Open the app to check usage on the overview screen.
• Pay your bill: Never miss another payment. View/pay your bill in the app. Tell us how and when, and we'll let you know when your bill is ready.
• Upgrade your phone or plan: Pick it up in the store, or have it delivered to you. You can also make changes to your plan right from the app.
descriptionHTML:
Now, staying on top of your AT&T accounts is much easier with the myAT&T app.

summary: Use myAT&T to manage your AT&T accounts all in one place.
developerAddress:
208 S Akard St,

Dallas, TX 75202 USA
recentChanges:
Say hello to your new Welcome Center! It’s a personalized feature that keeps you in the loop about changes to your account, from bill updates to network outages and anything else that you might want to know.

We’ve also added more support features, so you can get the help you need in just a few taps. Refresh your device connection, unlock a device, set up a hotspot and more from the Support tab.
comments: This app has recently become unstable. It constantly requires relogin, and a text, to start again. Then it has become so painful to navigate it us toxic. Finally, when I went through at least 20 pages just to access a listing of my package to find that it could not access it. The message, "it's not you it's us...," popped up. Unbelievable!

08-14-21. - they did an update and now it's even worse. Based on the app alone I want to get rid of AT&T. Have to login 2-3 x. And chat help disappeared, they don't even want to help anymore. You have to search several pages to find a help spot. Good luck trying to actually get help. Slow, crashes, and very inefficient. Sometimes you can get help, but many times you have to hang up and call back and may get a competent person. I hate this app. Slowest of all my bills apps.

Horrid update. It doesn't display all items and makes it really slow to use. There was another update in late June to the issue and it is worse now than before. I twiddled with it for 30 minutes trying to load to pay my bill. It would cycle and boot me out of the app. This is ridiculously horrible when we think of how much a month we pay. If I wanted no customer experience I would go prepaid. They also have promotions in the app that are worthless to west coast users. So this is junk.

Sucks, I can watch the circle spin endlessly while trying to login. Actually right now I've been trying to log in for about 15 minutes to try and pay my bill. If I call cursive service they try to get me into an old login from an ex from 5 years ago and not the right one. Just sad all around. If I can't log in to pay don't expect me to pay any late fees or any other bs.

Ever since I paid off my installment plan, loading the app just brings me to the upgrading screen, and it take several minutes of back and forth with relogging and whathaveyou before it finally shows me my account. I am in the process right now of uninstalling and reinstalling it, but we'll see if that does anything. And please don't respond with, "well, you can always pay via text or through our automated system!" I wanted to log into the app to review my bill/account, and not just pay.

title: PDF Document Scanner
description:
PDF Document Scanner
Turn your phone into a portable document scanner with the best PDF scanner app!
"🏆 PDF Document Scanner is the Fastest and Safest mobile scan app in the google play store. Create quickly, high-quality PDF scans or JPG scans with your mobile in just one tap. It is an essential app for every Android device. Download it for Free!

⭐ Features:
*Quickly scan the document
We offer single and batch mode, just use your phone camera to scan kinds of paper documents, for example, certificates, business contracts, receipts, notes, etc.

*High-quality scanner
Automatic cropping helps increase productivity, filters ensure that the text and graphics in the scanned document are clear and crisp. You can even apply the filter effect to all pages with one click

*Share PDF/JPEG Files
Easily share documents in PDF or JPG format with friends in a variety of ways. You can use email to quickly post to social networks, or save pictures in albums.

*Quick search
When you have a large number of documents, you can easily find them using keywords.

👉Permission Overview:
1. Storage: PDF Document Scanner needs permission to store documents on your phone.
2. Album; To get your photo when you need to choose pictures from it.
3. Camera: To use the camera to scan documents requires permission.

Subscription:
Subscriptions provided in PDF are updated regularly, and you can enjoy the full content during the lifetime of your subscription. This is an auto-renewal subscription that automatically renews after a 3-day free trial. If you subscribe to PDF, we will charge your Google Play account and charge your account for renewals within 24 hours of the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time after purchase by going to the settings in the Play Store. The current subscription price is $19.99 per month and $69.99 per year and may differ from country and period. Prices are in US dollars and may vary from country to country outside the United States and are subject to change without notice. If you do not choose to purchase PDF, you can continue to use it for free."

comments: Garbage. The magnifying crop feature is cool until it fails to crop every time. But I'm sure you already know that. Yet you want a $70 subscription for something that isn't even a solid program. The crop feature keeps cutting off a good half inch from the right side of my document. Assuming there's no immediate fix for this, I'm not impressed and need something that works right this moment and your software didn't make the cut. Pun intended.

Signed up for a free trial to use app, app didn't even work properly and was super buggy. Ended up canceling subscription and deleted app without successfully using it. To my surprise, I was still charged for the subscription. I tried contacting the developer to get a refund and have had no success. What a waste of $75.

It's a terrible app, it says after 3 days it is gonna automatically cut a yearly fee. There is no unsubscribe option. Also it doesn't work. For some important work, I hurriedly downloaded this app, but my work got delayed, I couldn't submit my documents in time. It doesn't work.

It's true that whenever you crop it, it zooms on the top of the sheet. You can try this app but I think you won't like it . I would recommend the app makers to take care of that. BTW it makes PDF you can crop the photo in the gallery before making pdf..

If you are reading this please dont install or pay for this app. This scanning app is the worst. It has wasted me more than 30 minutes of my life. When I crop the document it will zoom on the top of the page for no reason and i paid 28$ for this? I want a refund. If u want a working scanning app better do it yourself on your phone camera than using this app because this app will not only waste your time over sth that it cant do properly but will also ask you to subscribe.

title: Google Keep - Notes and Lists
description:
Quickly capture what’s on your mind and get a reminder later at the right place or time. Speak a voice memo on the go and have it automatically transcribed. Grab a photo of a poster, receipt or document and easily organize or find it later in search. Google Keep makes it easy to capture a thought or list for yourself, and share it with friends and family.
 
 Capture what’s on your mind
 • Add notes, lists and photos to Google Keep. Pressed for time? Record a voice memo and Keep will transcribe it so you can find it later.
 Share ideas with friends and family
 • Easily plan that surprise party by sharing your Keep notes with others and collaborating on them in real time.
 Find what you need, fast
 • Color and add labels to code notes to quickly organize and get on with your life. If you need to find something you saved, a simple search will turn it up.
 Always within reach
 • Keep works on your phone, tablet, computer and Android wearables. Everything you add syncs across all of your devices so your thoughts are always with you.
 The right note at the right time
 • Need to remember to pick up some groceries? Set a location-based reminder to pull up your grocery list right when you get to the store.
 Available everywhere
 • Try Google Keep on the web at http://keep.google.com and find it in the Chrome Web Store at http://g.co/keepinchrome.
 
 Permissions Notice
 Camera: This is used to attach images to notes in Keep.
 Contacts: This is used to share notes to contacts.
 Microphone: This is used to attach audio to notes.
 Location: This is used to set and fire location-based reminders.
 Storage: This is used to add attachments from storage to their notes.
