recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: Been using this since 2018, not much problems. But now, whenever i archive or label a note, it doesnt show first when i check the archive section or the label. Supposedly, the newest note should be shown first or there should be an option in the archive/label where we can arrange notes so we can organize and see it better. Also when i edited a note (the note was made in mobile) in desktop, it disappeared in both devices even after syncing. Please fix these issues.

The app is great! I've been using this app for about 3 years now, and the major issue that i found with this app is the missing of security! Anyone can open the app and all the datas are shown infront, there's no folder system, passward protection or anything! Please add a security option and we'll give 5 star rating! Thanks!

Not up to date, and VERY convenient to use like other apps on playstore. It has to be frequently backed up to avoid loss! I request it to be upgraded and made more convenient to handle like "Color Notes". It should have these things: 🌟Encryption for Some notes to lock its content 🌟Show just headings in bold & not the entire content at the home page. It takes of quality space and makes it difficult to scroll. 🌟Editing option to avoid Miss slip edits while just reading the notes

I'm giving it 2 stars because of how easy it is to get a note started and to start typing away. However, as someone who's used this app now for a couple of years I have hundreds of notes saved and NO way to organize aside from "labels" and coloring. It makes it a very time consuming process to find the ONE note you're looking for. They have one extra folder to store notes and no way to create new folders and NO answer from Devs if it'll be added. It's a shame, I want to like this app.

This is app is wonderful. I use it for work with other staff members to add items we may need to purchase it fix and for personal grocery lists and such. Lately, I have been trying to figure out a way to turn off the bar that pops up across a note that say "33 items left". It is a new issue and pretty annoying as it blocks my view of my list while I'm trying to add items. Any way to fix this? I have a Samsung Galaxy Note. Thank you

title: ColorNote Notepad Notes
description:
ColorNote® is a simple and awesome notepad app. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and to-do lists. Taking notes with ColorNote® Notepad is easier than any other notepad or memo pad app.

* Notice *
- If you cannot find the widget, then please read the FAQ below.
- When you're finished using the notepad, an automatic save command preserves your individual note.

* Product Description *
ColorNote® features two basic note taking formats, a lined-paper styled text option, and a checklist option. Add as many as you want to your master list, which appears on the app's home screen each time the program opens. This list may be viewed in traditional ascending order, in grid format, or by note color.

- Taking a Note -
Serving as a simple word processing program, the text option allows for as many characters as you're willing to type. Once saved, you can edit, share, set a reminder, or check off or delete the note through your device's menu button. When checking off a text note, the app places a slash through the list's title, and this will be displayed on the main menu.

- Making To-do List or Shopping List -
In the checklist mode, you can add as many items as you'd like and arrange their order with drag buttons activated in the edit mode. After the list is finished and saved, you may check or uncheck each line on your list with a quick tap, which will toggle a line slash. If all items have been checked, then the list's title is slashed as well.


* Features *
- Organize notes by color (color notebook)
- Sticky note memo widget (Put your notes on your home screen)
- Checklist notes for To do list & Shopping list. (Quick and simple list maker)
- Checklist notes to get things done (GTD)
- Organize your schedule by note in calendar
- Write a diary and journal in calendar
- Password Lock note : Protect your notes with passcode
- Secured backup notes to SD storage
- Supports online back up and sync. You can sync notes between phone and tablet.
- Reminder notes on status bar
- List/Grid View
- Search notes
- Notepad supports ColorDict Add-on
- Powerful task reminder : Time Alarm, All day, Repetition.(lunar calendar)
- Quick memo / notes
- Wiki note link : [[Title]]
- Share notes via SMS, e-mail or Twitter

* Online backup and sync cloud service *
- Notes will be encrypted before uploading notes by using the AES standard, which is the same encryption standard used by banks to secure customer data.
- It does not send any of your notes to the server without you signing in.
- Sign-in with Google or Facebook.

* Permissions *
- Internet Access: For online backup & sync notes
- Storage :  For backup notes to the storage of the device
- Prevent phone from sleeping, control vibrator, automatically start at boot: For reminder notes

* FAQ *
Q: How do you put a sticky note widget on the home screen?
A: Go to the home screen and hold down your finger on an empty space and choose widget, Color Note will then be desplayed so you can stick on the page. 

Q: Why don't the widget, the alarm and notes remider functions work?
A: If the app is installed on the SD card, your widget, reminder, etc. will not work properly because Android doesn't support these features when installed on an SD card! If you have already moved the app to an SD card, but want those features, then you have to move the app back on the device and reboot your phone.

Settings - Applications - Manage Applications - Color Note - Move to Device

Q: Where are backed up notes data on the SD card?
A: '/data/colornote' or '/Android/data/com.socialnmobile.dictapps.notepad.color.note/files' on SD card 

Q: I forgot my master password. How can I change it?
A: Menu → Settings → Master Password → Menu Button → Clear Password. You will lose your current locked notes when you clear the password!

Q: How can I create todo list note?
A: New - Select checklist note - Put items - Save. Tap an item to strikethrough.

comments: Used to be my absolute fave note app for years.Recommended it to loads of people. Sadly, they've recently made some change to the app and it no longer works on PC. I loved being able to sync across my phone and PC, keep track of lists, type out long blog posts/etc on my PC to copy and paste on my phone (save my thumbs!). But the loss of functionality on my PC is just making the app so much less of my go-to. I'll be trying to find something to replace it that does have PC sync options. But I have years of notes and lists on this app that I'll either lose or have to manually copy and paste elsewhere. Super disappointing. If all you have is Android devices, I guess it's probably still a decent app, but if you want to sync across other things, you're out of luck.

This is a fast and efficient note program. I can quickly jot something down and it has reminders. I use it to keep copies of often used text to copy & paste. You can color code notes like categories and sort them that way. I have pages of word docs that I store, so it holds a lot. You can also use it to make image notes, but I don't need to do that. It's cross platform so I can access my notes on my phone or tablet. Not so good with Windows. Overall It works great for me and recommend it.

Notes does just what I want/need w/o the bells and whistles. If you simple need notes that "stick around" it is far superior to a wall full of sticky notes (way old school). I will admit, it is a cross over for those of us that went through figuring out how best to keep track of notes/tasks. For you more modern guys that can keep it all in memory, it is simply redundant. 😉

I've used it for a long time, but there are some things that I wish could be done with it. For example, making a gridded list. Similar to excel, but more straight forward to use. So that specific information about stuff could easily compared to one another without needing to go to another note. I prefer using digital notepads over real ones, but if you want to do literally anything besides type words, this one can't do it.

I use this app daily for things like grocery lists and household tasks. Since I don't have much free memory on my cell phone I love that this app can be stored on a SD card. I enjoy customizing the looks of my lists and this app lets me choose the colors of my lists. I just wish hot pink or fuschia was a color option. It would be awesome if there were different color options with images. For example, there could be a space image color theme.

title: QR Code Scanner for Android: QR Reader, QR Creator
description:
Scan codes quickly and generate QR codes with many professional logo and drawing effects for your work

💡 Are you looking for a fast and user-friendly Application without paying for Barcode and QR Scanner?

📣 QR Code Scanner & QR Editor is a free and most user-friendly Reader and QR Code Creator App that quickly recognizes the information of the QR code, Barcode.

📣 To scan any QR code or Barcode, simply launch the App and allow access to your phone camera, pointing the camera at the code. The scan will automatically recognize any barcodes or QR codes your camera is aimed at. Or you can use the QR and Barcode scanning feature from the image on the phone.

📣 Once the scanning is complete, if the code just contains text, it will display immediately; if it includes a website URL, you will be automatically redirected to the site, thus, ensure your data is turned on if internet access is needed. While formats such as contact info, phone numbers, email addresses, you will be prompted to take the Appropriate action.

*** Features of QR Code Scanner - Barcode Reader:

✅  Generate QR codes with many types such as email, contacts, messages, wifi codes, links ...
✅  Generate various types of barcodes such as EAN 13, EAN 8, UPC, Code 39, Code 93, Code 128, and more.
✅  Easily create your own modified and personalized QR codes, Barcode with your information.
✅  Automatically recognize QR code the moment the phone’s camera is pointed on the Barcode.
✅  Also, use the front camera for scanning and support flashlight in case of low light.
✅  Share by different social networks like email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter, or WhatsApp ...
✅  Creates and view the history list and map of all of past scan.
✅  Optimize the scan settings to your needs.

- If you have any questions or issues you want to fix, please use the Feedback feature in the App.

- Your 5-stars rating makes us feel proud to let us have the motivation to make more best free Application.

Thanks!

Ads are a pain, but it still works well..

title: Okta Verify
description:
Okta Verify is a lightweight app that allows you to securely access your apps via 2-step verification, ensuring that you, and only you, can access your app accounts.

While you access your apps, you’ll choose a 2-step verification method provided by Okta Verify to finish signing in. You can verify your identity using a push notification sent to your device (if enabled by your organization), a temporary 6-digit code, or biometrics (if enabled by your organization). 

We do request permission to use your device camera so that you can scan a QR code when you enroll your device with Okta.

App Features

Register your device with one or more Okta accounts that require Okta Verify for verification. 
Enroll your device in Okta to enable 2-factor verification using 6-digit one-time passcode.
Enroll your device in Okta for 2-factor verification using push notifications (if enabled by your organization).
Enroll on-device biometrics to use to sign in to an app (if enabled by or organization).
Add 2-factor verification for non-Okta apps that support or require the use of one-time passcodes.
Note: Some functionality is available only if enabled by your IT organization. For more information, check Okta Verify docs at - https://help.okta.com/en/prod/end-user/Content/Topics/end-user/ov-overview.htm?cshid=csh-user-ov-overview.

summary: Okta MFA
comments: I can't close the app with the back button, need to hit the home button. Also, couldn't use the app to scan until I hit the Google Play Review button, so here's your one star. Thanks!

UX is not the best I have seen compared to other similar app. When you approve a notification, Okta close the whole android notification curtain instead of just removing/updating the Okta notification. Also in the notification, the dismiss and validate actions are in the reverse order of what is customary on Android (and of what other similar app I use are using). On Android, dismissive actions are on the left and affirmative/validation actions are on the right.

You have to open the app to verify it's you and doesn't show notifications even though the app has full permission. The app doesn't even allow you to preview it's screen in multi task mode, neither does it support split screen, or taking screenshot which makes it very difficult to use when you have to switch between the apps.
The app is very slow compared to VIP access, which uses to work instantly. With Okta there is a delay of 10 to 15 seconds for receiving the notification and reaction on the Site.

Love the app got no issues, works with about every TOTP app out there, not just Okta. Since I required Okta for work I mode all my other ones ( where possible) into this to only have 1 app for all MFA QR code provider and push verification. Fairly simple. Although that said the simplicity is also why I am only giving it 3 stars, there are like ZERO options for configuration, can we have maybe a compact option or custom layout. And where is the DARK mode ????

title: Zillow Rental Manager
description:
Save time with everything you need to fill your vacancy — from listing to leasing — all in one place. Our easy-to-use tools let you list your property where over 34M visitors search each month. Once you find a renter, you can screen them and collect rent, entirely online.

Key Features:

• Add, edit and publish your rental listings

• Set your rent price

• Add unlimited photos

• Receive notifications as soon as a renter asks about your property and message them in the app

• Accept rental applications

• Get verifiable information about your applicant upfront, such as income and credit score

* Collect online rent payments

comments: Once you set it up I think the problems are minor. I had difficulty with typing description under each photo. The message box there kept disappearing and it would flash with every keystroke. You could type the a whole sentence and it would not appear for a bit. It was very unstable. I was using i a windows laptop. Took forever then the captions are no visible on the phone app. IAlso had problems up loading photos on my Android phone. I could only add 1 picture at a time.very time consuming
great app. I will admit I was taken aback when billing started on listings but I understand; its business
Best rental app for house owners. Interface is awesome and easy to communicate with potential renters via the app.

It's a good first start. We have 7 rental homes that we have used Zillow over the last 5 years to find tenants. Not surprised that it moved to a fee based service.. What I like: Screening candidates. Cross advertising (Hotpads...) What I don't like: Very difficult to track who you have contacted No canned responses. Only setup to accept tenants not deny, 90% of our applicants don't meet our minimum requirements. Have to pay for the service Need single point of contact for multiple applicants
Well organized, great features... easy to figure out.

comments: This wix app is amazing! It's very easy to use with no coding and you can publish it straight away!!!! The only issue I have is opening up the website. I can't go into the website!!!! I was so excited to use it but now I can't even go into it!!!!! It's so disappointing for all my hard work. I hope one day I can make this a 5-star review! And please fix this I beg you!!!!!

The ap isn't working properly, when making an order, it isn't being saved in orders, nor an email is being sent to confirm, so can't keep track of the order. Also no reply in the chat screen. The ap has potential to be good when it works.

My one issue is that you have to pay so much to sell items. I think you should be able to sell items for free and wix should only take about 10% from sales. That would seem more fair instead of paying over $20 to sell stuff.

From the business I desired to follow, Spaces was advertised, "Never miss a new posting (ie. inventory). Join us on the app!" Not sure if it's the fault of the business I'm following, or the app itself? But I've seen no advantage here, in fulfillment of what was advertised. Notifications are hit and miss at best, and never quick enough to give me a shot at new inventory being offered, before others snatch it up! The app does allow better, direct communication with the business.
Why is the app not saving any info about the owner. It says to try again later. Please get it to work. My Internet connection is working fine.

title: File Manager
description:
File Manager + is an easy and powerful file explorer for Android devices. It’s free, fast and full-featured. Because of its simple UI, it’s extremely easy to use. You can easily manage storages on your device, NAS(Network-attached storage), and cloud storages. What’s more, you can find how many files & apps you have on your device at a glance immediately after opening the app.
 
It supports every file management action (open, search, navigate directory, copy and paste, cut, delete, rename, compress, decompress, transfer, download, bookmark, and organize) for various file formats including media and apk.
 
Major locations and functions of File Manager Plus are as following:

• Main Storage / SD card / USB OTG : You can manage all files and folders on both your internal storage and external storage.

• Downloads / New files / Images / Audio / Videos / Documents : Your files and folders are automatically sorted by their types and characteristics so that you can easily find what you are looking for.

• Apps : You can see and manage all applications installed on your local device.

• Cloud / Remote : You can access your cloud storage and also remote/shared storage like NAS and FTP server. (Cloud storage: Google Drive™, OneDrive, Dropbox, Box, and Yandex)

• Access from PC : You can access your android device storage from PC using FTP(File Transfer Protocol).

• Storage analysis : You can analyze local storages to clean up useless files. You can find out which files and apps take up the most space.

• Internal image viewer / Internal music player/ Internal text editor : You can choose to use built-in utilities for faster and better performance.

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I strongly recommend this app to anyone accustomed to IOS and trying to get used to Android. It will do all the things IOS does behind the scenes or through the iTunes interface. Until I found this app I was lost. Also it has a very efficient home screen that displays all the categories of files on your phone with very nice looking icons. For anyone using a laptop to add files to their mobile device and moving them to where they need to reside this is a great app!

Just a "cool" program. I did not expect anything like this. Thought out everything to the smallest detail. DEVELOPERS THANK YOU VERY MUCH. recommend for download and installation. It works very smartly. The functionality is complete. Works with memory cards, supports usb OTG, works great with "cloud" services ..... I don't even know what it can't ... In my opinion, the best program in its profile .... Very intuitive. All the stars are YOU developers ...

I purchased the "One Time Payment" version. I have it installed on my One-Plus 8T and love it. I also have on my Samsung Tablet and I'm disappointed. The one feature that I find most useful is the ability to "Add to Home Screen" function. This works great on the One-Plus but the option is not there on the Samsung Tablet. I would return the Premium version if I could.

I don't normally do reviews on apps, the app has to be impressive for me to leave a review. This app is awesome. It's easy to understand, easy to navigate and find your document or pictures, etc. No ads in your face so it leaves you alone and I love it a lot. It's never let me down and it doesn't bug me. And it allows me to DELETE my pictures as opposed to google photos. This is a great app. And that is why I am leaving this 5 star review.

Awesome app, makes it very easy and convenient to find things if you're not as technological or tech challenged like alot of people are to find certain types of files especially with a search box right above and gives you a vast array of results to your search not just exactly for what you have searched for. For some people this way works great and for others not so much, but for me I love this app and if there were more developed similarly to it I would be the first to download them.

title: Wix Owner: Website Builder
description:
Use the Wix Owner app to build, customize and manage your website and mobile app experience for your business's customers and community. It's an easy-to-use website building app that will help you create & manage your online presence, wherever you are.
 Over 200 million people worldwide choose the Wix website builder to create their professional online presence. 

Whether your goal is to start a blog, build an online store, or create a portfolio website, you can do it all using Wix’s powerful website-building tools.

✅ Build a Website to Grow Your Brand:
* Create a website for any of your interests - whether it be a travel blog, professional portfolio, or ecommerce site 
* Choose the perfect website template from 1K+ options
* Upload videos, pictures, content & blog posts
* Manage a professional web presence, zero coding required
* Grow your business with powerful marketing tools - create email marketing campaigns, share social posts and create videos to promote your brand

✅ Manage your Brand On The Go:

comments: This app is great but there are a few minor issues with the app. The pros to the app is that you have instant access to any analytics and any orders you may have. The problem is that the app doesn't always load with an Android. The restaurant orders tab will sometimes just get stuck in a loading screen and I've had to uninstall it a few times to get it working again. Also, the app is a batter eater. After only having the app open for a few minutes at a time my batter will go down by over half.

It deserved a 5 star rating at the beginning, for me being a first time blogger & the fact I still have No spam from my setup email. TY! Then, it began to just throw me to the Spaces app which would freeze up completely, it did this 10 separate times, for approx 5 minutes each time. I just gave up and uninstalled for a week. I reinstalled today & found my password would not work...so reset my password, no probs. I live alone, no one has access to my phone, I have excellent virus protection.

Hi there are a lot of bugs hopefully this gets fixed in the updates. For instance, I am not able click on Bold or Italics while typing in my blog. The second one is the most annoying one. Whatever I typed, will disappear just like that and whatever I had typed 10 min before will be present. I think this is some sort of server sync issue.

Fantastic app, I'm impressed! Worked so well, I switched my domain from on to another. Thanks Wix. One thing I must add though, I am skilled in web development...haha. But for those with no skills, the plug and play is supremely easy. I do most my editing from my Android device, if that helps? So yes, awesome for a newbie! Even better for a pro, fantastic for a hacker (did I get my terminology correct? From mouth of Minecraft babes as my 7 year old would say). 'Your a newb w/ Minecraft mom'.

This was easy for me to use before, but since the changes were made my readers are prompted to download the app instead of just viewing. If I share an individual post they can opt to use the website, but when I share my wix site thats when they have to download or not go on. Also, may just be a temp glitch but the app is freezing. I get on it fine but if I click on a post it won't load. I can't build subscribers if its a hassle for them..

title: Google Tasks

Quickly capture tasks anywhere

Add details and create subtasks

View tasks created from emails

Stay on track with due dates and notifications

• Receive due date notification reminders to keep your tasks on track

Part of G Suite
• Bring Google's suite of powerful, intelligent apps to your business
• Leverage Google’s AI to bring data insights and analysis to every employee
• Connect with your team seamlessly using one suite: Gmail, Tasks, Calendar & more

Take control of your task management and install the Google Tasks mobile app. Start easily managing your to-do list on the go with the Tasks planner app from Google.
descriptionHTML:
Get more done with the Google Tasks mobile app. Manage, capture, and edit your tasks from anywhere, at anytime, with to-dos that sync across all your devices. Integrations with Gmail and Google Calendar help you get tasks done—faster.

Quickly capture tasks anywhere
• Create task lists with your most important to-dos
• View, edit, and manage tasks on the go, from any device
• Manage tasks created in Gmail or Calendar on the web from your mobile device

Add details and create subtasks
• Break down your tasks to subtasks
• Add details about the work you need to focus on
• Edit details about any task as your work progresses

View tasks created from emails
• Create a task directly from an email in Gmail
• View your tasks in the side panel of Gmail
• Trace a task back to its source email

Stay on track with due dates and notifications
• Set a due date for every task to help you achieve your goals
• Organize your tasks by date or prioritize using drag-and-drop
• Receive due date notification reminders to keep your tasks on track

Part of G Suite
• Bring Google's suite of powerful, intelligent apps to your business
• Leverage Google’s AI to bring data insights and analysis to every employee
• Connect with your team seamlessly using one suite: Gmail, Tasks, Calendar & more

Take control of your task management and install the Google Tasks mobile app. Start easily managing your to-do list on the go with the Tasks planner app from Google.
summary: Simply create any task or subtask. Integrated with Gmail for easy collaboration
developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges:
• Easily create a new task by long-pressing on the app icon
• Create a task by sharing from other apps
• General improvements and bug fixes
comments: Great app. Can repeat every day and will show up on your Google calendar if you want. You can set your own custom amount of reminders I the settings and all new tasks will automatically have those reminders. I like checking them off. Once they're checked off, they're still on a list below that you can find and reactivate. You can create subtasks. I would like to be able to set reminders hourly, however, for things like taking medicine or drinking water.

Pretty good. The link with Google Calendar is great, as is the ability to create different categories of task and to set different dates and times for subtasks. Two things that would make this nearly perfect in my view: (1) A separate standalone app for pc use, since the sidebar thing is extra clicks to get to and a computer screen is better for seeing the whole picture at once, and (2) the ability to set different colours to appear on the calendar (perhaps for different categories of task).

Gets the job done. Wish there was more list functionality. Ideally the ability to set deadlines with reminders would be fantastic. As well as the ability to change or choose how you get notified about tasks. The ability to share a task list and have it edited by multiple parties would also be useful.

This app needs more options and more control. When you make a task with subtasks it just lumps everything as tasks so the list ends up the same as any other list, no way to collapse it or know which sub items belong to which main task. It's nice that tasks can be assigned a date but the fact that the tasks are not removed after they have been checked off from calender is annoying. My calendar will have old tasks that I have already checked off and yet they still remain striked through on calenda

I *really* want to love this app and make it a part of my daily productivity. The integration with Google Calendar and the ability to create tasks from an email (in Gmail) are game changers for me, however there are two deal breakers: [1] There is no integration with the Google Assistant. This is a surprising oversight given that you can add everything else with your voice (Calendar Events, Reminders, Notes, etc). I have too many use cases where I need to add Tasks with my voice from either my phone, Google Home, or Android Auto. [2] There is no ability to share task lists with other Google users*. I need to share lists with my household (grocery lists, chores, house projects, etc). *Yes, I know there are services that will do this for you but it should be a native feature.

comments: Haven't had much time to evaluate this app, but 1) The UI is impressive, 2) As is the support for importing photos, and 3) The list of features. However, the latter does NOT belong under the heading 'What's New'! I'm sure I'm not the only one who actually reads the 'What's New' section, which other Devs manage to use to communicate with (potential) users re new/enhanced features, issue/stability fixes, etc.

I really like the concept and idea behind this app. The one thing I don't like is the stop of my audio when I open the app while listening to music. This may because of the ads 😅. I do not mind the banner ads since they don't interfere with my doing but I don't like the pop ups. For better earning I think it's better to make an ad to unlock a certain feature. Like I want to make use a VIP template. Maybe I can unlock by watching an ad. If I want to use the template again I gotta unlock again.

I like this app better than the regular one, but this app you have to pay for items. It's not free as advertised. There are many things you can due for free, but most of everything else comes with a subscription. Which is $29.99 for life!! Not bad right??? Well everything I want to use like auto save, auto back up, and many other similar things all have to be done on a subscription. Which at this very moment today I can't pay for. Not today anyways. It does have some nice features!!

It's an ok app, although most of the features are only available for VIP members, & there are more ads than I'd prefer. Overall it's not horrible, but you might be able to find better, simpler note-apps out there ☺️

This app is the worst.. I created notes on it , it had pictures also. I worked so hard when it was created finally, I tried to share the assignment with teacher, but guess what ... It said you can only share text, or picture or snapshot ... It said to upgrade to premium to make the pdf My whole hardwork was wasted.. I wish this app gets downvotes..

title: Cleanup Duplicate Contacts - Updated Contacts
description:
Cleanup Duplicate Contacts app will automatically suggest contact updates if any of the contacts in your address book have any changes in their contact information such as phone, work email, company, job title, location etc. The Updates are powered by our proprietary and secure AI Engine which discovers when important connection details change in your address book, and surfaces new contact info or updates so no contact information in your contact book becomes outdated. 
 
This mobile app runs automatically but you will stay in control. Before scanning your contacts, you can configure the merge level: only detect 100% matches or also detect several kinds of partial matching. After that, it will run a scan to check for all duplicate contacts. Once the scan is complete, it will present you with the results. You can then choose to remove all matching contacts from your address book or to merge only a sub-selection of the duplicates found.
 
We let you analyse your address book as many times as you need for free. Also, the full preview of duplicates and partial duplicates is free as we want to convince you of the power of our deduplication algorithm.
 
After you’ve had a chance to review the suggested merges and we convince you that our algorithm does a great job, you'll be prompted to upgrade to the premium version. Once you upgrade the app once, you will be able to save later analysis results for free as often as you want.
 
Merging contacts happens automatically. All partially matching contact details will be merged under just one contact for better management. The contact management App also works flawlessly with multiple sources like Gmail and Outlook to keep all duplicate contacts centralised.
 
-- Cleanup Duplicate Contacts App Features --
# Instant Cleanup of Duplicate Contacts
# Choose the merge-level you need
# Very fast - 5000 contacts centralized in about 45 seconds
# Automatic contact update suggestions 
# Detailed reports of scanned results
# Automatic merging of duplicate contacts
# Manages multiple contact sources like Gmail and Outlook
# Creates a backup of your address book before cleaning
# Lets you easily restore backups or a part of a backup
# Save and export contacts from your phone as a .CSV file
 
The Cleanup Duplicate Contacts app will clean up your mobile address book within seconds and you'll be amazed. This app is the ultimate contact cleaner.
 
*****Awesome Customer Support*****
 
If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at support@circleback.com

CONTACT
More help:
For more information please visit https://circleback.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/categories/201880903-CleanUp-Dupes-FAQs or email us at support@circleback.com 

We love talking to our users! Feel free to send us any questions or suggestions you have!
Love what we’ve done? We’re just getting started :)
Rate us in Google Play!

Got suggestions or issues? Email: support@circleback.com

title: TeamViewer QuickSupport
description:
Get support for your mobile device from any Windows or Mac computer! You can now receive technical remote support for your mobile devices. Technicians have the ability to chat, transfer files back and forth, view device information, stop processes, push and pull Wi-Fi settings, and much more.

It is even possible for your device (Samsung, Sony*, Asus, Lenovo, HTC, LG, ZTE, Huawei, Alcatel One Touch / TCL and more) to be remotely controlled, allowing the technician to access your device as if it were in their own hands. 

Features: 
•	Chat
•	View device information
•	Remote Control
•	File transfer
•	App list (Uninstall apps)
•	Process list (Stop processes)
•	Push and pull Wi-Fi settings
•	View system diagnostic information
•	Real-time screenshot of the device 
•	Store confidential information into the device clipboard
•	Secured connection with 256 Bit AES Session Encoding

It has never been easier to troubleshoot devices! 

Quick Guide: 
1. Download and launch the app. 
2. The other side, (e.g. the support technician), needs to install and start the TeamViewer full version on his/her computer (download at www.teamviewer.com).
3. Pass your ID on to your trusted technician, who is using the TeamViewer full version.

* Sony devices require the Device Administrator permission.

comments: For some reason they make it super complicated to connect to another person's phone, I don't understand how it's so hard to just make a quick connect button that doesn't require any prompts, I use this to help my grandmother with her phone but so far it's worked 1 of the 10 times I've tried it, there's no way I'd ever pay for any premium service if the free one is trash. The prompt gives her 3 different options even though it should just be "yes" or "no" which confuses her.

I'm sure this app has legitimate uses, but it really should be removed from the store. Way too many scammers use this to dupe unsuspecting victims. At the *very* least, the app should start with a *HUGE* as in full screen warning banner telling people to beware.
It's been a lot of months and I still can't update. Isn't this addon necessary anymore? Edit: a little edit could help a lot of users. Uninstall and reinstall helps as it seems.

I accidentally downloaded this app & u need to remove it from the play store bc once I read what it can do it's perfect for scammers. They get into install this then they have remote access to your phone

This application is being used to hack mobile by others. I have recorded call trying to get into mobile for accessing person info. If someone call and ask for access then please don't give them access. @google please don't give sms access features to developers.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Ideas and Organize Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Microsoft OneNote lets you take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate when you download Microsoft OneNote today. 

Capture Content And Get Organized
• Write notes, draw and clip things from the web to get your thoughts down into your notebook.
• Use OneNote’s flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want.
• Scan documents and business cards straight into OneNote.
• Save pictures and images to your notes.

Take Notes And Achieve More
• OneNote is a digital notebook that brings 3-ring binders to the digital era. 
• Organize notes with sections and pages to separate thoughts by theme at school, home or work.
• Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what’s important and custom labels.
• Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad.

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
• OneNote syncs your notes across all devices and lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time.
• Use the notepad to list your thoughts down whenever something crosses your mind.
• Notepad badge hovers on screen and lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time.
• Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos.

Collaborate and Share Notes
• Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, draw attention to important points and organize key resources.
• Collaborate in real time to stay in sync and on the same page.
• Take notes and save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use.
• Take notes during classes or meetings, mixing in text, voice, ink and web clippings.
• Search your notes with a fast and powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
• OneNote is part of the Office family and works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more.

Write notes, save ideas and keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
• Requires Android OS 5.0 or later.
• A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
• OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
• To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization’s Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft’s End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft’s privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement

summary: Powerful notepad to capture ideas & save notes. Easily organize & share notes
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: ﻿Thank you for using OneNote. We regularly update the app with great new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements. Please continue to share your feedback with us right in the app!
comments: Overall, I love OneNote because of the ease of using across multiple devices. I use both Android and IOS so I can compare the two. I'm very disappointed that the Apple app version is far more robust than the Android version - this is a fail. The Apple version is very close to the desktop version. Android version doesn't allow for pen or paper customizations nor can you select which notebook you want to "share" from a program/site, it only goes to Quick Note. Android should mirror IOS.

I love this app. Ive been looking for a note taking app for a little while. Most of the apps I have used, you can't highlight or strike through. The good thing with OneNote, I can share across my devices.. and I'm able to highlight my notes, edit, add a photo straight from the camera, add an attachment, make Bullet points, add a recording. It's a word processing program for my phone.

I love OneNote; very few apps are as useful to me as OneNote has become. If I had one gripe it would be that there's no way to set it to open my notebook on launch--it always defaults to "most recent. UPDATE: you can, sorta. You can put a shortcut on your home screen to a particular notebook.

This is the best. I am loving it. Just 2 suggestions. 1.A4 restriction (pls) - when I export all my notes into PDFs it becomes a disaster. Please make it with A4 restriction like notability and goodnotes 5. It will make it the best app for notetaking. 2. Include Draw shapes and lines feature on Android. I take my notes in S6 and it doesn't have those features in the list. It will be good if you add them. 3. Pointer - Actually Pointer in a notetaking app is so cool. Otherwise The app is 🔥🤩

Multiple interface and sync problems with this app. First of all, you can't select multiple notes at once to move them around/delete. The UI designer of this app must be some amature with no knowledge of it at all. Second of all, one of the notebooks suddenly stopped syncing at all and I can't see them anywhere on the web version of the app. Third of all, you can't move a whole section from one notebook to another. I mean, in what age are you living to not provide such a basic feature.

title: AppLock Pro - App Lock & Privacy Guard for Apps
description:
AppLock Pro is one of the most popular app locker that you can lock your apps or photos easily. 

Choose a lock model, lock apps you want. AppLock is the best way to prevent intruders who want to open your locked apps without your permission.

Your privacy is important for us. Keep your apps safe with this locking app!

FEATURES
★ Lock apps
Lock your private apps (WhatsApp, Instagram, Settings, Messages, Messenger, etc.)  with a password, fingerprint(if your device supports), pattern lock, or knock code.

★ Spy Camera
When someone tries to open your locked app, AppLock takes a selfie photo from the front camera and saves it.

★ Fake Error Message
You can set additional security precautions. If you activate this setting; when locked apps are tried to be opened a fake error message is shown.

★ Hide Notifications
AppLock blocks notification of locked apps if you activate this feature.

★ AppLock Lock Timer
You can set the timer to make AppLock inactive in a certain time period.

★ Re-Lock Time
You can set re-lock time to make AppLock active. 

★ Spy Alarm?
If a password is entered incorrectly 5 times, the spy alarm will be ringing loudly.

★ Customize
You can customize the theme and background style. You can choose an image from the gallery for the background.

★ Other Advanced Features
Vibration, Line visibility, System status, New App Alert, Lock recent Apps Menu. AppLock is optimized for battery and ram usage. Also, you can use AppLock without ads at a low price.

LOCK TYPES
★ Fingerprint Lock (If Your Device Support)
Fingerprint lock for your locked apps. It works if your device supports fingerprint!

★ KnockCode Lock
It is a different and powerful lock system.

★ Pattern Lock
Create a pattern by combining points.

★ Pin Lock
Create a 4-8 digit password.

▶ FAQ
★ How can I prevent AppLock to be uninstalled?
Firstly you should lock all critical apps. Secondly, you should activate "Hide Icon" in the preferences tab.

★ Why permissions are required? 
AppLock contains advanced features. All necessary permissions are required to implement advanced features. For example, "Photos / Media / Files Permissions" is required to select a background image.

★ What should I do if I forget my password?
You can set a new password by using your secret answer.

★ How can I hide pictures and videos?
If you lock the Gallery app then, intruders can not see your photos and videos.

★ How works the spy camera feature?
When the intruder enters the password incorrectly 5 times, the secret answer screen is shown. After answering the secret answer, a photo from the front camera is taken & saved to the gallery.

comments: Never had issues after few months of usage. Glad something like this exists. UI is very clean and not clutter which makes it even easier for a new consumer to navigate and locate it's full features. I don't have any sort of ads which is even better.

This app is great but their is one thing that gets on my nerves, when you choose a theme for your background, there is always an ad that pops on it so therefore you cant enjoy the wallpaper you set properly.

It sometimes shows the app it's drawing over for a brief moment. This is a big privacy issue that should be worked on. Aside from that, it does its job and the interface is user-friendly and nice to look at.

This application is just very terrible and doesn't even deserve 5/100 not to talk of a 1 Star sef. It claims it locks apps but fails to do any of it's promises. I terribly regret downloading this that i had to ensure to come write my review. Those giving 5 stars are hypocrites and paid liars. Nawa oh!
This is the best app lock I've ever used but when i open the app It'll be a bit laggy and sometimes the app crashes. And the ads is a bit laggy. I hope this app can be smoother.

title: Cloud: Free Photo Storage. Video & Photo Backup
description:
Cloud Mail.ru for Android - a free service for saving photos, videos, music, presentations, documents and other files.

With Cloud Mail.ru all your photos will always be at hand. Upload your files to your cloud drive and they will automatically be available on all your devices.

* Upload photos from your mobile phone. Adjust the automatic "save to disk" in your cloud Camera Uploads. In order to save bandwidth, it is recommended to perform downloads while connected to a Wi-Fi.

* Free up space on your device: all your images are already saved in the Cloud.

* Share files and folders with friends and colleagues in just one click.

* Save bandwidth - you can send a link to a image, video or document by SMS, e-mail, instant messenger or through a social network.

* Cloud Mail.ru for Android allows you to watch videos (including the most popular video formats: avi, mkv, mp4, mov, wmv) and listen to music. Cloud can play a video file without downloading it on the device. Still available ability to open a video into an external player.

* Manage your files from anywhere - rename, delete, move them between folders.

* Create shared folders with other users, add any files together. Use shared folders with friends to collect photos from party or travelling. Work with documents in groups, using shared folder with colleagues. Collect and share family memories - all family members can add photos and videos in a shared album.

* Keep your important files in a safe storage location! No matter what happens to your drive on your PC or phone, all your files stored in the Cloud will stay intact.

* You can increase your Cloud storage. List of plans is located in the application side-bar.

* The Cloud Mail.ru app is available for Android smartphones and tablets.

* You do not need any wires, flash drives and memory cards. All you need is the app Cloud Mail.ru and internet connection.

The application has been tested and is compatible with Android version 4.0 and later.

comments: This app doesn't seem to work at all. When I tried to upload files it would upload. It kept showing that the upload progress was at 0 bytes out of however many kilobytes I was trying to upload. This app seems to be from a Russian developer, which is suspicious to say the least in light of recent cyber attacks. The app doesn't seem to completely translate into English. Not to mention, the interface seems a bit wonky and out of date, which reiterates my initial suspicion, that it's a backdoor.

I wanted extra storage, thought it was ok, until I see all my cat pictures on a Facebook story lookalike page, comments in Russian on every pic, I think this is a way to hack into our devices. And the map of the world with your exact location, not liking that AT ALL. I deleted a Russian app I found in the folder with extra apps on the site. A folder with pics of me and my cats. I'm deleting all the pictures clearing the app data and uninstalling it!
No ads ! Perfect!! This means I don't get distracted from what I am doing! Hence a completed task & a more focused Vicki! All good!!!
This is a great app and will recommend to anyone. I sihned in and found pictures that I thought I had lost them all.
Definitely deserves five stars, very complete, everything you need for your valuable fotos, highly recommended

title: AVG Cleaner – Junk Cleaner, Memory & RAM Booster
description:
With AVG Cleaner, your Android device will run faster and smoother, store more data, free up memory by cleaning junk, and stay charged for longer. AVG Cleaner is a smart device manager & optimization tool that has let nearly 50 million people worldwide master their devices.

AVG Cleaner top features:
✔ Uninstall Updates of Preinstalled Apps: replace preinstalled bloatware apps you don't use with factory versions to save space
✔ Get more space - Remove junk files, uninstall apps, and delete bad or unwanted photos and videos
✔ Improve performance - Use Cleaner to clear cache, remove junk, and identify apps that are slowing down your device (RAM Cleaner & memory booster)
✔ Longer battery life - Cleaner's battery saving feature helps improve your device's battery life
✔ Hibernate apps - Suspend background apps to prolong battery life and save mobile data
✔ System info - Everything you need to know about your phone on one screen
✔ File manager - Smart File Manager & Storage Cleaner can analyze pictures, files, and apps to help you maximize your Android device's performance
✔ Junk Cleaner - Clean out any useless junk from your device e.g. cache and app data

With AVG Cleaner, you will enjoy a longer battery life, avoid a lagging Android device, get rid of junk files, and automatically find bad quality or duplicate photos

comments: I have used AVG on my last 3 Android phones and have had no bad experience. I would recommend anyone to try it, as it works well, has kept my phones free from harmful issues cleaning up cache, freeing up space and the notifications let you know that it's got you covered or what issues are to be looked at. It is ever so easy to use. From my point of view it does what it says on the tin so to speak, but each to there own personal experiences and opinions, I'm happy to give it 5⭐s and a👍s up

I hate to say iy. This was the last chance for this cleaner. I no longer recommend getting this cleaner. It works to the point of placing ads on your phone that you can not clear unless you turn off your phone and restart the phone.. I was using the free app but with this problem. I do not recommend paying for it eather. I am removing this app for good.

My experience both today and a good 95% of the previous times and indeed still now in the present, this very enjoyable app has & given me & I'm very sure it will continue to give me the same level of enjoyment for the foreseeable future, natureably I recommend this excellent security app to everyone if it is indeed the best security you are looking for ok. Do your best & prove me WRONG!!. This app deserves 10 gold stars.

great app that works to help keep your device clean and running smoothly.I have this app on all my devices n it is free and there are very little ads to deal with. would recommend anyone else download as well n use regularly. Update: I have recently bought the yearly subscription for the premium cleaning app and will be informing you of any and all concerns, problems, or good things about the app once I try it out. It was only $11.99 per year n that's for the cleaner app only. Pretty cheap!

Update: This app does NOT get five stars, because updating my apps via APK Pure prompts an obsolescence message. Every time I tap the button to delete "obsolete" APK, my apps get ruined! | AVG Cleaner got rid of junk files on my phone and freed up some space for me. Yet the app is missing one option that would make it complete: the ability to skip stopping background processes. If I don't want to stop background apps/processes, then I should be able to deselect those items and press "skip." |

title: S’more - Earn Cash Rewards
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS APP IS FOR THE USE OF CUSTOMERS IN THE UNITED STATES ONLY

S'more is a lockscreen rewards app that allows you to earn points in exchange for us placing ads and content on your lockscreen. Every day we'll give you points in exchange for having the S'more lockscreen installed, and regardless of how many times you see it, you'll have points added to your account. Just use your phone normally, and get paid. Want to earn even more? You can also complete offers, play games and use the refer a friend feature to get more points. Once you've earned points you'll be able to redeem them for gift cards from retailers including Amazon, Walmart, Target, CVS, GameStop, Starbucks and more. Last step? Spend that lockscreen cash!




Here's how it Works:


Earn Points
•We'll show you relevant content and ads on your lockscreen.
•To dismiss the ad and access your phone, simply swipe up. To learn more, tap the ad.
•You earn points every day regardless of the number of ads you see or click on.
•Redeem your points for gift cards from retailers, then spend that lockscreen cash!


Bonus Offers
•Offers include free trials, app downloads and videos.
•Complete offers in order to earn points.


Refer and Earn
•Use the refer a friend feature to get additional points by sharing a referral link and code.
•When your friends and family sign up, they receive an additional point bonus.
•After they’ve used S'more for 10 days and are eligible to redeem their own points, you'll receive a 25 point bonus!
•You can refer as many friends and family members as you like.


We're working hard to be the easiest lockscreen rewards program. We'll give you points every single day that you have our app installed. That's it, no catch. As long as you use S'more, you WILL get points that you can redeem for gift cards. 


To earn points, you DO NOT need to learn more about every ad or try to see as many ads as you can. Continue to use your lockscreen the way you normally do. You won't earn more for viewing as many ads as you can. Our sponsors and advertisers like it this way and we hope that you do too.


The App thay Pays You
To sum it all up, S'more is a way to get paid for something you're already doing: unlocking your phone. We reward you for allowing us to show you relevant content and ads on your lockscreen, making S'more the easiest way to make money using your phone. So if you're looking for a way to get free cash, look no further.




FAQs
Will this app drain my battery?
Nope, we've optimized the app so that it will use the least amount of battery possible.
How do I get paid?
When you redeem, we'll send you an email with a redemption code for your gift card. No waiting for the mail.
When will I be able to redeem points for gift cards?
For your first redemption, you'll need to wait 10 days after installing, but after that you'll be able to redeem anytime you have enough points for a reward.
What Gift Cards are Available?
Gift Cards are available for Amazon.com, AMC Theaters, Applebee’s, Best Buy, CVS, Domino's Pizza, GameStop, Starbucks, Target and more!.


Emoji icons provided free by EmojiOne

comments: Had nearly 1700 points removed suddenly and without warning. I've used the app for 2+ years. I've always had the lockscreen ads on my phone. At some point they stopped showing up, once I noticed I opened the app checked out my settings and lockscreen was on so I turned it off and back on. Ads started showing up again. My account still showed almost 1700 points. Today I noticed my account showing 100 points. I'd been logged out. Logged in and found points expired in July. C. support won't help.

This app was awesome. Right up until I was force logged out & all my points "expired". No warning, no "oh hey we changed something, use b4 they are gone". While being logged out after an update happens occasionally w/ apps, I hadnt had that problem here before, nor have points "expired". Dont waste your time.

pretty neato app. you can't redeem any gift cards until after 10 days. Ive had this app for 10 days today and have a total of 1893 points ($18.93). It only took 1 day to get 1100ish. (I played a couple of the games haha) just redeemed my first $10 Amazon card. Going to go play a couple more games to redeem another $10

Honestly had Google play store still been a redeem, I'd have rated it 5 star as a legit way to have some premium for ftp mobile games here and there. But now I have almost no reason to keep it outside of the off chance that they return the Google play store redemption. I'll keep it installed till then.

I love the app, everything checks out however i would really like a google play gift card option. i believe it used to have the option however it got removed later... also the game play rewards change alot and it gave me 19 points for 39 minutes on the mafia game right after it used to be 4 mins for 19?

title: LastPass Password Manager
description:
LastPass is a password manager and password generator that locks your passwords and personal information in a secure vault. From your LastPass vault, you can store passwords and logins, create online shopping profiles, generate strong passwords, track personal information in notes, and more. All you have to do is remember your LastPass master password, and LastPass will autofill web browser and app logins for you. 

Stop getting locked out of your online accounts or struggling with frustrating password resets. Let LastPass remember your passwords for you, and keep you safe online.

NEW TO LASTPASS? 

Download LastPass now and get the protection you need for your online information. You can use LastPass on one device type (Computer or Mobile) for free. Unlimited device type access is available with LastPass Premium or Families.

- Store usernames and passwords for all of your online accounts securely in your LastPass encrypted vault. 

- For Android Oreo and future OS releases, LastPass will automatically save usernames and passwords to the vault as you visit each site and app.  

- Passwords will automatically fill in for you as you visit sites and apps, so you never need to remember them again. Only remember your LastPass master password and forget the rest. 

- With automatic device sync, anything you save on one device is instantly available on other devices.

- Securely store information like credit card numbers and health insurance cards in the encrypted vault. 

- Log in with your fingerprint for simple, secure access to everything in LastPass.  

- Safely and conveniently share passwords with others, such as the cable login or WiFi password. 

- Create secure passwords in one click with the built-in password generator. 

- Multi-factor authentication secures your password vault to add a second layer of protection on your account.

LastPass never has the key to your encrypted data, so your information is available to you, and only you. Your vault is encrypted with bank-level, AES 256-bit encryption.

Get more with LastPass Premium: 
- Unlimited device type access 
- Unlimited sharing of passwords, items and notes
- 1GB encrypted file storage 
- Premium multi-factor authentication like YubiKey 
- Personal support 
- Desktop fingerprint authentication 

Download LastPass today for simple, secure access to your passwords!

recentChanges: We’ve been working hard to improve the LastPass app on Android! This release includes: improved reliability and minor bug fixes.
comments: Absolutely HORRIBLE! When it was a free app it worked great on all my devices, so when they decided to take that away I moved to a paid premium program and now this thing either gives me no result, for items in my account, or it gives me wrong logins and wrong passwords. Totally unreliable, do not use this app if you are truly relying on it to get into your accounts as you will spend more time trying to get the correct information, then on your site and that's only if you don't get locked out.

Free with limitations, why have to choose between Desktop and Mobile? I've used lastpass before this, its now a pain to use across devices. Lastpass is a hit and miss experience , the pop up box only appears 50% of the time, and not always the correct suggestions, I frequently have to copy and paste the details, leaving a password trail. Great database for storing passwords, card details, documents etc, cost of the premium is acceptable but it needs to work more than 50% for me to commit.

I've been using LastPass premium user for years now but my Andriod experience has been worse and worse and is just becomming intolerably frustrating. Just doesn't work half the time so I'm often struggling to log in. I don't mind paying but the Android app needs some serious work, it needs to be functional. Just terrible right now. Apple version works much, much better.

Still love it...This app has got to be the most useful app I've ever used. I only have to remember one password. LastPass does the rest. It's as secure as you could ever hope to find. it can be set to auto-fill your username and p/w for websites and apps, as well as save secure notes, credit card profiles, software licenses and any other information you want to keep private. I've been using LastPass for 6-7yrs now, and I'll still be using it for another 6-7yrs. Try it. You'll like it.

Zero stars. Unusable garbage on Android. It keeps getting worse and worse. The LastPass service is excellent and works great on Windows and iOS but is utterly worthless on Android. If you actually figure out how to get the persistent notification, it will ask for your fingerprint then show the autofill but hides it before you can use it.

title: BasicNote - Notes, Notepad
description:
Basic Note is a simple notepad.
This app is a easy and fast notes app.

This app is a easy and fast notes app.

This app is a easy and fast notes app.

17, Beobwon-ro 4-gil, Songpa-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
(zipcode:05855)
recentChanges: #New : Dark Mode
comments: I love this app very useful. I made a generic grocery list of most often purchased. I can uncheck when i need to pick up an item and check off when i purchased. Add new items or delete them as needed. Also saved list for various stores....home depot, walmart and such. I also use the note feature to create notes that I can reuse to send instuction to groups I am in. Quick and easy to use. Have had no issues with taking up too much space on my phone. I say its a keeper!!!!

Simple and easy to use and SO MUCH BETTER than the updated Samsung Notes. Easy to use to make lists, with an option to make them checklists (tap the item and it puts a line through it, but leaves it there so you can see what you checked off). Thank you, Samsung Notes! If your latest forced update hadn't made your Notes so complicated and intrusive I would never have found this app! This app keeps things simple & easy which is why someone uses Notes instead of a Word document in the first place.

Great app. Easy to use and I love all the features. I wish you could write things in bold, highlight, and choose what color you want the text to be in. I guess I'm asking for to much considering it's a free app. The name of the app is no deciver, it's a basic note app. It has checklists and normal notes, you can also put things into categories and name said categories. Overall, good app, no regrets.

You get what you ask for with this one here. I am currently writing a song, but am totally unorganised when it comes to notes and stuff like that, which this helps with a ton. A few features would be cool like bold letters, or highlighting, but im just being picky. Nice straight forward app.
Great app, I love it a lot. It's really easy to use and the only adds I have had so far are the pop up one's. Other than that it is amazing. I definitely recomend it!

title: Adobe Fill & Sign: Easy PDF Doc & Form Filler.
description:
The free Adobe Fill & Sign app streamlines the paperwork process and enhances productivity with contracts, business documents, and more. 

The app lets you fill, sign, and send any form fast and reliably. You can even snap a picture of a paper form and fill it in on your phone or tablet, then e-sign and send. It’s that easy: no physical document, no printing or faxing needed.

HOW IT WORKS:

• FILL. The Adobe Fill & Sign app allows you to scan paper forms with your camera or open a file straight from your email. Simply tap to enter text or checkmarks in form fields. The app’s custom autofill entries let you fill forms even faster.

• SIGN. With the document signer, easily create your signature with your finger or a stylus, then apply it or your initials directly to the form.

• SEND. Save your forms, contracts, and business documents easily, and send to others immediately via email.

With the sleekest pdf editor and signature app out there it’s that easy.

WHAT CAN ADOBE FILL & SIGN DO FOR YOU?

• GET IT DONE NOW. Adobe Fill & Sign is an intuitive, easy-to-use platform suited to every situation. As long as you have an internet connection, the app allows you to sign documents, anytime, anywhere.

• GO GREEN. Our document signing and editing app allows you to go truly paperless. With Adobe Fill & Sign, send forms by email and avoid wasting paper.

• STAY ORGANIZED. No more messy paperwork with Fill & Sign. The app allows you to store your forms after signing and sending them. With your documents all in one place, simply access the app to consult your forms at a later date.

• GET IT DONE NOW. Adobe Fill & Sign is an intuitive, easy-to-use platform suited to every situation. As long as you have an internet connection, the app allows you to handle any forms, anytime, anywhere.

Terms & Conditions: Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use 
http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_en and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_en

Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html

comments: The app looks professional, but you won't. The biggest flaw I've found is when it decides to not save half the fields on my document. Repeatedly refilling those fields to force a save make no difference in the behavior. I love the app, but I hate the end when I need to print the document because I have to cross my fingers and hope all the fields come out in the end.

Often great, but it inexplicably doesn't save certain fields. This gets embarrassing when I send a document to someone and I have to do so multiple times because on my end I can see the field, but on output or saving, the field is blank. I would also like the ability to save completed forms directly from the app as a "save as" rather than erasing and rewriting over and over on the same master copy after saving in a separate program.

Why is there no "save" button/option? Why when sending off the file, it says, file saved, but when file received and opened, only a signature is visible and all content and text entered from sender is missing? Adobe? You're a mega million (or more) company just taking people's money and putting out shxtty programs and apps, not resolving concerns and issues your paying customers are expressing to you. This is the 4th program I've had unnecessary challenges with. Sad.
Can be a little finicky, but this app has saved my butt on a couple occasions where signatures were needed right away. I will continue to fight through any glitches and hope they get worked out.

At first this was a very great apps to use... Really convenient... But now this app doesn't support dark mode... Whenever i try to fill in the form the writing turns white hence its impossible to see...so i had to turn my phone to light mode... another issue is that whenever i finished filling in my form, some of what i fill will be vanished and i hadve to rewrite them again...i really love this apps..so please do fix them..thank you ❤️

title: Microsoft To Do: List, Task & Reminder
description:
Microsoft To Do is a task management app to help you stay organized and manage your day-to-day. You can use Microsoft To Do to make shopping lists or task lists, take notes, record collections, plan an event, or set reminders to increase your productivity and focus on what matters to you. Microsoft To Do makes it easy to stay organized and manage your life.

Accomplish what's meaningful and important to you each day with My Day and Suggestions, your personalized daily planner tools. Intelligent suggestions recommend tasks from across your lists that may be relevant for the day. From grocery lists to housecleaning routines, daily tasks are simple with To Do. When you're quickly switching between contexts and tasks, it's important to have tools that help you achieve what matters. Microsoft To Do helps you quickly capture and retrieve your lists and tasks across devices and between multiple accounts.

Capture tasks from different Microsoft apps and services and sync them with Microsoft To Do. Flag emails as tasks in Outlook or any email account hosted by Microsoft, add to lists with Cortana, and see tasks assigned to you from Microsoft Planner. Get peace of mind knowing that your tasks and lists are hosted on the Microsoft 365 service – one of the most reliable services with industry-leading security offerings.

Microsoft To Do’s modern, easy-to-use experience makes your lists unique, with customizable features like emoji in lists, colorful themes, dark mode, and more. Plus, shared lists help you stay connected and collaborate with family, friends, and colleagues.
 
Microsoft To Do features:

Daily planner
• A daily planner personalized with suggested tasks: My Day
• To do lists are accessible anywhere, on any device
• Share lists and assign tasks with your friends, family, colleagues, and classmates
• Task management features break your tasks into manageable steps
• Take notes to add to any task
• Group lists together by topic or project

Task manager
• Add reminders, tasks and lists with the To Do widget
• Daily organizer personalized with bold and colorful backgrounds
• Reminders with one-time or recurring due dates
• Make task lists and switch between school, work, and personal lists 
• Attach up to 25 MB of files to any task

To Do lists for any purpose
• Bill planner
• Shopping list
• Reminders
• Task management
• Take notes
• And more

Office 365 integration
• Sync reminders and task lists between Outlook and To Do
• Lists and tasks are hosted with the security of Microsoft 365
• Task lists are compiled from the apps and services across Microsoft 365
• Add multiple Microsoft accounts 

Microsoft To Do helps you organize and simplify your plans, whether it's for work, school, or home.

To Do is free and available across the web and iOS, Mac, Android, and Windows devices.
 
Learn more: https://to-do.microsoft.com
Follow us on Twitter: @MicrosoftToDo
Need support? https://microsoft-todo.helpshift.com
By installing Microsoft To Do, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=842575
