Microsoft To Do’s modern, easy-to-use experience makes your lists unique, with customizable features like emoji in lists, colorful themes, dark mode, and more. Plus, shared lists help you stay connected and collaborate with family, friends, and colleagues.

Microsoft To Do features:

Daily planner
• A daily planner personalized with suggested tasks: My Day
• To do lists are accessible anywhere, on any device
• Share lists and assign tasks with your friends, family, colleagues, and classmates
• Task management features break your tasks into manageable steps
• Take notes to add to any task
• Group lists together by topic or project

Task manager
• Add reminders, tasks and lists with the To Do widget
• Daily organizer personalized with bold and colorful backgrounds
• Reminders with one-time or recurring due dates
• Make task lists and switch between school, work, and personal lists
• Attach up to 25 MB of files to any task

To Do lists for any purpose
• Bill planner
• Shopping list
• Reminders
• Task management
• Take notes
• And more

Office 365 integration
• Sync reminders and task lists between Outlook and To Do
• Lists and tasks are hosted with the security of Microsoft 365
• Task lists are compiled from the apps and services across Microsoft 365
• Add multiple Microsoft accounts

Microsoft To Do helps you organize and simplify your plans, whether it's for work, school, or home.

To Do is free and available across the web and iOS, Mac, Android, and Windows devices.

Learn more: https://to-do.microsoft.com
Follow us on Twitter: @MicrosoftToDo
Need support? https://microsoft-todo.helpshift.com
By installing Microsoft To Do, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=842575
summary: Increase productivity! Make a daily to do list, create a reminder & share notes!
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: We have made some fixes to improve app stability and performance.
comments: Overall, app is super handy and I use it on a daily basis to keep a track of plans. I enjoy you can both see you completed and still not tasks on one page. However, the app's widget started to lag quite often what is annoying. It get stuck when you try to add first tasks for the day and tasks' suggesting scroll-up ribbon start to hover and there is no other way to stop except from exit. Also smt the widget doesn't show tasks at all in a window. Please, fix it!!!Lowered stars as issue not solved

Pros: complete a repeat task & a copy of that task is created at the time interval specified; easy-to-use widget; sort by date or priority; different color themes; & ability to share lists by email or text (recipient doesn't need a Microsoft account). Cons: time interval for months & years do not allow for day-of-the-week repeat (for the date, not the first Saturday). Easy work-around is to repeat by week (52 weeks for a year).

Would be really great if it remembered the reminders I didn't do the previous day, instead of asking me to re-add them to the list for the current day (there may be a setting for it, but I haven't found it) Also it's quite annoying that I can complete repetitive tasks like taking meds for days that are still to come, and now I've forgotten to take my meds, because I accidentally completed the take last week when I was clearing out other completed tasks

This app sucks! So sorry but it deletes notes, duplicates subtasks etc, its very annoying! Not good for professional use. Update: Months later, the issue that subtasks dont synchronize is not fixed. Thats quite embarassing. And makes the app super tedious - its free though, so cant compain. Can't sign in, screen stays white... You have got to be kidding me - OK, works over mobile data, not over wifi weirdly. Dear Microsoft Team, Please fix the issue, that subtasks are not synchronized. It literally makes the entire app close to useless to me, since I keep my important notes in subtasks, and can not see them on my Mac, if I add them on my phone. Please maybe also hire me so I can write some tests so issues like this dont happen. I can work remotely from Germany. Thank you. Best, Jan

For students it is not much good app but good for doing a personal business it is very good as it has tasks, my date, important, planned, assigned to me, Flagged email you can also schedule timing, and remind me of sun is also. I think it is better app to remember you what you want to do. For Students are recommend you student calendar.

title: Microsoft PowerPoint: Slideshows and Presentations
description:
Microsoft PowerPoint presents you with a presentation and slides app that you can carry with you wherever you go.

The PowerPoint app gives you access to the familiar tool you know and love. Create, edit, view, present or share presentations quickly and easily from anywhere.

Access your most recently used PowerPoint files quickly while on the go. PowerPoint provides a quick view of your recent files for easy access on any device. Syncing is seamless across devices, so you no longer have to worry about multiple file versions when you work on PowerPoint mobile.

Work with anyone and present to anyone, anywhere, with confidence. With the Microsoft PowerPoint app, your office moves with you.

Give presentations with training from Presenter Coach, a new AI tool designed to help with public speaking. Practice presentations on your own, in private with the Presenter Coach. Presenter Coach helps you practice your presentations with real-time suggestions to help you adjust your pacing, avoid “umms” and speak confidently.

PowerPoint lets you make a lasting impression with powerful and customizable presentations that make you stand out. Create and present with confidence, from anywhere. Making an impactful presentation has never been easier. PowerPoint gives you the ability to edit your ppt or pptx files and customize it on the go, collaborating with others in real time.

Present with confidence
Never miss a beat with PowerPoint on the go. This presentation maker gives you the option to create presentations from scratch or continue working on any that are preexisting. Thanks to OneDrive, you can start a presentation on your PC, then edit and present using PowerPoint mobile. Present your point clearly and with confidence using presentation view on any device, all without firing up your laptop. Practice presentations with the Presenter Coach to master public speaking.

Make a lasting impression
A beautifully crafted presentation is always a winner. Become a skilled presentation maker and take advantage of the slides app with access to powerful and highly customizable tools. Create presentations that will leave a lasting impression and help you stand out from the crowd.

Work with others easily

PowerPoint makes it easy for you to collaborate with others. With 1-click sharing, quickly invite others to edit, view, or provide feedback on your slides. Easily manage permissions and see who’s working in your presentation. Stay on top of changes and feedback from others with integrated comments within the slides. Compare changes to see how your presentation has evolved over time.

REQUIREMENTS
• 1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size of 10.1 inches or smaller.
Unlock the full Microsoft experience with a qualifying Microsoft 365 subscription for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.
 
Microsoft 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft’s EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365 on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula

Did you know that with a Microsoft 365 subscription, you can unlock the full power of Office across all of your devices? Find special offers in the app.
comments: At first it was doing it's best but recently in the transition option when I applied some transitions and watched the slide show, the transition effect doesn't appear! It gets black and then suddenly the slide appears out of nowhere. I tried to update the app but still it's not solved! I even tried reinstalling and also checked internet speed! It is still the same. By the way, the app is really good with exciting animations which helps in creativity. But please fix this problem!

Very very useful app for me. Iam a college student and now with this app i can make presentation on my phone like computer. Very easy to use. Great app. I like it. But sometimes ppt for some reason it crash. I don't know why !🤷🏻‍♂️ But its okay. Overall very useful , helpful for students, easy to use app. 😊

PowerPoint is a very useful app as a student. We can create presentations for any occasions or even worksheets can be created in a very attractive manner. All the features of PowerPoint is very useful and it makes your presentation look much more interesting and attractive. Overall a good experience.

It is a very good app but I think that if you are typing something it automatically goes to other line and I've had this typing goes all the world goes to order line so please take care of that so that not happen once again and I felt that problem 2to 3 time otherwise this app is very nice so I am giving it five stars and I think that it is a very interesting app for making the periods for your school for making that slide show you can present it to your teachers it is very impressive .

very very much nice good app. it is very helpful for me too make ppts and pdfs for school. have a great filter. nice app. and one more thing it is very handy in computer and also in a mobile phone so keep going and make such apps!!!!!!!! and also it is free so that i can do it very nicely also ok. so, i reccomend youto download this app beacause it is very helpful so download it now and check it out. ok bye.

title: Stack: PDF Scanner by Google Area 120
description:
Get rid of paper clutter with Stack. Stack is a PDF scanner, document organizer, and detail finder. All in one.

Scan with your phone
Stack can be used as a bill scanner, receipt scanner, invoice scanner and more. 

High-quality PDFs
Stack transforms your scanned documents into high-quality PDFs.
Easily edit with crop, rotation, color enhancement, and correction.

Make organizing easy
Stack automatically names and organizes your documents into useful categories.

Never miss a detail
Stack finds and displays key details from your document (like “total amount due”). Copying information has never been easier.

Private and secure
Stack uses Google’s world-class security to protect your data. You can turn on fingerprint or face lock for extra peace of mind.

Automatic Back Up
Stack backs up all your documents to the Cloud. You can save a copy of your documents also to Google Drive.

Import existing PDFs
Import from camera, gallery or files. Your documents have a new home.

Free
Stack has no ads or in-app purchases. And no watermarks. 

Share PDF documents
Share your scanned documents via email. 

Document search
Stack’s OCR scanner allows you to search for text within your documents. You can always find what you need.

Made by Google 
Built by Google’s in-house incubator “Area 120 by Google”, this app will show you why this is the best PDF scanner. Learn more at stack.area120.com.

345 Spear St Ste 400
San Francisco, CA 94105
recentChanges: Brand new app! Stack has just launched so please send us feedback on what can be improved.
comments: Very good app! I hope someday this can be used for official government ID. one little thing I just had trouble with is that it doesn't seem intuitive to move things between stacks. I added a document and it was in no stacks. I couldn't add it to one without downloading the PDF and sharing it to the app again, even though it already has a copy of it. minor thing but worth pointing out. I will still use this app heavily. I want to get copies of all my important documents in here.

I love everything Google; it's sync/accessibility/etc is a lifesaver. I would love a scanner app that also doubles as an organizer. While this app is off to a good start in that direction, it's still lacking features that prevent me from fully commiting to using it at the moment. The concept of organizing scanned items into folders is a huge asset for this app! However, the app NEEDS to allow the user to be able to sort said items by name/date. The sooner this function arrives, the better!!

Simple, easy to use and intuitive. Automatic backup to Drive is especially helpful. One of my favorite features is the ability to save a document to more than one stack. Unfortunately it looks like stack selection can only be made when creating a new document. I don't see an option to update which stack(s) the document is linked to after initial creation. Great job!

This app is great! One major bug that keeps it from being 5-star is that the adjustable "color" feature rarely keeps my manual selection. Generally, after making all my edits, the preview looks as intended. When I hit save the edited version is overridden by the original photo when the PDF is generated. Automatic color editing options are great, and I often want to use the medium and bright options. Happy to work with your team to troubleshoot. More sort options (Title A-Z) in app would be nice

I love this app. I'm documenting all of my purchases, with pics of serial numbers and receipts. They save in Google Drive as a PDF as well, so don't have to only use the app to view it. Google, please don't kill this one! One thing I'd like to see is the ability to change the order of the pics in the edit window. You can delete individual pics, but can't move one from the back to the front without deleting them all and adding them all back in a different order.

title: Mobile Security: VPN Proxy & Anti Theft Safe WiFi
description:
McAfee Mobile Security is the ultimate mobile security tool. Get secure, safe device and privacy protection from McAfee.

McAfee Mobile Security gives you everything you need to stay protected. Use McAfee’s Smart Security, Privacy Protection, antivirus tools & spyware protection to keep your private data away from prying eyes.

Enhance your phone’s performance with a storage cleaner, memory booster, battery booster, and data usage tracking. Use Find My Phone to locate your device should you ever lose it.

McAfee Mobile Security protects you with the latest in antivirus, spyware removal, and WiFi security.

**McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection includes McAfee Mobile Security Standard in their subscriptions**

Mobile Security Free Includes:

SECURE MOBILE DEVICES
▪ Spyware Removal: Stop phishing and prevent access to your personal info
▪ Find My Phone: Find your phone with a map location service, sound a remote alarm, or get step-by-step tracking
▪ Mobile security with remote management from the web portal
▪ App Protection: Know which apps may put your personal data privacy at risk

ANTI THEFT APP
▪ Anti Theft with Device Lock Security and Thief Cam: Locks your device after 3 failed passcodes and takes a snapshot of the user
▪ Anti Theft Uninstall Protection: Keep a thief from uninstalling the Mobile Security app

SAFE WIFI ACCESS + WIFI SCANNER
▪ Secure WiFi – Maintain a safe connection online
▪ WiFi Protection – Keep your personal data, online activities, IP addresses and physical locations private
▪ Free Wi-Fi scanner analyzes networks for security.
▪ WiFi alerts you when you connect to unsecured hotspots.

PHONE PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION
▪ Battery Booster: Extended battery life
▪ Memory Booster: Free up memory (RAM) of background apps
▪ Phone Cleaner: Remove unwanted files and apps
▪ Phone Data Tracker: Set data limits and monitor usage

BACKUP CONTACTS
▪ Backup contacts automatically through the McAfee Cloud
▪ Recover contacts from lost or stolen devices.

FREE ANTIVIRUS APP SCANNER
▪ Antivirus Widget:* Stay up to date on your antivirus security status and fix issues with a tap
▪ Malware scan, virus cleaner and removal: Scans for malicious code from files, SD card, apps and downloads.

Mobile Security Standard includes all of the above, with:

SAFE WEB
▪ Safe Web secure browsing utility prevents online threats.
▪ Safe Web alerts you when browsing malicious websites, protects you from phishing or ARP Spoofing and helps to keep your personal data, photos and videos private.

DEVICE SECURITY
▪ Secure Lock: securely lock apps with sensitive content
▪ Guest Mode*: Control which apps your guest can see on your device
▪ Media Backup: Save and restore your media files

Mobile Security Plus includes everything with:

Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN***
▪ Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN protection to defend against unsecured public Wi-Fi hotspots.
▪ IP Proxy and no geo-restrictions for secure browsing.
▪ Maintain web security and access geographically restricted content.
▪ A secure Wi-Fi hotspot to browse safely on unsecured public Wi-Fi.
▪ PLUS package comes with all standard and free features.

AD TRACKER BLOCKING***
▪ Spam blocker stops ad trackers and targeted ads


*Android 5.1.1/6.0 users must grant accessibility to enable Widget, App Lock, & Guest Mode
**Thief-Cam and SIM-card lock features are not available on Android 10 (Q) devices
***Wi-Fi Guard VPN and Ad Tracker Blocking is not available in McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection.
MMS uses the Device Administrator permission & Accessibility services

In order to provide you with the best possible experience, McAfee Mobile Security will require Android 7 and above. You are encouraged to update your device to the latest version to receive timely security updates, maximum protection, and enhanced performance.

comments: Customer support helped me to resolve my problems. Big thanks to them and manages their customer expectations well. Changing my review and giving 5 starts now! Edit 8/3/21: Newest update made the application becoming useless. Couldn't login also it crashed soon after. Restarted my phone twice, and the problem I believe wasn't mine or my device. Noice 👍 Back to 1 star. Keep crashing, error runtime. Great for Premium Membership! Using Vivo V17 Pro AndroidOS 11.

Hello McAfee, I am using LiveSafe subscription from past 2 years. Till the latest version 6.0.0.373 update, everything is fine. After this update logo color changed to white. * UI is dumbest now. * No dashboard. * Looks like fake app. * App features unnecessarly described in all screen. * No details about licence expiry. Why this sudden change? Is am using true McAfee AV?

Latest update 6.0.0.376 is not working, not able to launch the application. Getting message try again ERROR:INIT. I had to completely uninstall previous version and reinstalled new version again, it worked !!!
It proved robust and reliable, the best feature is the web protection. Multi device support and cross device notifications are what caught my eye. I'll totally buy it when the trial ends!

Application is visually pleasing, simple to used, and customizable. Unfortunately, contains feature Integrations and exploitable issues that make it vulnerable to external attack when combined with other publicly available apps. Has potential, but also comes with risk of damaged or lost to user, as well as a binding arbitration agreement. Does not recognize or respond to serious risk factors when utilizing even the deepest scans. Could be great, but use at your own risk.

comments: It was okay but then my apps didn't lock even after I selected them in the app. I like the general idea and it worked pretty well. I'm also having problems with the option where it takes pictures of "intruders". I tested it out to see if it was working fine but it doesn't work no matter what I do. Please help me!

There's so many options. It's not just a cheap app locker. There's so many gimmicks and quality of life stuff that makes your phone faster and even decreasing the charging time. The adds aren't even annoying, they don't cover the while screen and are very manageable. There's also different ways to lock apps. For example, you can set it to say that the app crashes instead of showing the show finger print/password thing. Overall, this isn't just an excellent security app, its an essential app.

Amazing, just one suggestion. When you hide the app by disguising it as a calculator, could you make it act like a calculator unless you do something special? It's pretty suspicious having two calculators. Lovely app, love all the security measures as well.

The only issue with this app that I have is the simple fact that half the time I open the one app I need protected, sometimes it's just not protected at all. Like the lock never existed, making me have to go back in and redo it. Good app when it works.

I had to write another review because this is ridiculous. I've locked my settings but if you try and go into it and app lock blocks it all you have to do is click on cancel and click on what you want from settings and keep doing that you get to go into settings even though it says it's locked! Lots to improve!

title: GTL | GettingOut
description:
GTL’s GettingOut mobile app is rooted in the power of relationships. It provides simple and reliable communication between inmates and their family and friends -- allowing them to stay connected, even on the go!

With our free mobile app, you can easily make deposits, send and receive messages with our new and improved messaging feature, send photos and videos (select facilities), manage contacts and more. Download the GettingOut app today!
descriptionHTML:
GTL’s GettingOut mobile app is rooted in the power of relationships. It provides simple and reliable communication between inmates and their family and friends -- allowing them to stay connected, even on the go!

With our free mobile app, you can easily make deposits, send and receive messages with our new and improved messaging feature, send photos and videos (select facilities), manage contacts and more. Download the GettingOut app today!
summary: Simple and reliable communication between inmates, friends and family
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: Very frustrating to use. The app charges 25 cents per message/photo, each requiring approval before being available for the inmate to see. There are no guidelines listed explaining what's acceptable/not acceptable. If the message/picture isn't approved, there's no credit applied to the account. I sent my husband four pictures of his Chevelle, all were approved. Then, I sent a picture of the engine in that Chevelle, and it was declined. I sent the EXACT SAME picture again, they approved it. sigh

I have this installed on both an iPhone and droid. It is a great app when it works and I'm very thankful to have it available. . About a week ago, a forced update began causing the app not to work properly. Messages cannot be input or sent, but they can be read if you close the app and open it again. The photo icons aren't clickable either, however this will be a great feature when it's working again. The 'visit now' connects just fine and really appreciate that! If a developer, by any chance, is reading this review, I hope you're able to fix the last update so the app works again for messages and photos. If I can install an older version without a forced update, please let me know that work-around.

I dropped 60$ into this and have not gotten to use a cent. Like others had said, if you try to send a message or do anything, it just prompts you to make a deposit, and/or tells you that you don't have the funds. Well the funds are there!! Im livid. I've tried several times to contact service for help, but of course get no response. I want my money back!!! SCAM

Messaging doesn't work , viewing your profile doesn't work . the only feature that works is the deposit feature . BUT once you deposit it keeps prompting that you don't have enough money in your account to send messages that are . 34 cents! The worst part is because of covid this is about if as far as visiting or communicating with your loved one . parents trying to see their children , Siblings trying to uplift eachother only to be faced with frustration over a system that doesn't work .

This is the most fraudulent app and company ever. They take your money then never give you access. I can't even get online cause everytime I try to reset my password it goes to a blank screen. Customer service is a joke. You wait on hold forever, no one ever picks up. Their form is another joke... They don't even acknowledge that you filled one out. I've deposited 25 dollars on my account that I cant use, access or even see and they have not responded or given me a refund. Snailmail is better

title: Brother Print Service Plugin
description:
The Brother Print Service Plugin enables you to print directly from your Android devices (Android 5.0 or later), to your Brother printer through a Wi-Fi network. As this is a plugin application, you can print using the "Print" option of supported Android apps. Please see below for supported applications (as of March 2015):

- Chrome Browser
- Gmail
- Photos
- Google Sheets
- Google Slides
- Google Docs
- Google Drive

The following print options are available (compatible options will depend on the selected device):

- Copies
- Paper Size
- Color/Mono
- Orientation
- Media Type
- Quality
- Layout
- 2-sided
- Borderless

After installing this application, you must activate it in one of the following ways:
- Tap the icon displayed in the notification area immediately after installation, and enable it in the displayed screen.
- Tap "Settings" on your Android device and tap "Printing", then select "Brother Print Service Plugin". Enable it in the displayed screen.

Please visit your local Brother website for supported models.
*Please note the email address mobile-apps-id@brother.com is for feedback only. Unfortunately we cannot reply to inquiries sent to this address.

recentChanges: Software Update
comments: this used to work but no longer works for me. Yes it installed ok, yes it is enabled in the printing services and shows up when you go to add a printer, but it just says "cannnot add printers'. I guess it doesn't work with Android 11. I am instead able to use the app called 'Brother iPrint&Scan' and that works well, though its not as convenient as printing right from apps themselves. workaround is to print from apps to a pdf or picture file, save it, then use 'Brother iPrint&Scan' to print the pdf or picture file.

All it ever says is Can't connect to printer my printers connected to my pc but does not provide any additional information of anything on the connection then. Both my phone and the printer on the same Wi-Fi WI why isn't it finding the connection. With my last phone I was able to find it no problem now with my new phone can't connect to it at all.

Nothing worse than having a product work fine until it just doesn't. Seems to be a simple software issue, but by reading the recent negative reviews about the connectivity issue, Brother doesn't seem to think it's worth addressing. Zero stars.

Love Brother Service! What You NEED: 1) Install Brother Printer App 2) Install Brother Print Service Plugin 3) Be on "SAME" Wifi to printer wireless! (Your printer & Your Device -ex... Laptop, Phone, desktop computer). When you finish printing you can go BACK to your phone's own wifi. *Note: When your device is desktop or laptop computer...You can download drivers (from finding & matching to your specific desktop/laptop model! Hope this info helps you. It has never failed me so far. ;)

Provides extra print settings. The typical connectivity issues seen to be sure to the printer going idle. I usually tap through the menu on the printer to print settings, then immediately cancel the print job before it's done thinking about it. Within 10 seconds or so if that, my phone should be able to detect the printer on the network and this app can then be used to drive the print options page. All the folks saying it can't find the printer, I'm sure it's actually the printer, not this app.

title: Otter: Meeting Note, Transcription, Voice Recorder
description:
Otter is where conversations live. It records and takes meeting notes for you in real time, so you can stay focused on the conversation and rest assured that information, actions, attendees are captured, easily searchable, and shareable with your team. Also available online at https://otter.ai . 600 minutes free every month. English only.

Supercharge your note taking with AI and use Otter for all your meetings, interviews, lectures, and everyday voice conversations.

Many Uses of Otter
★ Take meeting notes automatically
★ Share meeting minutes and summary with teammates to keep everyone in sync
★ Invite collaborators to edit and highlight meeting notes
★ Record and transcribe interviews, lectures, podcasts, videos, webinars, keynotes
★ Provide live captioning to deaf, hard-of-hearing, ESL people, and anyone with accessibility needs


Record & Transcribe Live
★ Record instantly in one tap, with widget and shortcut too
★ Transcribe in real time (when online) with high accuracy
★ Highlight the key points to review later
★ Insert photos of whiteboard discussions, slides, etc.
★ Scroll back to grab a quote or revisit a point
★ Input audio via built-in mic or Bluetooth device

Enrich Notes with AI
★ Punctuate, capitalize, and break paragraphs automatically
★ Identify speakers (after some training)
★ Generate word clouds and summary keywords; tap on a word to jump to where it was said

Share & Collaborate
★ Start a recording inside a group to share the transcript live
★ Invite group members to view, edit, and highlight collaboratively
★ Share externally via links
★ Include a link in your tweet to embed an interactive transcript

Search & Playback
★ Search the text so you don't have to scrub through the whole audio
★ Playback at adjustable speeds
★ Follow along the highlighted word as the audio is playing
★ Tap on any word to skip the audio to that spot

Edit & Highlight
★ Edit the text to correct any errors
★ Tag the speakers to label the paragraphs and train Otter to identify speakers too
★ Highlight sentences in one tap

Organize & Export
★ Organize your conversations into personal folders
★ Copy to clipboard, or share directly into other apps
★ Export text as PDF, TXT, or SRT
★ Export audio as MP3

Import & Sync
★ Import audio (aac, m4a, mp3, wav, wma) and video (avi, mov, mp4, mpg, wmv)
★ Sync with your Zoom (Pro or higher) account to transcribe cloud recordings
★ Upload from Call Recorder - ACR or other call recording apps
★ Sync with your calendars to get reminders to record your meetings and auto-title your notes
★ Import your contacts to make it easier to share
★ Back up your data to Otter’s cloud automatically and access securely from any device

Otter Pro
★ Get 6,000 minutes of transcription per month
★ Bulk export
★ More playback speeds and skip silence

Otter Business
★ Built for teams and organizations
★ Capture, organize, and share valuable knowledge collaboratively
★ Manage accounts and billing centrally
★ Learn more at otter.ai/teams

Top Honors
★ "Best Daily Helpers of 2018" – Google Play
★ "7 Best Apps of 2018" – Mashable
★ "25 Best New Apps of 2018" – Fast Company
★ “40 Best Free Android Apps” – Tom’s Guide
★ "100 Best Android Apps for 2019" – PCMag

Requirements
※ Android 5.0 & up
※ Internet connection
※ You need to create an account to enjoy Otter. See our Terms of Service: otter.ai/terms-of-service

We take security and privacy very seriously. Your data is confidential with Otter. We do not sell or share your data with 3rd parties. You have full control to delete your data permanently. Learn more at https://otter.ai/privacy

Contact Us
▶ Email: support@otter.ai
▶ Facebook: @OtterAI
▶ LinkedIn: Otter.ai
▶ Twitter: @otter_ai
▶ Web: otter.ai

developerAddress:
800 W El Camino Real
Suite 170
Mountain View, CA 94040
recentChanges: • General stability fixes and improvements
comments: This app is SO close to being perfect. I use it at work to record all my client meetings, its great to be able to go back and hear what we talked about. I gave it a 3 out of 5 because it CANT RECORD phone calls. The only work around is to put it on speaker phone and record it like that and that's just not good enough. If they fix this it'll be 5 out of 5. Free version totally worth it until they make this happen. Until then I cant recommend paying for pro.

OTTER is amazing. I recommend it to university students I teach. I show them how to use it to efficiently outline or dictate their essays. They can also use it to record discussions during group work. I also show our admin the value of this tool during meetings. The interface is quite easy to understand and the export options are more than sufficient.

I live with the horrible issues, because this app, when working correctly, is absolutely heavenly. However, I want to tear out my hair daily. I just spent like 30 minutes editing the errors out of a transcript. Then I got a message that I needed to refresh because the transcript was out of date, and everything I did had disappeared. There are another half-dozen issues as serious as that one. As a paid customer, I am furious at these inexcusable bugs.

I REALLY enjoy this app... I'm a writer and I use a lot of my real world experiences in my writing. I often use this app to record the long, drawn out, conversations during the wee hours of the morning...the transcription is amazing and being able to tag the different speakers have helped me stay true to the fact inside the fantasy I'm considering going pro, but I haven't run out of recordings yet

I give 1 star to get developers attention! This app is lacking important Features. Too expensive for current state. Follow my advice and your revenue will increase! - Add other Languages (French/Spanish especially) - Add Summarize button, with AI that turns the whole conversation into main key points. - Remove minute cap for Premium and make it Unlimited. - Maybe even add a way to connect with Zoom/ or Teams and record videconference meetings and phone calls speech to text. You're welcome.

title: Free WiFi Passwords, Offline maps & VPN. WiFi Map®
description:
Connect to any WiFi for FREE! WiFi Map is the largest Wi-Fi community in the world!

The largest WiFi hotspot database in the world

WiFi Map® has more than 150 million WiFi hotspots available worldwide and the number is growing daily thanks to our community. With the app, you can connect to WiFi hotspots for free, get actual passwords, and make updates together with millions of WiFi Map users!

Fast and secure VPN for public WiFi networks

Use our built-in VPN for private internet access and to keep your connection secure. Use WiFi Map and the unlimited VPN to securely browse the internet, make and accept calls, text in messengers, and stay online with a single WiFi Map app. Also, you can get around some regional limitations and, for example, get access to your local services.

Detailed offline maps to find the internet everywhere

It’s always difficult to stay without an internet connection when you are traveling or simply out of carrier service. This is where the offline WiFi passwords map will help. Download the map of the whole region with the complete hotspots data to make sure you’re able to connect to the internet.

Benefit from a WiFi Map community and support it

Use a WiFi scanner to look for nearby Wi-Fi networks, speed test them, and connect to the fastest ones. At the same time, you’re contributing to the WiFi Map community by sharing hotspot data and performance details. Thanks to our users you will always get actual information on hotspots around.

Sneak peek of WiFi Map main features
- Find the internet all over the world
- Access internet for FREE when you connect to WiFi
- Millions of WiFi hotspots available worldwide
- Genuine WiFi passwords and useful tips
- Use map navigation to find the local hotspots
- Apply filters to find out the nearest WiFi around you
- Smart search on the WiFi map
- Add WiFi hotspots around you to the map
- Download offline maps when you travel
- Share WiFis on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter with your friends
- Unlimited secure VPN
- Multiple reliable VPN servers worldwide
 
How to get connected?
1. Open the WiFi Map app.
2. Find an available WiFi hotspot around you.
3. Connect to the WiFi hotspot using information in the app. 
4. Enjoy fast, FREE and reliable internet access!

FAQ: 
# How to add a new WiFi hotspot to WiFi Map: https://youtu.be/zNRa4TVxc18

You will get ads free version and download offline region feature in exchange for safely using some of your device’s resources (WiFi and very limited cellular data), and only when you are not using your device. You may turn this off from the settings menu. 
Please see our TOS
https://www.wifimap.io/terms and the SDK 
Privacy Policy at 
https://luminati.io/legal/sdk-privacy for further information.

=====================
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wifimap.io/
Website: https://www.wifimap.io/

comments: App doesn't work at all, but I got it to work for now, after several attempts I'll see how good it works then I'll change my rating. It's the version of Android that it is causing the issue I figured it out but it should still work. please advise
CLICK CONTINUE WITHOUT SUBSCRIPTION. it just needs a long ad (30secs) and it gives a fairly accurate password. Perfect, does what it says. Good full map.

Could be very useful when traveling. You can download different areas for searching offline. But I noticed Alaska is not available for download. Even though I could scroll through a partial list on their website for Anchorage. Is Alaska only available to download for Premium users? I get that they need to have some revenue but the ads are overwhelming and the yearly fee seems steep considering it's relatively easy and free to seek out a restaurant or store that typically offers free WIFI.

Adding a new hotspot is quite counter-intuitive. Half of the cases it can only be labeled "Home", which doesn't make sense... After years of using it, I still can't figure out how to add a new location, if it is not already listed in the app.
This app says you just need to download it in order to get user names and passwords to wifi networks. Once you download it they just want your credit card info. Just another scam.

comments: Purchased the "Pro" version to get full functionality a few minutes ago. My very first task is a fail and the app will be deleted. I need a daily reminder every WEEKDAY, not every single day. This app doesn't seem to offer that, at least not easily. I need an app that it intuitive and efficient, and this simply isn't it. Too bad, I had high hopes. I can't say much about an app that lasted all of a few minutes, but I doubt that I'm alone in needing to list repetitive tasks that follow a routine

I paid for the premium version and I'm deleting this app. I wrote many times to the app makers but never had a reply. I sent them lots of screenshots. This app is too buggy and feels unstable. The last straw was one of my repeat To Do's with sub categories has turned into 10 subcategories that say 'car wash', and all my other subcategories have now gone. It's infuriating. You can't charge for a premium service for something so buggy. Not happy at all.

The app is somewhat neat and elegant. Not overloaded, which is good in the world of "todo apps". However. The first sin is the "add task" notification, which is a common task apps abuse. Notifications are for notifying. With this thing on you'll never have this "done clearing notifications" feeling again (and isn't regaining control over things to do the purpose of every todo app?). (Yes, you CAN turn it off.) Second sin is that the category color isn't used anywhere, so it's basically useless.

(Updated from 3 stars): Stunning and optimised 👍 I would highly recommend it In terms of task ordering, is there a way of getting them to appear in order from top to bottom rather than bottom to top? Previous problem (which I awarded 3 stars for, now fixed): 1/6 chance the 'press and hold to reorder task' feature would work ie: Display the border surrounding the task and allow me to move the task. This wasted lots of time.

I understand having ads but I have been trying to adjust something and every time I click its like there is an ad. I used a list and sublist and it seemed to copy the first item all the way down the list. I'm finding a new app. When I first used the app I enjoyed it. The ads weren't as often.

title: Scan to PDF - Free PDF Scanner APP, No Ads
description:
DocScan, a smart scanner app that turns your device into a portable PDF scanner, can easily convert paper documents and images to PDF/JPG in just one single tap.

Download DocScan and enjoy ALL FEATURES FOR FREE!

Amazing Features:
1.Convert All Kinds of Documents to PDFs
Easily scan & convert all kinds of documents to PDF format in a simple tap - receipts, invoices, notes, documents, photos, business cards, certificates, whiteboards, etc. The scan results can be printed out instantly via Cloud Print.

2.Easily Share Scanned Files
Conveniently share scanned files in PDF or JPEG formats with friends via Email, or post them on social media. Save and view the scanned files anytime, anywhere.

3.Professional Quality Scan Results
Its precise border detecting, smart cropping, and auto enhancing features ensure the PDF outputs clear, sharp, and high-resolution. Multiple filter options are also provided to further optimize the scan results - photo, document, clear, color, black & white.

4.Extract Texts from Images Accurately
The integrated OCR (optical character recognition) technology can precisely recognize and extract texts from papers and images. After extraction, you can edit, copy, search, and share the texts for free.

5.Add E-Signatures
DocScan allows you to add electronic signatures to the scan results. Easily sign your PDFs before sending and printing them!

6.Add Security Watermarks
You can add security watermarks to protect your files. Mark scanned files with customized watermarks at any time!

7.Search Files Quickly
Thanks to its quick search feature, you can quickly find your target files among multiple category folders by entering keywords; its OCR search feature can help you find texts inside notes and images in the shortest time.

8.Easy and Useful File Management Tools
Supports creating subfolders to help you categorize messy documents. Its amazing searching, sorting, and adding notes features can help you quickly find the document you want.

9.Convenient Documents Editing
Add or delete one page or the entire document; adjust the layout of documents; set page sizes of your PDF (Letter, Legal, A4, and more), all are supported!

Coming Soon: 
►Add Annotations
The advanced editing feature allows you to add annotations to the scan results. Conveniently review and mark the scanned documents!

►Protect Important Documents
You can set passwords to protect your confidential documents. Also, encrypting the files to be shared can effectively prevent others from peeking at it.

►Backup and Sync
Worried about losing important files when changing devices? DocScan helps you backup and sync scanned documents to Google Drive, Dropbox, Evernote, OneDrive, etc. Just log in to your account on any device, you can manage these documents conveniently. Store, sync and collaborate across smartphones, tablets, and computers.

DocScan can be used almost in any case:
*Receipt, Invoice, Contract, Tax Roll,  Business Card...
*PPT, Whiteboard, Note, Book, Curriculum Vitae...
*Passport, ID Card, Driver License, Certificate...
*QR Code, Memo, Letter, Map...
*Travel Brochure, Paint, Work Plan, Manuscript...

Try this scanner now! Scanner can convert all kinds of documents to PDF format!

title: Google Drive
description:
Google Drive, part of Google Workspace,  is a safe place to back up and access all your files from any device. Easily invite others to view, edit, or leave comments on any of your files or folders.

With Drive, you can:

• Safely store and access your files anywhere
• Quickly access recent and important files
• Search for files by name and content
• Share and set permissions for files and folders
• View your content on the go while offline
• Receive notifications about important activity on your files
• Use your device’s camera to scan paper documents

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Drive functionality, including:
• Easily managing users and file sharing to help meet data compliance needs
• Sharing files and folders directly with groups or teams within your organization
• Creating a shared drive to store all of your team’s content

Learn more about Google Workspace Drive: https://workspace.google.com/products/drive/

Learn more about Google Apps update policy: https://support.google.com/a/answer/6288871

Google accounts get 15GB of storage free, shared across Google Drive, Gmail, and Google Photos. For additional storage, you can upgrade to Google Workspace or Google One as an in-app purchase. Subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB in the US, and can vary by region.

Google Privacy Policy: https://www.google.com/intl/en_US/policies/privacy
Google Drive Terms of Service: https://www.google.com/drive/terms-of-service

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

comments: I guess it does what it says it does. However, all I specified it to sync were 2 rather small folders. Yet, Google Drive is hammering my hard drive like there's no tomorrow, with hundreds of thousands of I/O reads. Not sure what Google Drive is collecting, but it feels far more intrusive than Backup & Sync. As it is, I feel far more comfortable backing up those few files and folders by hand.

I'm facing a problem regarding files uploading issue on drive. Uploading is so much slow and sometimes, the uploading never be completed. Notification always shows me that files are uploading, It's just like loading icon on drive. But actually it doesn't work at the end. Even, i can't cancel uploading file that time. So poor experience in uploading files...😭😭😭 Help me, pls.

With the last update I have problems to open the Excel file, a table appears where it says: Oops Unable to open document. Reason: Internal error occurred. Please try again later. For others I have no problems (jpg, pdf etc.), only Excel file. I very much hope it is a solvable problem as I need to download all the time to open such a file. Thanks.

This is a pretty good app. Most of the time it does what it is supposed to do and sometimes it is just not working for some unknown reason. As far as I know I have never lost a file but I have had to repair some audio files because of damage. I like this app for its convenience and easy of use but keep a backup of your file until you know your file has loaded. PS: Received the reply below to a problem I did not even have so this was probably a canned auto response. Did not even read this, sad.

(1) Whenever I upload large files, it usually lags and suddenly stops uploading. (2) I have to wait for 2-24 hours for my vids to finish processing. (3) My deleted files keeps popping everytime I open the app again. I'm so sick of clearing the cache / data or uninstalling and reinstalling gdrive everytime it the app lags or doesn't function properly. Hope this'll fix soon.

title: Disney Cast Life
description:
Disney Cast Life is an app that allows Disney employees and Cast Members to access features from the Disney HUB on the go. 

If you choose to download this experience, please consider this app contains:

* Social media links to connect with others
* The option to accept push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content
* Links to online stores to purchase real products
* Location-based services
* Advertising for some third parties
* As well as advertising for the Walt Disney Family of Companies

This app contains local notification alerts. You can disable local notifications in settings.

comments: it's so pretty😍 super easy to navigate, I love the calendar, love having everything more easily accessible than searching through the hub, looking forward to any new features that get added in the future but for this being a brand new app, it's pretty great

Seems like a very well-designed app! I really love the schedule view, but would really like to have the call out/late/leader call back options integrated there eventually. Also, please consider a schedule view widget for Android on the future!

You still have to use okta verify, but otherwise is pretty good,but like the hub itself it will change and not for the better. I like that some favorite hub link are easy access and seem to load. Hopefully this better then using browser.
This is what I was asking for a long time ago but I finally have it. The app will perform any needs for cast members in a more convenient way. There is enough room to improve. Well done Disney! 👏
It's nice, but it would be better if we could screenshot our shifts to post on shift exchange pages. As of 8/14 screenshots are blocked on Android.

title: pdfFiller: Edit, Sign and Fill PDF
description:
Easily edit, share and sign PDFs with your Android phone or tablet. Complete tax forms, submit contracts and job applications quicker than ever before.
 
With our PDF editor, you are always in control of your workflow. pdfFiller for Android brings the process of creating and editing PDF documents to the next level.
 
Find all the necessary document management tools you need in one place:
✓ Upload PDF files from your device’s storage.
✓ Import files from email or online location via direct URL.
✓ Choose from a selection of more than 10 million fillable templates from the pdfFiller document library.
✓ Organize and categorize your docs by placing them in respective folders.
✓ Reduce doc sizes.
✓ Add an extra layer of security by using two step verification.
✓ Save all your documents in unlimited cloud storage.

pdfFiller is a powerful yet simple online PDF editor. Some key functions include:
✓ Add text blocks and type anywhere on a doc.
✓ Erase text, images or any other objects on a page.
✓ Highlight text, change color, font size and alignment.
✓ Add fillable fields, drop-down lists and menus.
✓ Draw on PDFs.
✓ Import images in JPEG, PNG and GIF format. Upload them from your device’s gallery or capture them with your camera.
✓ Use the online photo manager to store pictures and reuse them anytime.
✓ Import and delete pages.
✓ Rotate pages.
✓ Undo edits and restore the original document.

Sign PDFs online in just a few taps with PDF Editor:
✓ Use your device’s touchscreen to create a unique legally-binding electronic signature.
✓ Upload a scanned image and add an electronic signature to your doc.
✓ Send documents to be signed by other users via SendToSign.
✓ Review signature request history whenever needed.
✓ Save every electronic signature you draw or upload for later use.

Easily share files as well as invite and authorize your business partners to collaborate on a document:
✓ Use the LinkToFill tool and make any document publicly visible or accessible to specific users by providing them with a link or QR code.
✓ Share documents via email or SMS.
✓ Instantly fax any file to any number in the U.S.

Edit PDF files more productively and meet important deadlines. Access your files in seconds from anywhere, anytime, even while on the go. Since all files are processed online, the app takes up little to no storage space, preserving your device’s memory resources. All you need to start using the PDF editor is an active internet connection. Try it now and explore more possibilities for your business with the number one digital workflow solution.

*Get 7 days of pdfFiller free!
*New accounts only
Terms of use: https://www.pdffiller.com/en/terms_of_services.htm 
Your feedback is important to us, so please email support@pdffiller.com

comments: I've taken pics of forms converted to pdf fillable. Now that learned to work I use almost every day. I have gotten repair manuals, legal forms, contacts . You can add your own and it gives access to what ever you might need. I'm no expert when it comes to these type apps but I really like this one. I have Zodo but end up using this one.

Satisfied with the app. But It is missing a very basic and important feature - An undo and a redo button. There are ways erase and delete but those methods are not convenient as undo and redo buttons. Hope this feature will be added in the feature. Apart from that app is good

In past I have issue bieng charged after subscription canceled. I did contact them, they handle the issue in a very professional manner. I am refunded. Thank you so much for the immediate response and services.
Can't save, print, or send document without subscription. And it's hard to put checkmarks and text in specific places anyway.

Absolutely terrible. I took an hour on a pdf for it to say it's saved and then it deleted it without saving. I redid the PDF and thankfully I screen shot the PDF because it continued to delete the progress without saving. Absolutely terrible.

title: Flashlight (free & without popup ads)
description:
Free, safe and effective LED flashlight app without intrusive popup ads and without unnecessary permissions.

The most important features of the flashlight:
- includes a flashlight widget,
- gesture support, double shake device sideways to turn on/off,
- bright light and high power,
- easy, effective and fast,
- can work when the device is locked,
- safe and without unnecessary permissions,
- free and without popup ads.

Why does the flashlight app require CAMERA permission on older devices?
Technically the flashlight is part of the camera, so sometimes it is required. 
We absolutely do not use camera to preview the image.

recentChanges:
Refreshed version (2020):
- Widget freezing bug fixed
- Refreshed theme and icons
- Optimization of speed and stability
comments: NO ADS! Creator of the app definitely understands what the people want and how they want it. When you first download the app and turn the app on it will let you know if it will work with your phone or not. (Probably to do with different operating systems and the ability to support the software used to create the app) NOTE!: my phone is a Samsung Galaxy S10 and it works great!

I really like the app. It's a flashlight so it's hard to get wrong. The main reason I downloaded it was because it supported gestures. You can turn the phone on by shaking the phone side ways twice. The problem I have with it is the app has to be running for it to work. It doesn't run in the background and I tried to enable "Accessibility Service" permissions to but it won't let me. If you make it to where it runs in background and I can use gestures without opening app first. 5 star app.
having to use an old phone with no build-in flashlight, this one is great. turns on right when I launch it, and I've had no issues. no intrusive ads, annoying crashes, nothing. good job 👍

This flashlight has never failed and i LOVE LOVE LOVE not being interrupted by ads. And i don't have to worry about moments of dimmness 😂😂 The app is very convenient to have. I am disabled and i use it to help reading certain colors in articles and at night with moving around my home. It is also great to have when walking at night ,bc i use crutches and really need to see where i am stepping. Forgive me for not thinking to add these things the first time. Thank you for this app!!
A bit complicated to use; requiring a few steps to engage. I'd have added an extra "star" if it could be made to stay lit when switching among other apps.

title: Pikmykid Parent
description:
Introducing the new 2021 Pikmykid app!

Manage your kid’s pick-up from school or child-care center. “Announce” your arrival to pick up your kid, Schedule carpools, Delegate pick-up duties to friends and family, Get real time alerts on bus-riders, after school programs and more…

Pikmykid brings you the power to manage your kid’s pick-up schedule and talk to your school directly from your App. Listed below are the functionalities:-

Automatically sequence your car in the car arrival queue
“Announce” all the kids you are picking up including those delegated to you.
Schedule the dismissal for each school day in a calendar
Schedule and manage car pools 
Get real time status updates on your kid’s dismissal
Delegate pick up duties to friends & family with time bound authentications
Easy & quick child-care pick-ups
Real time alerts when kid boards the school bus/departs for after-school program
Real time alerts when the bus is running late
Secure mobile authentication protocol for kids safety and security
Last minute change to pick-up mode or early dismissal is easy to manage

Pikmykid is a comprehensive end to end solution for managing the entire student dismissal process in a smart, secure & expeditious manner and provide real time updates and change management options to parents. Ask you school if they are using the Pikmykid application yet?

comments: I'd give it 0 stars if I could. Spins and spins, force closes over and over...support within the app doesn't work. Email support told me it looked all set up and linked me to their training videos. Thanks, if your training videos answered my questions and resolved the continuous spinning and force closing, I wouldn't have emailed support in the first place! Not looking forward to using this app this year, nor looking forward to teaching my kids 60-something year old grandparents how to use it.
Added my kid. Support was quick. Went to pick up my kid. Kid no longer in associated with my account. Support ticket submission broken. Crashes. Bad experience.
I love this app makes it easy to pick my children up after school. They are so helpful and on top of their emails. Thank you 😊 I really recommend this app.
Effing Useless. 1st day of school, app won't load, just spins, then screens are blank, no idea if it's working,I'd have done better to wave a homemade sign.
TERRIBLE! I hope my kids school did not pay to use this service. If they did they better ask for a refund! Would give 0 stars or negative if I could. Schools looking to use this service DO NOT DO IT!

title: Cozi Family Organizer
description:
Cozi Family Organizer is the surprisingly simple way to manage everyday family life. With a shared calendar, reminders, grocery list and more, Cozi is a 3-time Mom’s Choice Award Winner and The TODAY Show “must-have app” for a better life.

Cozi is free, easy to use, and available from any mobile device or computer.

FAMILY CALENDAR
• Keep track of everyone’s schedules in one place with a simple color-coded calendar
• Set reminders for yourself or others in the family so no one misses practice or an important event
• Send automated daily or weekly agenda emails to any family member
• Subscribe to other calendars you use like your work calendar, school calendars, personal calendars, and team schedules.

SHOPPING LISTS & TO DO LISTS
• Everyone in the family will always know what you need at the grocery store
• See items added by other family members in real time, and never forget the one thing you really need to make dinner
• Create to do lists for anything - a shared to do list for the whole family, chore checklists for the kids, a vacation packing checklist.

RECIPE BOX
• Organize all your recipes in one place that's accessible anytime, anywhere - at home or at the store
• Add ingredients to your shopping list quickly and schedule meals onto your calendar
• Cook from your phone with helpful features like the no-dim button that keeps your screen on while you're cooking

WIDGETS
Home screen widgets give you quick access to your family calendar, shopping lists and to do lists. 

MORE ABOUT COZI
• Your Cozi calendar, shopping lists, to do items, and recipe box are accessible from any mobile device or computer
• No matter where or how your family signs in to Cozi, everyone will be looking at the same information
• The whole family shares one account that everyone can access using their own email address (as specified in Settings) and the shared family password
• International users please note: This is the U.S. version of Cozi Family Organizer and not all features may function as expected. 

COZI GOLD
All the features listed above are free. Cozi also offers an optional ad-free premium subscription called Cozi Gold which gives you additional features like Birthday Tracker, more reminders, mobile month view, change notifications and more. 

NOTE: If you experience any problems with your Cozi app, please don't hesitate to contact us directly at cozi.com/support. We're unable to help if you only leave a comment in the app store. Our support team is top notch and we want to help you!

comments: Love this app!! I am a mom of four, starting my own business and this app makes things easier. I love organization, details and schedules! This app is all that and more. I didn't purchase the upgrade for a couple months and would've been happy, however it was worth the purchase to have my children schedules, my schedule and all their school activites as well as family and friends birthdays and events so easily trackable!!! Amazing, I would recommend!!💜💜

I use this app solely for recipes and meal planning. It is super easy to save recipes that I find on line. It is also very easy to edit records. The improvements that I would like to see are 1) Being able to make folders so I can easily find recipes for Holidays, soups, vegetarian dishes, etc. 2) Be able to delete an individual item from the calendar, instead of all or nothing. 3) Be able to add recipes to a calendar where you can see what else is on there for the day.

Great app overall. 3 stars due to a simple yet absent feature: the ability to quickly reorder lists - alphabetising, for example. This would quickly eliminate the issue with duplicate items/having to scroll through the list, over and over, saving much time and frustration. This really should have been introduced along side the ability to make lists in the first place. 5/5 for everything else.

App is not connecting on my computer, says its not connecting because of internet issues. So I uninstalled it and now it is gone. I need this, I depend on this calendar. In the 3 years I have had it. I NEVER had any issues. I don't want to log into it every time I go to the browser. I need the app PLEASE.

Currently not connecting to the internet on my computer. All other apps that need the internet are not having a problem connecting. I REALLY NEED IT TO WORK AGAIN ON MY COMPUTER, it is so much easier to type appointments on the computer as apposed to my phone. If it hadn't stopped working on my computer I would give it 5 stars.

title: Email - Lightning Fast & Secure Mail
description:
Email by Edison is the simplified, customizable inbox experience that allows you to manage unlimited email accounts in a seamless way! Get emails faster, block spam, and never see an ad clogging up your inbox again.

Enjoy Office 365, Yahoo Mail, AOL Mail, Hotmail, Outlook, MS Exchange, IMAP, Alto, Gmail, iCloud, Comcast, Verizon, AT&T, and more all in one application. Built for phone and tablet usage. 

Google Play Store 2017 Android Excellence Program Winner

TheVerge - “The fastest email app around...” 
Android Authority - “…useful features...great user interface…”
TechCrunch- “…like you’ve given the mail app an upgrade…” 
CNET- “…imposes order on an unruly inbox…” 

With Edison Mail you get:
• Price Alert - Get cash back on shopping! Enable Price Alert and Edison will alert you if your recent purchases dropped in price from retailers that offer price matching so you can ask for a refund for the difference.
• All Your Inboxes The Way You Want - Manage all your mail accounts, easily switch between inboxes, optional Focus Inbox moves your important mail up front.
• Closer to Inbox Zero - View all your subscriptions in a tab, unsubscribe from junk with a tap, bulk delete, block certain senders from messaging you again, easily block spam forever
• Privacy From Prying Eyes - The only email to automatically block read receipt tracking pixels without degrading the email experience
• Built-In AI Assistant - Easily search bills & receipts, attachments, travel, entertainment, and more without disturbing your email organization. Get real-time travel notifications about your flight plans. Check package statuses all in one folder. With our new Assistant, see your upcoming meetings, travel itinerary, bills due, smart unsubscribe suggestions, and more at a glance.
• Fewer Mistakes - Always undo send and AI-based smart reply options.
• Less Digging - A full search engine in your phone that allows you to search through all your folders quickly and seamlessly.
• Customizable Notifications - Personalize sound and vibration settings. Only get alerted for the mail you care to see.

Privacy By Design is Our Promise to Our Users 
We put privacy first in all the things we do at Edison Software. We never target you for ads and prevent other companies from tracking you when you use our app. We also believe in being transparent and giving you choices. Please read our Privacy Policy to ensure that you are familiar with our practices and business model and to learn how you can manage your data.

Please send us your feature requests and feedback at mailsupport@edison.tech.

Special thanks to everyone who rates us 5 stars, or leaves kudos! Your support means the world to our team!


Price Alert is available in the US.
AI-Assistant available in the US, UK, Australia, Canada, and India.
descriptionHTML:
Email by Edison is the simplified, customizable inbox experience that allows you to manage unlimited email accounts in a seamless way! Get emails faster, block spam, and never see an ad clogging up your inbox again.

Enjoy Office 365, Yahoo Mail, AOL Mail, Hotmail, Outlook, MS Exchange, IMAP, Alto, Gmail, iCloud, Comcast, Verizon, AT&T, and more all in one application. Built for phone and tablet usage.

Google Play Store 2017 Android Excellence Program Winner

TheVerge - “The fastest email app around...”
Android Authority - “…useful features...great user interface…”
TechCrunch- “…like you’ve given the mail app an upgrade…”
CNET- “…imposes order on an unruly inbox…”

With Edison Mail you get:
• Price Alert - Get cash back on shopping! Enable Price Alert and Edison will alert you if your recent purchases dropped in price from retailers that offer price matching so you can ask for a refund for the difference.
• All Your Inboxes The Way You Want - Manage all your mail accounts, easily switch between inboxes, optional Focus Inbox moves your important mail up front.
• Closer to Inbox Zero - View all your subscriptions in a tab, unsubscribe from junk with a tap, bulk delete, block certain senders from messaging you again, easily block spam forever
• Privacy From Prying Eyes - The only email to automatically block read receipt tracking pixels without degrading the email experience
• Built-In AI Assistant - Easily search bills & receipts, attachments, travel, entertainment, and more without disturbing your email organization. Get real-time travel notifications about your flight plans. Check package statuses all in one folder. With our new Assistant, see your upcoming meetings, travel itinerary, bills due, smart unsubscribe suggestions, and more at a glance.
• Fewer Mistakes - Always undo send and AI-based smart reply options.
• Less Digging - A full search engine in your phone that allows you to search through all your folders quickly and seamlessly.
• Customizable Notifications - Personalize sound and vibration settings. Only get alerted for the mail you care to see.

Privacy By Design is Our Promise to Our Users
We put privacy first in all the things we do at Edison Software. We never target you for ads and prevent other companies from tracking you when you use our app. We also believe in being transparent and giving you choices. Please read our Privacy Policy to ensure that you are familiar with our practices and business model and to learn how you can manage your data.

Please send us your feature requests and feedback at mailsupport@edison.tech.

Special thanks to everyone who rates us 5 stars, or leaves kudos! Your support means the world to our team!


Price Alert is available in the US.
AI-Assistant available in the US, UK, Australia, Canada, and India.
summary: Lightning fast email for Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, OnePlus & more.
developerAddress: 1054 S De Anza Blvd, Suite 105, San Jose, CA, 95129
recentChanges:
Solve the problem that the AOL account cannot be logged in.
Fixed the issue that certain attachments cannot be downloaded or opened on some phones.
comments: Can't use due to Android:installLocation setting. App won't move to adoptable storage and I definitely don't have room to store email internally. Looked promising otherwise and such a simple thing spoils it. This is so easy and no reason not to do so. With modern fast SD the speed penalty is usually not noticable. Yes, many apps are guilty of the same thing, that doesn't make it right. The only way I can make space on my device is to delete other apps I use also guilty of this. Not one more!

Many parts are cool in theory, but the flaws far outshine the positive aspects. Here are some of the major issues: 》You can create folders for organizing your inbox, but cannot set any rules for how items get sorted into said folders 》Folders other than your main inbox do not refresh, show unread #, or show search results 》About 10% of the time, the app will randomly start reading my emails allowed. Closing the app in multitasking doesn't stop it & it's not my device settings. Full dealbreaker.

This is a nice email app, my favorite in fact, but it has one flaw that I've noticed. When using a VPN connection, a sent email is reported as successfully sent, but the email is not sent and will later be found in the Outbox. This has caused me problems and financial loss a few times. There should really be a 'failed' message if the email fails to send, regardless of the cause. Because of this flaw, I can no longer trust this as my primary email app.

This is the best email app I've found. Others I've tried have responded very sloooooowly, stopped syncing after reaching a certain # of emails, frozen & become non-responsive, . . . This app is fast and makes it easy to categorize emails & block junk email. It also offers an Assistant feature with a lot of handy tools. Glad I found it.

This program works very well. I've always had a preference to keep the in-boxes separate, and this combines them as a default but I've grown to like that. Teo taps and you can separate them anyway. Having them together makes searching much easier if you use several email accounts and aren't always sure which email you have used for any specific account. Search fu cation is very quick either way. I'm happy with this App.

title: My CenturyLink
description:
The My CenturyLink app brings management of your account and services into one easy place. 

You can use the app to: 

•	Connect your new service quickly with modem self-install. 
•	View and manage your bill payment with convenience and ease. 
•	Check your services, upgrade your Internet speed (if available in your area). 
•	Manage your settings. 
•	Visit Support to troubleshoot or optimize your service through self-help tools and videos. 
•	Get personalized alerts, so you can see the status of your order, or find out if there is an interruption to your Internet service. 
•	Plus, so much more. 

Additional features for our Secure WiFi customers (Secure WiFi is available on compatible modems leased from CenturyLink): 

•	Parental controls to guard against inappropriate web content. 
•	Pause and resume internet access of devices on our WiFi. 
•	Schedule online and offline times for devices and users. 

Learn more about Secure WiFi by visiting https://centurylink.com/home/help/internet/secure-wifi 
 
We're here to help! You can get in touch via http://www.centurylink.com/contact

summary: Management of your account and services into one easy place.
developerAddress: Monroe, Louisiana
recentChanges:
With each new release, we are always resolving bugs and working on improvements to the visual design. This update includes:

• Resolved issue where 'Understanding your bill' video could not be displayed

We're here to help! You can get in touch via http://www.centurylink.com/contact or on Twitter @CenturyLinkHelp
comments: If I had one wish I would gladly use it to put this internet company out of business. My internet goes down around 5 times per day! We've made several calls to report it and they always tell us we have too many devices connected.....we only use 1 device! It shows the one device and when they see that Every.single.time. they say "hmm thats strange idk whats going on. It does say you have several dropped connections. We can schedule a repairman to come out." Only THEY NEVER SHOW UP! YOU OWE ME FOR

They screwed up my rate plan, disconnected my service due to their error, they required a service technician appointment in order to repair my home service (eight day wait for a service call), the service technician was unable to reestablish my service because the actual problem was in CenturyLink software. After service was finally reestablished CenturyLink over billed my account for $240. This issue will require another hour plus of my time on the phone correcting my billing.

Every time I try to log in it seems to be having technical difficulties. Great app for an internet provider when you can't log in. It also doesn't provide a phone number for you to call when the app inevitably doesn't work.

I wanted to pay my bill with my bank account, and the only option was the one that charges a fee. Before, I could make an online payment with no charges. This may not seem like a big amount to you, but over time it can really add up. I want to be able to use my bank account without a fee.

Slow wifi and century Link showed some other network on my billing statement and provided devices using said network and I thought I had security breach and spent hours dealing with that issue. Also, never notified me if McAfee download except if I happened to open up my account online.

recentChanges: We have added manual recording feature. You can start recording by tapping on the floating widget or by double-clicking the volume up button during the call.
comments: Best one I have found. Other person's voice is much lower volume than yours. Can this be fixed? You can locate the actual mp3 files in storage. "SMSRobot" is the name of the app development company. Appliqato is another good one. BTW, just because phone storage uses same technology as memory, "memory" does NOT equal "storage". So please don't say, "memory", when you mean storage. Memory is where the program code is located so the CPU can read it directly while running the app.

looks good, but the other person's voice is not audible, which is kind of the point of the app. After 2 recorded calls I was asked to rate it. Seemd to be very user friendly, but unfortunately not very useful...
Paid for removing Ad, the premium version. But when saving the recording, Ads are poping up. Also the recording's voice is so tiny that it can be hardly heard.
I can't even describe how easy and simple this app is. Bam two clicks, I recording everything my stepmom says. She will run the day she crossed me!!
So let's you record but then not listen to the recording. Has a list of them and all you can do is put a tick on them there is no other option. Not sure of the point of the damn tick

title: TeamViewer Remote Control
description:
Use this app to remotely control other devices
Want to remote into this device? > Download the QuickSupport app

Remote into another computer, smartphone or tablet, while you are on the road!
TeamViewer provides easy, fast and secure remote access and is already used on more than 1 billion devices worldwide.

Use cases:
- Control computers (Windows, Mac OS, Linux) remotely as if you were sitting right in front of them
-- Provide spontaneous support or administer unattended computers (e.g. servers)
- Remotely control other mobile devices (Android, Windows 10 Mobile)

Key Features: 
- Screen sharing and complete remote control of other devices
- Intuitive touch and control gestures 
- File transfer in both directions
- Computers & Contacts management
- Chat
- Sound and HD video transmission in real-time
- Highest security standards: 256 Bit AES Session Encoding, 2048 Bit RSA Key Exchange 
- Plus so much more …

Quick guide:
1. Install this app 
2. On the device you want to connect to, download TeamViewer QuickSupport
3. Enter the ID from the QuickSupport app into the ID field and connect
