recentChanges:
- Added more device information to Remote Management Monitoring endpoints
- Minor fixes and improvements
comments: I love TeamViewer. I've used it for years for personal use. the only reason I'm giving less than 5 stars is because when I close the app it kicks off my screensaver and leaves a message about not using it for work use... I use it for personal use to access my home PC when I need something that's there and nothing else. I wish there was a way to disable that notification.

Keeps thinking I'm using for business rather than personal on some of my devices (latest being my ipad). You have to fill a form and send to them and wait weeks for a response to get yourself cleared. Very inconvenient. They don't have an affordable personal plan to avoid this either. The false flagging makes TeamViewer unusable when this happens. Too bad because it works great when it works.

With the exception of the difficulty to resize windows by the edges (because my tablet lacks a mouse), this is incredible. I've started using TeamViewer's multiple implementations to administrate my whole home network. It's beautiful, and the fact I can even do it from my tablet is just nuts!

I prefer TeamViewer over EVERY remote management tool for my personal use. It makes me the favorite son because M&D know I'm just a click away from being able to help them conquer their technological difficulties. I recommend this software to previous businesses I have worked for because it allows use over SmartPhones and PCs alike without sacrificing features. I use an LG Wing 5G SmartPhone so I'm able to see a whole desktop screen on the top and a keyboard on the Swivel screen which is BADASS!

ve been restricted due to "commercial use". ive used TV for about 5yrs and all i do is occasionally login to my desktop pc to check my game is still running yet somehow im considered commercial?? anyways, i followed their link to fill out a form to ask them to review my account. So i login via their bogus website which takes several attempts cos we have to tick a buggy af box to prove we're human, approve all cookies, auth my details to be viewed and then... Nudda... broken link GG. ANYDESK ;)

title: Chrome Beta
description:
Welcome to Chrome Beta for Android!

• Preview the latest features: Try out the newest features. (Sometimes these may be a little rough around the edges.)
• Give early feedback: Let us know what you think and help make Chrome for Android a better browser.

You can install Chrome Beta alongside your current version of Chrome for Android.

summary: The speed and simplicity of Chrome, now on your Android device in beta.
developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges: Our latest release contains stability and performance fixes.  More information can be found on the Chrome Releases blog at http://goo.gl/CCPRW
comments: I love this and I've supported everything Google... But lately I have random spam websites popping up on their own tabs and it's really frustrating that you don't have a block website ability like I do on my laptop, unless I want to pay to have blocksite??? Like the other review said you don't even protect against the pop up ads. Switching to Duck Duck Go now. I even have a Chromebook!!!!

Recently unable to use due to autofill crashing the browser. Anytime I try to autofill a field, whether its an email address, name, address, etc. the browser crashes. Clearing cache didn't help, uninstalling and reinstalling didn't help. Using the Chrome release channel browser works fine, however.

After my recent update I am unable to see the news articles listed on my homepage. They start to open and then I have a blank page. Very disappointing. Also unable to load any sites. Again blank pages. Guess I'll go back to Chrome.
It's got it's issues but what doesn't? It's the best most customizable browser without all the BS I've seen personally. I'd definitely recommend downloading it (and do often) to others.
Love the doublescreen when you add another tab, so cool, i can look up thinds while a video is playing or a paragraph, best ever, thank you!!!!

title: Microsoft Lens - PDF Scanner
description:
Microsoft Lens (formerly Microsoft Office Lens) trims, enhances, and makes pictures of whiteboards and documents readable. 
You can use Microsoft Lens to convert images to PDF, Word, PowerPoint, and Excel files, digitize printed or handwritten text, and save to OneNote, OneDrive, or your local device. You can even import images that are already on your device using Gallery.

PRODUCTIVITY AT WORK   
•	Scan and upload all your notes, receipts, and documents
•	Capture whiteboard at end of the meeting to keep those action items on track
•	Scan printed text or handwritten meeting notes to edit and share later
•	Keep your business networking contacts handy by scanning business cards and saving them to your contact list
•	Choose to save as PDF, Image, Word or PowerPoint formats into OneNote, OneDrive, or local device as location

PRODUCTIVITY AT SCHOOL  
•	Scan classroom handouts and annotate them in Word and OneNote
•	Scan handwritten notes to digitize and edit later (works with English only)
•	Take a picture of the whiteboard or blackboard to reference later, even if you're offline
•	Keep class notes and your own research organized with the seamless integration with OneNote
  
By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/olensandterms.

summary: Pocket PDF scanner with integrated OCR
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: This application is amazing for creating documents such as PDFs, images etc. for my school projects. The major part of the application i.e. scanning documents is flawless and I highly recommend it over any other scanner. There is one really minor issue I am facing with the application recently though. Not really a bug but it irritates me a lot. Whenever I make a PDF with a file name containing characters such as comma and full stop, the scanner replaces those characters with an underscore _ . It frustrates me because I have to go on changing it back to the former characters on my computer. Comma and full stop are not the two of the characters that file names on Windows don't support \ / : * ? " < > | so I don't understand why this happens.
It is difficult to use image to pdf tool. I can't select images freely for converting them into pdf. I'm forced to select images quickly which is irritating😖😫😡

This Microsoft Lens is really an amazing app for creating documents and also filtering them. I personally use this app to create documents every time. It is a great 👍 app. The reason for three stars is that 1. The process of applying filters is very slow. 2. There is limitation for creating documents. A single document can't hve more than 30 pages which is very bad experience. I suggest Microsoft Corporation to get rid of these issues. Thank you Microsoft Corporation for this great app.
Very irritating app it was working fine but from some days it doesn't work if I took whole page it was taking half it is so irritating
Very nice!!! It can create any type of document....I don't know why people use adobe scanner instead of this.

title: QuickBooks Time Tracker
description:
QuickBooks Time Tracker (formerly TSheets Time Tracker) is a cloud-based time tracking and employee scheduling app that allows your employees to clock in and out from the job site with the devices they’ve already got in their pockets.
 
Accurate, electronic time data replaces paper timesheets and makes payroll and invoicing faster and less costly. QuickBooks Time Tracker also accurately tracks time and GPS points (even without cell or internet service), then automatically syncs when back in service, making it a better (and cheaper) alternative to geo-fencing.
 
With a “Who’s Working” feature, it’s easy to track your employees’ location and see who’s working on what in real time. QuickBooks Time Tracker also features in-app scheduling that allows you to manage drag and drop shifts, assign jobs, see who’s working at a glance, and send alerts to managers if employees haven’t clocked in for a job or shift as scheduled.
  
GAME CHANGING FEATURES
• Mobile app time tracking for employees on the move: clock in/out, change job codes, edit and calculate timesheets, see work schedule changes, and add notes on the go
• QuickBooks, Square, and Gusto integrations (and more!) to simplify your back office
• In-app scheduling lets employees easily clock in and clock out of assigned jobs or shifts
• On-the-clock GPS tracking, even when employees are out-of-service (cost-effective alternative to geofencing!)
• Push, text & email alerts that are triggered if employees don’t clock in as scheduled, or approach overtime limits
• Save 2-8% on gross payroll costs & eliminate hours of manual data entry
 
ALSO INCLUDED
• Seamless integration with QuickBooks Online & QuickBooks for PC (Pro, Premier, & Enterprise)
• Integrations with popular payroll, accounting, invoicing software
• Powerful, real-time reports in multiple formats (PDF, CSV, online, HTML)
• Safe data storage and detailed time log to protect you against labor disputes and audits
• Configurations for DCAA/DOL compliance
• Developer open API
 
THERE'S MORE TO LOVE...
 
TRACK TIME ⏲️
• Track employee hours accurately with a real-time virtual time clock
• Easily switch between job codes, pause time recording, or take a break
• Employees clock in to new shifts and jobs right from the schedule
• Track work time against multi-level job codes, projects, locations, clients, and more
• See where your employees are located on one map view, with GPS tracking (Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.)

 
SCHEDULE ANYWHERE ⏲️
• Schedule work hours by job or by shift with our easy-to-use schedule builder
• Easily create or modify a schedule with drag-and-drop shifts
• Sync work schedules with Apple iCal, Microsoft Outlook or Google Calendar.
• Notifications let employees know when a new schedule is published or if there are shift changes.
• Get notifications if employees don’t clock in to a job or shift as scheduled
 
MANAGE TIME ⏲️
• Edit, delete, or approve timesheets with a click
• Set overtime alerts to notify employees and managers as work time limits approach
• See who’s working and where, even on the go, from one dashboard
• Track PTO, sick day, holiday, or vacation time accruals for employees
 
REPORT TIME ⏲️
• See work day and week totals at a glance
• Easily access a breakdown of employee hours by employee, job, customer, or location
• View timer history with map 
• Keep a black-box history of all edits and deletions, in case of an audit
 
PLUS, using the web dashboard, managers can:
• Manage PTO, leave, holiday & vacation time
• Schedule overtime alerts
• Set up custom approvals

SUPPORT, CUSTOMER RATED  ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐
QuickBooks Time Tracker offers free unlimited phone, email, and chat support to all of our customers. Have a question? We’re always happy to help!
 
Phone: 888.836.2720
Email: qbtimehelp@intuit.com

summary: Track employee time and manage work schedules. Report hours & PTO. GPS enabled.
developerAddress:
7535 Torrey Santa Fe Road
San Diego, CA 92129
recentChanges:
What’s improved
Having battery optimization turned on used to make our location feature a little lazy. It’s more accurate now while you’re saving that precious power.
comments: This app is flawed in at least two critical ways: It often lost timecard notes that I saved, which contained info about my workday. My boss spent a long time on the phone with customer support and still got nowhere. And, after setting up fingerprint lock to log in, then having my phone's fingerprint sensor malfunction, the app did not allow me the option of logging in with my password. Needless to say, we quit using it after a month, and the information on the notes is lost forever. Intuit blows

New QuickBooks GPS tracking is extremely inaccurate & faulty compared to the previous TSheets version. "Notes" is a good feature but items written in this section, even after saving, will disappear. Have also had many occasions where Notes that were successfully saved disappeared 3-4 days later. Did not have these issues with TSheets. "Take a Break" is inconveniently placed & when accidentally started there is no way to stop it until the 30 minutes are up.

Works pretty well but make sure that you have your notes filled in or it won't clock you out. I wish there was an audible alarm when this happens because it's easy to not notice when you are busy and find out hours later you are still on the clock. also, if I add notes immediately upon signing in they don't always get saved.

I was a Tshhets customer before the sold to Intuit and integrated it into QBO. I used to love this app. Ever since giving it over to Intuit, it is absolutely disfuctional. The mobile. app doesn't even let you log in. The Web app constantly logs you out then mixes up it's log in with QBO. I have to try log in 2-3 times before it goes to tsheets. Yesterday I had to log back in 6 times, essentially everytime I need to log out of a client for break or switch clients, I get kicked all the way out.

Terrible app. First two days using it after adding my hours and fixing them because I kept finding the hours changed and the block system it uses to be confusing. Smh. Making sure to wrote my hours down separately in case I have any more issues with hours being changed or missing after entering them/editing.

title: WPS Office - Free Office Suite for Word,PDF,Excel
description:
★ WPS Office-Free Office suite for Word, PDF, Excel, is an all-in-one office suite integrates Word, PDF, Excel, PowerPoint, Forms, Cloud Storage, Online Editing, Template library and Sharing. Access various WPS Office functions through mobile devices, such as scan PDF files, edit slides, convert spreadsheets, or view documents anytime, anywhere.

★ WPS Office is compatible with MS Office 365 but Free in basic functions, smarter & lighter.In addition, WPS Office can work perfectly with Google Classroom, Zoom, Slack and Google Drive.

 「Features of WPS Office 」
1. Powerful Office Suite on your Android device 
• Using templates to start editing your budget, presentations, resumes, documents and other files.
•Using tools to convert and process Document, PDF and images.
•Easy to create, edit, share word documents and collaborated on with others in real-time.

2. Scan, view, edit, convert PDF on your Android device
• Free PDF reader that can open, view, share and comment on PDFs anywhere and on any device
• Convert all Office documents (Word, Text, Excel, PowerPoint, doc) to PDF
• Scan paper documents/convert images to PDF
• Support PDF annotation
• Signature is now supported in Document
• Support PDF extraction/split, PDF merge, PDF to Word/Excel/PPT
• Easily add and delete watermarks in PDF

3. Powerful cloud storage function, you are not afraid of losing documents
• Use WPS Cloud to manage all documents, synchronize in real time on mobile phones and computers, and easily and directly access and edit office documents
• Save documents to third-party clouds: Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, Evernote and OneDrive.

4. Solutions for working remotely on Android devices
• 1G free cloud storage, support online editing and sharing of files, easy to build and join the cloud team
• Easy to share office documents via WIFI, NFC, DLNA, email, instant messaging, WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook and Twitter

Now available PC and Mac for free , please visit the following link: https://d.wps.com
Support page:  http://help.wps.com/Android-Office/

developerAddress: 6 RAFFLES QUAY #14-06 SINGAPORE
recentChanges:
Version 14.7.1 is released! The updates are shown as follow:
1.Decompress files: The experience of decompressing files has been promoted, and you can decompress and save files to the cloud.
2.Eye-protection Mode: Version 14.7.1 come with a brand-new eye-protection mode to meet different reading situations.

comments: When you select text, it puts up a black box that completely blocks further progress. Cannot use colors on text, and cannot use 1/2 numbers for text size. Now after latest upgrade can't rename a file or close one. Good job . Stupid ad captures the whole phone. Cannot back out. Nothing has changed. Won't show all (all) pictures when inserting a pic. Totally worthless as is. How else can you screw it up ? can't back out. Have to hit the III button and then wipe of the screen to close.

Very easy to use, even on the mobile! Storage is fantastic, and convenient; I have used it for job hunting, as I composed, and had my resume stored on my mobile. Having this app on my phone is a game changer, very satisfied.

This is really a great office app. I use it mainly because it has support for multiple platform. WPS alone can handle all types of documents. I use this in my laptop, tab and android. The 20 GB online storage which comes with subscription helps a lot. I feel like the subscription price should be cheaper.

It is one hundred times better than any application I even used! And because my job depends on such good apps then I really appreciate. I just wish if it could give more free template,because people like me who are living in Iran Or countries like Iran where we can not buy the premium ,are really far from using its awesome templates. Again so appreciate for your perfect performance.

It's a very fast app and is very helpful for those who don't want to use different apps for each type of pdf as WPS office supports mostly all types of PDFs and stuff.... and there are other facilities also like it helps to view the pdf from the page you had left it....as a student It was really helpful for me....I totally recommend this app for people who face issues with pdfs and other files....

Microsoft SwiftKey is the intelligent keyboard that learns your writing style, so you can type faster.
Use your personalized keyboard to type and send emoji, GIFs and more just the way you like.

recentChanges: We've switched GIF provider to Tenor and now remember your recent GIFs
comments: Incredibly smooth like butter and one of the most responsive keyboards I've used. The keys are nice and big, which is great on a big phone. The customisation is terrible, almost 1 star worthy. There's simply nothing you can do besides sticking an image behind the keys lol. This has quickly become one of my fav keyboards but it could be a lot better in terms of customisation.

Good writing in the beginning. But in my experience, it gets bad over time. Why memorize one-off stylistic capitalizations of regular words? Why does it need to learn hours (5h45, 9h30 etc)? Why can't the message for incognito be skipped? Why not offer a number pad button? And why - oh why - would you AUTOMATICALLY add a space before colons and semicolons (which is absolutely insane)? Please add more linguists to your team.

This app is definitely getting worse. Every txt I send now unless I proof read is way off the mark. Because of this takes up time and defeats the purpose of predictive txt. What's has gone wrong? Used to be much better than this. Even typing this post is hit and miss. Can remember sending a txt and when the recipient questioned what I meant the read was nothing like I wanted to say. So far out and throws predictions in that have nothing to do with my conversation at all. Please look into this.

FREAKING AUTOSPACES! For the love of god please make it a toggle. And some general improvements like being able to select letters in one go rather than snapping the cursor at the end of the word in each tap. It's pain when the keyboard fights with me when I'm trying to select a letter and sends the cursor at the end of the word everytime.

Used To Work Great on my old phone 1+6T. No battery-related issues or notifications from the OS that this app is draining my battery. But on my 1+8T, the OS constantly alerts me that SwiftKey is draining my battery. Seems like the app isn't optimized for newer devices since it keeps draining my battery. Not recommended for newer phones. Did I mention it drains my battery.

title: Airtel Thanks – Recharge, Bill Pay, UPI & Bank

My Airtel app is now Airtel Thanks, the all-in-one app for UPI Payment using BHIM UPI, Wynk Music, Bank, Recharge and Money Transfer. You can manage all your Airtel services from this Airtel app and also enjoy the exclusive Airtel offers.

They just give you a complaint number never work over that complaint. Now iam going to do mnp in jio

Otherwise they need to develop more powerful app. App star rating is below to zero for the same. They also not provide monthly plan update. I need to change it with new plan for government employees benift.

Numerous problems have cropped up. Profile information cannot be added. App is not reliable enough for a recharge related transaction. Lot of misses than hits. Will refuse to work when network is poor. Dismal network performance. Miss the good old times. Probably uses band 40 LTE. Discounts are largely ineffective. Instead of being queued upon a new recharge replaces the existing one (s) completely. Implement an automated query section or digital assistant for efficient resolution of problems.

Pretty much useless app. I have a year long unlimited plan but my recharge is not reflecting in the transaction history. And I cant even get a receipt for the same. There is no human being that one can speak to resolve this issue. Airtel thinks FAQs can solve all problems. It doesn't. Realiry check. Here is an irate customer who has a gebuine problem that you can't resolve.

title: Cox Panoramic Wifi
description:
Panoramic Wifi app supports CGM4141 and TG1682 Panoramic Wifi Gateways. 
 
The Panoramic Wifi App gives you control over your home network like you have never seen before. It enhances your in-home wifi experience from Cox with new levels of personalization and control.  Your app lets you easily manage all sorts of wifi options, including the ability to pause devices, set simple device names and see the top bandwidth users. You can manage your family by setting profiles, pausing wifi for dinner or bedtime as well as easier troubleshooting. 
 
The Panoramic Wifi App is required for installation of Panoramic Wifi Pods. 
 
Key App Features: 
- Cox User ID: No extra passwords to remember, just control with your Cox Primary User ID and Password 
- Manage your wifi network name and password. 
- Device Naming: See what devices are connected to your wifi network and give them nicknames for easy reference. 
- Profiles: Create profiles, like one for each family member, and assign devices to profiles 
- Parental Control: Manage device profiles to set bed times or limit when the internet can be accessed. You can pause all the devices for dinner! 
- Pause Wifi: Take any device or profile off the internet with a click 
- Advanced Security: Protection for your connected devices 
- Easy to Troubleshoot: Intuitive app tells you about errors without contacting tech support 
- Pods: Add and manage Panoramic Wifi Pod extenders to reduce or eliminate dead spots in your home 
 
Requirements:
- Cox Panoramic Wifi Subscription
- Cox Panoramic Wifi CGM4141 or TG1682 Gateway (check the label on the bottom of your Gateway for "PN: CGM4141COX" or "TG1682G")
- Cox primary user ID and password
 
Need Help Signing In:
- Create a Cox user ID and password: cox.com/register
- Look up your existing Cox User ID or reset your password: cox.com/password

comments: Horrible service. Sadly it's the only thing available in our new area. Somehow cox gigablast doesn't last the whole month and adds extra fees to keep the fast connection but when we had CenturyLink it lasted all month and we had more laptops and phones connected. The panoramic keeps disconnected from our TVs and I have to restart the whole modem at least twice a week. This service is a joke and to make matters worst its more expensive than CenturyLink. I got my money's work with CL. Cox sucks!

Pay for extra Speed never get as much as i pay for service is constantly either out or running slow kicking me from my games or effecting my streaming just seems like they really need to follow the lead of comcast and update all there connections and offer there services at a reasonable price what we pay at cox is double what they would charge and only half as good being a internet and cable tyrant can only last so long care for your customers not destroy there faith in ya.

VERY HELPFUL especially if you have kids. Would have gave 4.5 Stars. Not 5 because sometimes (Rarely) it doesnt seem to register when you change cutoff times or struggles to load up period. I do recommend!

For the past several nights, you get 1 star, I have gigablast and every night between 10 pm & midnight, the net slows down to almost nothing, download speed, at 1.16 mb. upload speed, at almost, NOTHING, BAD FOR HOME ALARM SYSYEM, Been customer for to long.
Service is constantly going out. They put the main box in one end of the house instead of in the middle of it so we installed 2 boosters and still have sketchy service at the other end.

title: Simple Calendar: Scheduling, Agenda & Reminder App
description:
Simple Calendar is a highly customizable, offline calendar app. Android mobile users have an agenda planner in your pocket, designed to do exactly what a personal tiny calendar should do in 2021. No complicated features, unnecessary permissions, or ads!

Daily Schedule: Take Control of Your Time
Whether you are looking for a simple mobile appointment reminder, or you’re organizing single and recurring events, business meetings, appointments, birthdays, anniversary reminders, or anything else. Simple Calendar makes it easy to stay organized. The calendar widget has an incredible variety of customization options: customize event reminders, notification appearance, tiny calendar reminders widget, and how the calendar app looks.

Schedule Planner: Plan Your Day
Day planner and family organizer in one - check your upcoming agenda, schedule business meetings, events & appointments easily. Reminders will keep you on time and informed on your daily schedule. This 2021 calendar widget is remarkably easy to use. You can even view everything as a simple list of events rather than in a monthly view, so you know exactly what’s coming up in your life and how to organize and plan your agenda. 

Simple Calendar Features

✔️ The Best User Experience
➕ No ads or annoying popups, truly great user experience!
➕ No internet access needed, giving you more privacy, security, and stability
➕ Emphasis on beauty and simplicity – does what a personal event manager needs to do!

✔️ Flexibility for Your Productivity
➕ Calendar Widget supports exporting & importing events via .ics files
➕ Export settings to .txt files to import to another device
➕ Flexible event creation – times, duration, reminders, powerful repetition rules
➕ CalDAV support for syncing events via Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, Nextcloud, Exchange, etc

✔️ Personalized Just for You
➕ Schedule planner - customize and change sound, looping, audio stream, vibrations
➕ Calendar widget - Colorful Calendar and customizable themes
➕ Open source tiny calendar, translated into 30+ languages
➕ Plan your day with others - ability to share events fast on social media, emails, etc
➕ Family Organizer - with hasslefree event duplication, organization and time management

✔️ Organization and Time Management
➕ Day planner - the agenda planner will help you to organize your day
➕ Weekly planner - staying ahead of your busy weekly schedule has never been easier
➕ Itinerary manager - business calendar shared between teams at work
➕ Appointment scheduler - organize and maintain your agenda with ease.
➕ Planning app - easy to use personal event, appointment reminder, and schedule planner free
➕ Plan your day - manage. your day with this android schedule planner free, event & family organizer

✔️ #1 Calendar App
➕ Import holidays, contact birthdays and anniversaries easily
➕ Filter personal events quickly by event type
➕ Activity Scheduler
➕ Reminders widget with handy snooze option
➕ Daily schedule and event location, shown on a map
➕ Quick business calendar, or personal digital agenda
➕ Quickly switch between daily, weekly, monthly, yearly & event views

comments: I gave you a bad rating before, but now I see it wasn't your fault. It's the Xiaomi MIUI 12 problem. I can't make the alarm ring no matter what. I've tried all the battery, access, whatever options and it still doesn't work. MIUI seems to be full of bugs. I'll give you a good rating because the app is actually very good and easy to use.

I am using the free version 5.2.9 as a calendar only. It is simple and efficient with all the basic features. Good to know that there is a upgrade posibility if my requirements should increase in future. I also enabled CALDAV synchronization through a provider/server. Very happy with fast and precise answers from support. Hope it will stay like this. Thank you.

Backup feature is excellent, and exactly what i was looking for in a Calendar! Price for full service is excellent. Holidays are missing: Halloween, Easter, St Patrick's Day, and maybe others. Please add all Holidays. I will make it a 5 star rating once you add all the missing Holidays.

I LOST EVERYTHING! I have used this app for a while now and have loved it. I use this app to balance my work, I am starting a new business and I use this app to organise my bookings. I decided to upgrade to the pro version because I use this app a lot. Then I lost all of my bookings and appointments! I am completely screwed! Please help me get my bookings back and I will remove this review. I have also emailed about this problem and not yet got a response.
Works great, but... I seem to be unable to delete events in the calendar, which causes me many issues. First off - being unable to delete them makes it so that I can't delete mistakes and/or tests.

title: MyJio: For Everything Jio
description:
MyJio is your one stop destination for recharges, UPI & payments, managing Jio devices, Movies, Music, News, Games, Quizzes, & a lot more

• MyJio Home:
Shortcuts to your favourite features across the app, hottest music & movies, games & more

• Account details:
i. Balance & usage: View real-time account balance or amount due for payments and usage patterns for calls, data and SMS
ii. Recharges: Get calendar reminder for your due recharges!
iii. Multiple accounts: Easily link and manage Jio accounts using your profile
iv. JioTunes: Set or manage your JioTunes. Let music express your mood!

• Settings:
i. Profile settings: Customise your personal profile and Jio account
ii. Manage devices: Manage your JioFiber devices with ease! Allow who connects to your JioFiber Wi-Fi, manage Wi-Fi names and passwords
iii. App language: Available in 14 languages!

• JioPay:
i. Payment instruments and wallets: Choose from a list of recharge plans and avail exciting offers. Link and pay with saved cards, wallets, and saved UPI IDs
ii. JioAutoPay: Set up AutoPay for hassle free payments

• JioCare: 
i. Live chat with us, in English or Hindi, for instant resolution
ii. Troubleshoot your network, recharge or any other issues and find resolution with ease
iii. Find answers to all your queries with comprehensive FAQs, How-to Videos & Helpful tips

• UPI: For your all payments 
i. Transfer money, pay rent or your milkman or electricity bills – all from one place 
ii. Scan and pay conveniently when you shop
iii. All your transactions are secured with UPI PIN

• JioMart:
Enjoy the best deals, offers and a wide selection of products at unbelievable prices!

• JioSaavn:
Explore a music library of more than 45 million songs. Enjoy music for every mood! Feeling happy, blue or in love, we've got you covered!

• JioNews: 
i. Home: Get breaking news in 13+ languages from top news sources and free access to 250+ e-papers
ii. Magazine: 800+ magazines on various category including Politics, Sports, Entertainment, Business, Technology, World News, Money, Jobs, Health, Kids & more
iii. Videos: Trending videos from 10+ genres including Bollywood, Fashion, Health, Technology, Sports & more
iv. Live TV: Watch live news and videos from 190+ channels

• JioCinema
Browse through popular movies and blockbusters, latest trailers, original web series, your favourite TV shows and more

• JioEngage: 
We have boxes full of amazing prizes – just for you. Play exciting games, participate in quizzes and win them all!

• JioCloud: 
Now backup your photos, videos, audio, contacts and documents and access them, anytime, anywhere

• Stories: 
From magazines to health tips, learning English to cooking fish, we have curated a list of videos and reads well over from 80+ popular papers & magazines

• JioGames:
A library of games at your fingertips. Get exclusive benefits with every game! 

• EasyGov:
i. Discover Government welfare schemes, services and jobs for yourself, family members and others
ii. Check eligibility and get information about how to apply and documents required for various State and Central Government schemes
iii. Get real time updates and notifications on Government to Citizen (G2C) services

• Not on Jio yet?
i. Get SIM or JioFiber: Get a new Jio SIM or port into Jio or book your JioFiber connection!
ii. Track order: Know the status of your Jio orders
iii. Quick Recharge/Payment: Recharge or pay bills for any Jio number

• Your Digital Assistant: 
i. JioInteract: Talk to celebrities on JioInteract, the world’s first AI based engagement platform 
ii. HelloJio: The advanced voice assistant to solve all your problems! Ask for balance check or troubleshoot issues or find the latest movies. It’s that simple!

• Universal QR: 
Link accounts save contacts and much more with the Smart QR scanner

comments: It's such a pathetic service, never recommend anyone. Since day 1, it was started 3 days back and am start facing issues with internet and set-up box too, already logged the complainant and no one visited to check the issue, even i called the engenier and salesman too they never pick up my calls. I will definitely escalate this issue to social media now and need to disconnect my connection immediately.

Pathetically slow internet. Evertime i try the trouble shoot option it tells me to use internet at some other location or at another time as too many users are using the internet at the same time. If JIO does not have the capacity to provide 4g speeds to existing users it should stop enrolling new users as it only degrades the quality further. Stopped using one jio connection and changed backfrom postpaid to prepaid on other due to slow speeds.

This is the worst app I have ever used !! Everytime I recharge, it shows as upcoming plan and I cannot activate it ! Contacted their chat support and I was asked to click on the 'Activate Plan' button but even after the latest udpate, there is no such button at all ! I am so frustrated and disappointed as I am using this network for work from home and it is affecting my productivity. Will never recommend it to anyone ! I had mentioned that I already contacted chat support. Couldn't resolve !

Wish I could give 0 freaking star. I already have 7 months of plan left but out of nowhere it showed my plan expired. I restarted my phone, reinstalled the app, called 1991 and all but nothing changed. And then I recharged thinking I may have miscalculated and then I woke up and checked again. It was all there. Now I have 2 years worth of plan..and wasted money that I could have used somewhere else for now. Freaking useless.

Very bad service, I have recharged 2399rupess for one year. I am facing jio network issue problem since 02 days I have compliant to customer care service,but no anyone have solved my problem. Till now I am unable to call and use internet due to weak network signal, I want to give zero rating.

title: Calendar
description:
Simple Calendar - Easy Schedule & Agenda Planner has everything you need to organise your diary.

Proton Calendar is a personal calendar app that lets you take control of your daily tasks. With Calendar, you can quickly schedule meetings and events and get reminders about upcoming activities.

The interface in 2021 calendar with holidays is quite simple. To add an event to the calendar just tap the day and then move on to add an event and its duration. Add events, set reminders and even sync other digital calendars to stay on top of your routine like Trello: Organize anything with anyone, anywhere!

A Calendar Feature:
• Any.do app - any to do list app and daily planner
• aCalendar - Send and receive meeting invitations in Proton Calendar.
• Fanya - Todo Lists & Tasks Organizer - Add a special calendar for the birthdays of people in your Contacts list.
• Events from Gmail - Flight, hotel, concert, restaurant reservations and more are added to your calendar automatically.
• To-Do List - Use Reminders to create and view to-dos alongside your events. Remind Period Tracker - Period Calendar Ovulation Tracker.
• Goals - Add personal goals—like “run 3 times a week”—and Calendar will schedule time for them automatically.
• One Calendar - View all your calendar accounts in a single app and see all your events in List, Day, Week, or Month view.
• DigiCal Calendar Agenda - View and manage all your appointments, events and birthdays.
• Handy Calendar 2021 Reminder ToDo - Subscribe to calendars for holidays, your favorite sports teams, and more.

Simple Calendar - Easy Schedule & Agenda Planner
• Calendar Lite - Daily Planner, Event Schedule, Agenda Management in iCal
• XP Calendar - Manage your tasks, meetings and birthdays in iCal
• Different ways to view your icalendar - see all your events in List, month, week and day view.
• Listta: notes and to-do tasks - Create, manage, and view your fantastical tasks, agenda alongside your events in icalendar.
• Later - Schedule for Instagram - kalendar works with all calendars on your phone, including Exchange.

My Daily Planner: To Do List, Calendar, Organizer
Calendar offers various options to set reminders and program alarms so you don't forget any of your tasks. This helps ensure you arrive on time for any appointment or important reunion. You can always save important dates such as birthdays or anniversaries.

Simple Calendar to schedule your next meeting
My Calendar - Period Tracker is the best Ethiopian Calendar (ቀን መቁጠሪያ). Customizable calendar views, many Live Tile options, birthdays with photos and task management with task categories. Get My Daily Planner: To Do List, Calendar, Organizer.

USA Calendar with Holidays 2021
USA holiday calendar 2021 is a day planner and easy To Do Reminder with Alarm. Simple Calendar: daily planner, schedule maker is a free, professional and easy to use as bill calendar, appointment calendar and manage your business events and programs using Calendar Planner!

Appointment Calendar - Agenda, Tasks and Events
Keep track of your schedule and share it with others using My Calendar - Period Tracker. Simple Calendar is schedule planner, day planner, Proton Calendar and appointment calendar. Task Agenda: organize and remember your tasks!

Calendars: Planner & Reminders
With Calendar you should have no problem keeping track of all the activities and events in your daily life. Todoist: To-Do List, Tasks & Reminders

SYNC WITH GOOGLE CALENDAR, OUTLOOK AND EXCHANGE
There's no need to keep buying a new paper calendar every year because your Galaxy phone's digital Calendar has everything you need to organize your daily schedule. Add events, set reminders, and even sync other digital in google classroom, so you can always stay on top of your routine.

• Listta: notes and to-do tasks - Create, manage, and view your fantastical tasks, agenda alongside your events in icalendar.
• Later - Schedule for Instagram - kalendar works with all calendars on your phone, including Exchange.

My Daily Planner: To Do List, Calendar, Organizer
Calendar offers various options to set reminders and program alarms so you don't forget any of your tasks. This helps ensure you arrive on time for any appointment or important reunion. You can always save important dates such as birthdays or anniversaries.

Simple Calendar to schedule your next meeting
My Calendar - Period Tracker is the best Ethiopian Calendar (ቀን መቁጠሪያ). Customizable calendar views, many Live Tile options, birthdays with photos and task management with task categories. Get My Daily Planner: To Do List, Calendar, Organizer.

USA Calendar with Holidays 2021
USA holiday calendar 2021 is a day planner and easy To Do Reminder with Alarm. Simple Calendar: daily planner, schedule maker is a free, professional and easy to use as bill calendar, appointment calendar and manage your business events and programs using Calendar Planner!

Appointment Calendar - Agenda, Tasks and Events
Keep track of your schedule and share it with others using My Calendar - Period Tracker. Simple Calendar is schedule planner, day planner, Proton Calendar and appointment calendar. Task Agenda: organize and remember your tasks!

Calendars: Planner & Reminders
With Calendar you should have no problem keeping track of all the activities and events in your daily life. Todoist: To-Do List, Tasks & Reminders

SYNC WITH GOOGLE CALENDAR, OUTLOOK AND EXCHANGE
There's no need to keep buying a new paper calendar every year because your Galaxy phone's digital Calendar has everything you need to organize your daily schedule. Add events, set reminders, and even sync other digital in google classroom, so you can always stay on top of your routine.

developerAddress: Surat, Gujrat, India
comments: Too many ads to be useful. I usually try to get used to an app before I buy it, that is not possible with this app due to the intrusive ads. If the ad frequency/disruption were fixed, I think it would still be 4 stars. I don't really see the advantage over google calendar. Maybe im missing something

I'm constantly forgetting what day it is. I've been through 3 months of chemo and radiation and the doctor is telling me that I have chemo brain. It makes you to kind of lose your memory for about 6 months. So I sometimes have to use the app just to figure out what the day and date yet. Thank you for your help.

I use this app to figure out dates for my stories that take place in the future but I was bored today and scrolled as far in the past as I can. You can go back to 33 AD. Then I tried going as far forward and I'm convinced it's infinite. I've been scrolling for an hour and I'm still going after 6000

Glitchy +++. The widget doesn't load anything. Viewing the month of July in the App shows 27 days in July (no 28-31). Events/appointments don't display with an icon against the day they're assigned. Every action has an advert popup.
Lost all my appt. Info had put on calendar since 1st of year on July 29th. Too many ads and interference. I think the recent update caused problems I had not experienced before.

title: Simple Photo Widget

You can use photo widgets to:

💡Simply have fun

Features:

Supports Treemap, Uniform, and Hexagon layout for multiple photos

comments: Overall the app is very good. It allows me to have my photos scroll on my home screen. It is easy to select photos and configure the app. The app allows you to select your favorite photo app to launch when you click the picture, but sadly it doesn't open with the picture you clicked on so not very useful.

I like this app, but I found out that the displayed pictures quality is lower/slightly blurrer than the actual pictures. Even my phone's built-in picture widget (with, obviously, a lot less customization options) displays the pictures in their original quality. That's about the only bad thing about this app... But, sadly, this matters to me 'cos my pictures are HD and I want to see them in their original quality.😔

The app is good but the collage feature is giving me several problems. The app doesn't give you the option to reorganize the exact order and format of the collage so you have to resize it over and over until you get a format you like, but when I rotate my phone between landscape and portrait it will automatically reset and Chang the order, and I am sure the same thing would happen if you reset your phone. The app is useful but I will still looking for a replacement app until the issue is fixed.

Honestly, this app was very decent at the beginning and it gave me lots of options but recently it's saying "No available image" and when I go to update it, nothing happens. They told me to put it on something with a battery usage so it would stop and when I did so, it still continued. Please fix this issue soon cause I really like this app!!

It's exactly what I needed: adds the ability to put widgets with (or without) slideshows on your homescreen, and allowed me to set it to launch the photos app of my choice when I on it. I could even customize the shape which I didn't even need but it allows some cool stuff. Highly recommend

title: BlockSite - Stay Focused & Control Your Time
description:
Stay focused with BlockSite the app that improves productivity by blocking websites and apps that waste your time. Create custom block lists, schedule tasks or start a focus session to make sure you stay focused, productive and in control of your time.

BlockSite is considered an awesome self control app to regain time control as it enables you to control your browsing content by blocking apps and sites when you need to keep focused.

All it takes is a few simple clicks once downloaded and you’ll be able to avoid procrastination, increase concentration and stop wasting time.  You’ll also be able to stay more engaged with the world around you and make time for what matters most, both online and offline. 

So whether you’re a student, professional in the workplace or just want to implement better productivity and time management in your life by improving your digital habits, we can help.

⭐️Features⭐️

Want to know how to block a website? We’ve got you covered! Just add websites to your block list on and we’ll do the rest, we’ll even throw in some really funny images if you try and go on the sites while they’re blocked 💩

⏰Stay Focused App
Remove all distracting and harmful websites and apps from your life by blocking them while you need to stay focused and productive. You can even set yourself a focus timer and make sure you stay on track throughout the day while at work or school.

👨🏼‍💻Focus Mode
The work mode timer feature enables you to control your time via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes followed by a short break. With ‘Work Mode’ you can set times when to block websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary.

🔞Block Adult Content
Ever wondered how to block adult content on your device? Well now you can...easily! With the built in porn blocker that blocks all known adult sites by default making sure that you don’t see any inappropriate content.

📅Scheduling
Set up your own daily schedules and daily routines when you need to stay on track with the ‘Scheduling’ feature that enables you to set days and times when you can access certain sites and apps. It’s the best time management planner you could ever wish for, we promise!

⏳Time Management
Now your time management schedule will never look better! You’ll be able to get all your work done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

📱💻Sync
BlockSite is a cross-browser website/URL and app blocker that helps you to control your website usage and manage distractions and addictions. It is available on Google Chrome and can be synced between your desktop and mobile so you stay productive and have total control over your time wherever you are.

As one of the best productivity tools available, we can help you  procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You’ll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

BlockSite helps you stay focused and avoid distracting websites and apps by using Accessibility services to block them from opening. As part of this process, BlockSite receives and analyzes aggregated de-identified information about your mobile data and app use. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy: https://blocksite.co/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://blocksite.co/terms/

comments: Too easy to unlock by hitting the big red Unlock button and a quick swish of a pattern - in the middle of a planned two hour Work Mode. Found myself scrolling an app without even realizing I did it. It worked for awhile until I realized the SIMPLE workaround that does not even require me to close app.I guess this would work well for my kid, which is why I am giving it 3 stars. As a personal app for Blocking I give it 1 star. It doesn't Block anything, it just slows down access by 5 seconds, max.

It would be great if it actually blocked the site. The site will still populate and then you'll see a page overlapping it stating block site blocked it and you have to click out of that to go back to continue your search. Happens at least 5 times a day and I don't search the web that much. It's still very annoying just as much if not more than the site I want to block. Seems to defeat the purpose. Uninstalled.

This app is good but then there is only 1 issue that needs to be solved. I'm a premium user and I downloaded this app to curb certain addictions of mine. The only reason I went premium is because I felt like the uninstall feature would help me stay accountable. I soon realised I was wrong after the purchase because even if you turn on the uninstall feature, you can simply turn it off with 1 click and then uninstall the app. This need to be fixed. If you do fix it, I will reconsider my review.

I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! It's says free, you download, it it let's you block 1. After one you have to upgrade, you don't even get any comfort or peace of mind on knowing that this is actually doing the job before it says you need to upgrade to block anyone else.

Used to be the best but now after installing it on a new phone, it wants me to accept its spyware on my phone ("to keep track of my usage stats so I'll know how I use my phone". Thanks but no thanks - as if you ever needed that to block specific apps/sites) or it won't let me use it. Also, every other feature is now behind a paywall except you can only block 10 or so sites/apps. That's all it does now. It's become useless. The spyware especially leaves a bad taste!

title: Trello: Organize anything with anyone, anywhere!
description:
Trello is a visual tool for organizing your work and life. Join more than 35 million registered users to organize all your projects at work, at home, or anywhere in between.

Whether you’re planning a website design project, vacation, or company off-site, Trello is infinitely customizable and flexible for your every need.

With Trello you can:

TACKLE TO-DO LISTS WITH EASE

Get more done with Trello’s customizable-yet-simple boards, lists, and cards.

Go from idea to action in seconds by creating cards and dragging them across the board to follow your project's progress.

Add checklists, labels, and due dates the way you see fit and give your projects the fuel they need to get across the finish line.

MINIMIZE THE MENTAL LOAD

Free your brain from remembering every planning detail.

Add Power-Ups like a Calendar view of your due dates or add locations to cards to get a Map view—your project will take on a whole new perspective.

STAY IN THE KNOW — EVEN ON THE GO

To stay organized no matter where you are, turn on notifications and stay informed when cards are assigned, updated, and completed.

Trello works offline! Add information to your boards and cards at any time and it will be saved for when you need it. We got your back.

Trade in your sticky notes (and mental notes) for Trello’s digital boards. Get started for free today!

For more ideas on how to use Trello, visit: www.trello.com/templates

We value transparency and will ask for permissions to access: Camera, Microphone, Contacts and Photo Library Usage.

recentChanges: For all you Card Aging Power-Up users out there, we now support Evergreen cards. Mark a card as Evergreen on the web and it'll never age! Now, how do I mark myself as Evergreen?
comments: Just noticed that they just blocked some of my boards without warning. This is probably after they changed their freemium model, but they are now holding that work I did hostage. Have to upgrade to get it back. I am not even sure how much they got rid of, because you have to search for it to see it. Don't use this app at freemium unless you are okay with losing all your work.

Would be useable if you could rearrange/reorder items within the checklist. You can do this at the level of the work station, board, and card, but you can't within the checklist. I was ver y disappointed by this revelation since I spent a great deal of time inputting things at the higher level. Once I was ready to populate my cards with checklists, I realized this app is completely unusable for me.

The "R" button command does not work to change the "Due Dates" after the recent updates. Now, I have to change the due date of every card manually, one by one, that is a big issue. Please bring that option back

It's been great app to keep the company projects organized with "cards" under each employee's name, due date, progress, files update, and checklist. Wish there can be a calender where the team can see what is due or need to be done each day.
All the functions are hidden behind a paywall. This is a non functioning app if you don't pay them monthly. They don't tell you this until you spend time making a giant task list.

title: Cox
description:
With the newly redesigned Cox app, you can manage your account on your own time, wherever you are. Check out what's included with your services, manage your bill, view your data usage, get service support or message an agent with 24/7 support. 
 
Using the Cox app you can:
○ View your service details
○ Manage your bill, view statements, update payment methods and make a one time or recurring payment.
○ Check your data usage
○ Stay up-to-date with outage alerts
○ Search and browse helpful troubleshooting and how-to articles
○ Message a customer care agent anytime, anywhere with 24/7 support
○ Update your profile information or change your password
○ Quickly access product-specific apps to manage your Panoramic Wifi, Contour TV, Homelife, or Voice service
 
We'll keep adding more ways to help you better manage your account.

Enhancement - Updated messaging for service alerts.
Other minor enhancements and bug fixes.
comments: I've been having problems with service since day one the service was active. Ive been getting billed for a service that I couldn't use. Now I have payments on payments for a service that never worked. They brought a new box and told me to keep updating g to unlimited wifi and a insurance for a tech and still I was charged. I'm very unhappy with this service. I feel like I was scammed

App is just like the service.... barely acceptable. App works ok, takes time to load to where i need but real issues occur when using app for support. Chat sent to support takes 20+ minutes to respond, if at all. If you leave the app you will not be notified of responses and they will close the ticket if you do not respond in 2-3 minutes, removing any convenience. Thankfully not a customer anymore and my heart goes out to those in their service area

Service sucks everything installed new net goes out every time it rains . We have had an abnormal wet summer. Since may it has gone out 58 times. Their customer service can't do any thing. Their technicians try to charge you because everything thing looks okay on a dry day all my neighbors complain their services do the same. And we can't go anywhere else because their isn't another provider In this neighborhood. So they got me! just a rant wont get fixed more of something to do while its down

Worst service!!! Bill changes prices. Haven't had phone service for 4 months which is suppose to be included in my package, but still in paying for it. Never signed up for a 2 year contract, but that's what they say I have. Service shuts down for maintenance, but you still pay for service. Customer Service is rude.

App seems okay. Service is pretty bad though. For the past couple years my internet will just randomly turn off and back on. sometimes it can be just for a split second other several minutes and it does it all day. But they always send some kid over who plugs in a thing and says my internet is fine. My uploads will randomly drop to 0.55 and sometimes maybe 40 download. For years or so and they haven't fixed it or even acknowledge the problem.

title: Jabra Sound+
description:
Jabra Sound+ app
The Jabra Sound+ app is the perfect companion for your Jabra headphones – adding extra features and enabling you to personalize the way you use your Jabra headphones. Jabra Sound+ currently supports;
•	Jabra Elite 45e, 45h, 65e, 65t, 75t, 85t, 85h, Active 45e, Active 65t, Active 75t
•	Jabra Evolve 65e, 65t
•	Jabra Evolve2 65, 85 

An app experience that’s made for you
Today we use our headphones more than ever, and in very different environments – at work, on the train, working out, walking, driving, and more. To perform optimally, your headset may need different settings activated for each of these situations. 
For this purpose, we created “Moments” – predefined configurations to suit different moments of your day. All the Moments are customizable to cover your unique preferences, and with future updates.

Choose your favorite voice assistant – Google or Amazon Alexa*
With a single touch instantly access your phone’s voice assistant, directly from your headphones.

Personalize your music
Customize your sound with the music equalizer. Choose a predefined setting or fine-tune your audio using the 5-band equalizer.

SmartSound - automatically adapts your headset to your surroundings
SmartSound analyzes your sound environment and automatically applies your personalized audio using Moments in Sound+. **

ANC for blocking ambient noise 
With ANC (Active Noise Cancellation) you can reduce the amount of disruptive noise you hear from your surroundings. **
 
Hear the world around you 
Adjust how much of the outside world you’d like to hear when using your headphones. **
 
Superior call experience 
Modify your call settings to suit your preferences.
 
Battery status
Track your headphone’s battery status with a simple, visual indicator in the app.
 
Wireless updates
Always keep your headphones updated with the wireless update feature 
 
Activity tracking
Track your activity progress (only available for the Jabra Elite Active 65t).
 
2-year warranty
Register your headphones using the Jabra Sound+ app to activate your 2-year warranty against damage from water and dust. ***
 
 
*  Amazon registration required and dependent on headset compatibility
** Certain features, such as ANC, SmartSound and HearThrough are headphone dependent.
*** For the Elite headphones

summary: An app experience that’s made for you
recentChanges: Stability and performance improvements
comments: Love the app and all the customizing available to my ear buds. My biggest gripe is that I wish there was a way to be able to only connect to one device at a time. I use a Bluetooth receiver to watch TV. If I leave my phone Bluetooth on and that TV Bluetooth on, my headset will connect to 2 devices at a time, which causes audio/functionality issues on my phone. Have a feature on Jabra Sound+ to only allow ear buds to connect to 1 device at a time would be nice. Great app nonetheless 👏

I'm not exaggerating, I've purchased and returned every competitor to the elite 85t. Hands down their sound quality, and this app make them the best earbuds period. Love the equalizer, ear audio tests and quick modes. Very decent noise cancellation and the physical click buttons are great!! No accidental touches (yeah!). Can't wait to see what they do with the next generation!

The app takes a minute to catch up to the headphones connecting via Bluetooth. And when I disconnect the headphones, the app continues to show in my notifications, saying it's "searching for Jabra." It's not terribly inconvenient, just annoying. Otherwise, the app does what I need it to do.

The app doesn't connect and show notifications reliably. More than half of my usage I don't have the controls in the notification shade. It also regularly hangs when trying to store the last known location of my earbuds. The hardware is nice and works as expected, but the companion app is only marginally effective.

Great app, really enjoy the personalization of the button configuration, but resets each time I unpair the headset and does not save my preferences. I have literally had to manually add hearthrough for triple press over a 1000 times. Make it so the reconfigurations are constant and saved even when turning the headset off and it will be the best available on market. Thanks.

title: Notion - Notes, Tasks, Wikis
description:
Notion is a new editor that blends notes, tasks, wikis in one app.


DRAG, DROP, EDIT
Use drag & drop and Force Touch to arrange any content. Great for prioritizing lists and to-dos.

RICH MEDIA
Supports images, to-dos, bookmarks, code snippets and 20+ block types.

SYNC WITH MAC, WINDOWS, AND BROWSER
Download the companion browser and desktop apps. Notion keeps everything in sync.

OFFLINE
Pages you visit online are downloaded for access on the go.

COLLABORATE IN REAL-TIME
Share your pages, and edit together at the same time, @mention, and comments.

FOLDERLESS ORGANIZATION
Organize your content using nested pages. Say goodbye to messy folders.

To download the companion desktop app, please visit:
https://www.notion.so/desktop

recentChanges:
New on tablets: better Calendar view!

Now you can see detailed information about each of your pages, without having to tap on each individual day. Plus, you can drag & drop items from one day to another — just like desktop.
comments: Desktop version is good. Can't say the same about Android version. It's sooo slow. Otherwise same functionality as desktop. But still thanks for the app, notion is the best. Android app is only useful if you use desktop version, and need something to quickly check your stuff. Not suitable for anyone who wants to use it as standalone app.

it was going great at first, but today changed my mind. yes i still love the app, it is very useful and i wont uninstall it. today, a few hours ago, notion stopped working for me, as soon as i want to open the app, it takes a long time to open the app. it still isnt working and i hope it starts working again :(

I love using this app for my personal notetaking and planning. I used the desktop version most of the time though. One problem that I'm currently facing is the text formatting bar not showing when I have my bluetooth keyboard connected, even though the new formatting toolbar for android tablet is added, I still can't use it because of this.

I really like it but it would have been perfect if there was an option to private the templates. Even if ther are no group members. Something like a pin code to access a certain page would be nice. I would love to use this for some personal space but im afraid someone might log in into my pc and might see my jounaling which they can access easily even if it is closed so i kindly request you to add password or pin option to this application. Thank you very much

Can't open links because "there's no app to open [link]". Have to click enter twice to go to the next line. Literally my only two uses for the app, quickly writing notes in multiple lines and opening links are impossible. I'll change the rating once those things will work properly. Also: why's the widget color based on the mode of the entire phone? I'd like to keep my phone in dark mode but still have the widget in light mode for aesthetic purposes

title: Make-A-List
description:
Keep yourself organized with Make-A-List! You can create a grocery list, todo list, wish list, or anything else you need a list for!

Key Features:
•	Add an infinite amount of lists, list items, or notes
•	Supports voice to text
•	Share your lists or notes
•	Set reminders for your lists or notes
•	Sort alphabetically, by completed, or drag and drop your lists or notes
•	Edit, update, copy, complete, or delete your lists or notes
•	No internet available? No problem! Offline mode is supported
•	Emoji’s are supported 😃
•	Print your lists or notes
•	Change the notebook's font size
•	Available for Tablet’s, Phone, or PC’s that can run Android
•	Built to be an easy to use list maker
•	Is great for quick notes or notetaking.
•	Supports 33 languages (Afrikaans, Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, Danish,
Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hausa, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Malay, Marathi, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Russian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, and Vietnamese)

You have a say!

Your input and suggestions are very much appreciated. We're actively developing and improving the application based on your feedback. Send us an email at support@garbek.com.

developerAddress:
11725 SW 12th ST
Beaverton OR, 97005
recentChanges: We fixed an issue when users set a reminder for the same time as their device. We also fixed a defect with the menu. In this release, we added a new transition color and added the ability to have an infinite amount of compounding no-ad time.
comments: It is sooo good .and it is easy to use also for beginners and you can also use microphone and if you want to type just press it and check and you don't have to cut it with your finger you can cut it with a press I never forgot to check it I can only give this app 5 stars if so many stars were there I will surely have given 100/100

I've just started to use. So far it has very simply done exactly what I needed. I would recommend. Great for grocery lists, To do list and even just a list of things to remember. Rates a 10 (highest score) for my needs.

This app has everything I want except one. It's nice and simple, not a bunch of annoying, distracting stuff. I can easily type in whatever I want. I can rearrange my items. I can check items off. I was excited to see that I can share lists, but then I was disappointed that I couldn't share within the app to another user of the app. I wanted to be able to share the list with my husband, who also has the make-a-list app.
Loving it! I'm a list person. I almost bought an Alexa product but didn't want to have a smart device listening to my house. I just need to quickly record things in groups and get on with it.

I am using it as an alternative to Out of Milk which will no longer available. It is very straightforward, I can do the same things as Out of Milk but it also includes voice recording to create lists, which I find very useful.

title: Microsoft Translator
description:
Microsoft Translator is a free, personal translation app for more than 70 languages, to translate text, voice, conversations, camera photos and screenshots. You can also download languages for offline translation for free to use when you travel.

•	Text translation into over 70 languages*, for online and offline use
•	Camera translation to translate text within photos and screenshots
•	Voice translation to translate speech, and a split-screen mode for two participants having a bilingual conversation
•	Multi-person conversation translation - connect your devices and have in-person conversations with up to 100 people across multiple languages
•	Phrasebooks for verified translations and pronunciation guides to help you learn important phrases in foreign languages when you travel
•	Look up alternate translations and meanings of a word to find the best translation to express yourself
•	Download languages for offline use for when you travel without an internet connection
•	Hear your translated phrase out loud to help you learn how to say the translation
•	View transliterations (pronunciation guides) to help you pronounce the translation (includes Pinyin support for Chinese)
•	Share your translations with other apps  
•	Pin and save your most frequent translations for later
•	Translate text in other apps through context menu translation 
  
Translator supports the following languages:  Afrikaans, Arabic, Arabic (Levantine), Bangla, Bosnian (Latin), Bulgarian, Cantonese (Traditional), Catalan, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dari, Dutch, English, Estonian, Fijian, Filipino, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hebrew , Hindi, Hmong Daw, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Korean, Kurdish (Central), Kurdish (Northern), Latvian, Lithuanian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Norwegian, Odia, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Punjabi, Queretaro Otomi, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Serbian (Cyrillic), Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tahitian, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Tongan, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yucatec Maya.
 
Microsoft Translator is powered by cutting-edge technology used by Office, Bing, Skype, and Edge as well as by partners such as Adobe, LinkedIn and more.  
 
*Some features are not available in all languages.

developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: Bug fixes and general improvements.
comments: I got used to using Google Translate but after learning how to construct grammar sentences in Spanish, I felt that the translation from Google was somehow generic. Then I decided to use a Spanish dictionary and I was right. Then I found out Microsoft has a language translator so I tried that. I was suprise that Microsoft Translator can translate conversations better than Google Translate. I have not tried it in other languages though. If I ever go to another country, I'll probably use this one.

The Microsoft Translator app allows you to set the languages quickly and use typing or the microphone to input your phrases or questions. When using the mic, it will also speak the translated word for you. It has been very helpful for the first two days of school when helping students get to their classes.

Great app. it's wonderful to be able to translate and copy/paste into texts. It helps me improve my foreign language skills. it also makes it easy and fast to get the accents right. Update 0808-2021. Still a great app. I've been using it for years now. Highly recommended and fun too!

It's nice and accurate, I'm Filipino so I decided to check how accurate it is, And every single translation I got was surprisingly accurate! Of course the app has its own ups and downs like how it couldn't translate to word "up" but it's fine, Will be using this app for future purposes :)

The best app for translations, trust me, I'm not from Microsoft but this app deserves the recognition, it is undervalued. Google translator is like a child if you want a comparison. If you write something, without context, only 4 or 5 words, it automatically will guess the context; the translations are perfect for what you really want to say, I shocked when I discovered it. This app deserves 6/5 stars.

title: My Ooredoo Myanmar
description:
My Ooredoo App enables you to take charge and be in control of your Ooredoo Myanmar Prepaid Account.
It is available in Myanmar and the English language, 24 hours a day for your convenience.
With My Ooredoo app 
You can enjoy the following features 
- My Ooredoo App works without internet and with VPN
- Play Oomanji and win a total of up to 1,000GB by finding 7 gems in 7 game levels. 
- Test your skills on different O-Cade casual games with up to 200 free O-Coins.
- Various video contents like music, K-pop, DIY, travel and etc… video on MOA
- Scan QR for top up. 
- Free Ooredoo Music to access international and local music.
- Multiple Account Management with your family and friends’ Ooredoo accounts.
- Refer the app through different social media platforms/ accounts and earn rewards.

- Emergency Credit (Kyo Thone) is available whenever needed (terms and conditions apply).
- Check all your mobile balance and VIP status on the home page.
- Check Daily Usage and Transaction in 'My Account' >> 'My Usage'.
- Nini will help and guide you with the new promotions and features.
- Special Offers only for you.
- Build your own packs with Super Sate Tine Kya.

- Locate our stores and many more.
- Reserve Any Number you like.
- Buy Ooredoo SIM and get delivered to your door step.
- Top up your own number/ another number with different online payments and transfer balances.

comments: My Ooredoo app is delayed for long time and service from messanger is bad. Cause I didn't login to myooredoo app, I asked from Ooredoo messanger chat and didn't answer anything. The worst is that all the bills are gone during this delay time. I tried to login from other phone but they've blocked my number in this app. The one thing I got when using this app is all my bill is gone during a few time and can't afford to buy any packages.
This app is useless. Can't buy any package and can't even login the acc. Useless advertisements don't disappear for a long time. Moreover too slow processing time. Totally awful.

This is a fade app for users. When I play Don Don, even I can kick ball to the target area getting a goal but it just give me 25 MB. This is not first time, it is everytime I play.Really I don't like it.
I think you should refix it. It always says that you have insufficient balence and top up again to buy packs with thumb down even I have enough money to buy packs.I really hate it.

Even my balance is full and enough to buy the packs but it keep saying "sorry! We're unable to your request. Please try again" with the thumb down 👎 and take charge from my balance. But it's able to buy pack to play Oomanji!!! We don't want to play that game but we just want to buy our simple packs. Why is it unable??? This app became worst day by day. Please FIX IT!!!!!!

title: MyHyundai with Bluelink
description:
The MyHyundai app makes getting information about your Hyundai vehicle easier than ever. The MyHyundai app allows you to access owner resources, schedule service or connect to your Bluelink enabled vehicle from your phone. Bluelink technology enables and empowers you while you are on the go, giving you access to your Bluelink features from your office, at home, or just about anywhere.
Access the app with your MyHyundai.com ID, password and PIN to take advantage of Bluelink’s Remote features. Log in and send commands conveniently using biometric authentication (fingerprint or face recognition). An active Bluelink subscription is required to use Bluelink features in the app. To renew or upgrade to either Remote or Guidance, please visit MyHyundai.com.


An active Bluelink Remote Package (R) or Guidance Package (G) subscription is required to access select features. Feature support varies by vehicle model. Please visit HyundaiBluelink.com to check what Bluelink features your vehicle supports.

With the MyHyundai app you can:
• Remotely start your vehicle (R)
• Remotely unlock or lock the door (R)
• Start your vehicle with saved presets you customize (R)
• View charging status, manage charging schedules and settings (EV and PHEV vehicles only) (R)
• Learn more about key features with user tutorials
• Remotely activate the horn and lights (R)
• Search and send Points of Interest to your vehicle (G)
• Access saved POI History (G)
• Make a Car Care service appointment
• Access Bluelink Customer Care
• Find your car (R)
• Access maintenance information and other convenient features.
• Check Vehicle Status (supported on select 2015MY+ vehicles)
• Access vehicle features with four phone widgets for Remote Features, Parking Meter, POI search and Ioniq EV vehicle



MyHyundai app also supports Wear OS smartwatch features. Use voice commands or the smartwatch menu to access select features.
With MyHyundai for Wear OS you can:
• Remotely start your vehicle (R)
• Remotely unlock or lock the door (R)
• Remotely activate the horn and lights (R)
• Find your car (R)
*Note: Active Bluelink subscription and Bluelink equipped vehicle with capabilities required.



The MyHyundai app asks for the following device permissions as needed:
• Camera: For adding driver and profile pictures
• Contacts: To select from phone contacts when sending secondary driver invites
• Location: For map and location functionality throughout the app
• Phone: For placing calls when tapping on buttons or links to call
• Files: For saving PDFs or other downloaded documents to the device
• Notifications: To allow push notification messages from the app
• Biometrics: For enabling fingerprint and/or face recognition for authentication

Disclaimer: Feature support varies by vehicle model. Please visit HyundaiBluelink.com to check what Bluelink features your vehicle supports.
