comments: "Currently experiencing a severe outage". I've been getting that message for the last 2 days. Too bad I will not be prorated nor refunded for the service I am paying for but yet not able to use. If this becomes the norm, I will unfortunately have to cancel service. Too bad because the concept is there but execution sucks.

The app works sometimes and when it does I love it. Unfortunately most days it stops working. I have to try to start my car 3 and 4 times before it actually takes and that's if it lets me log in. I live in extreme heat and bought this feature so that I could cool down my car from the 120 degree heat outside. I've been paying for this service for years only to be able to actually use it maybe a 1/4 of the time. I've never been able to turn on the cooled seats or see anything else but if my car is on. If this app actually worked as intended, it would be worth 5 stars but seeing how I pay monthly for a service that rarely works, I'm giving a generous 2 stars. Please fix bugs and connectivity issues. In addition to this, after writing this review, the blue link app now stopped working entirely and is claiming to be experiencing a sever outage. This outage seems to be going on now for over 24 hours. I really don't see the point in paying for this app if it does not work 90% of the time. I will be cancelling this app very soon if it does not improve. The only option I use is the remote car start since I live in the desert. With that no longer working, I could just go get a remote installed from the local car audio guys.

When the app works, it is amazing...but they always seem to have system outages....the last one lasting 2 days. Bluelink knows about it but will not offer compensation. I am paying for a service that I cannot use. Not right on customer service. Calling customer care does not help either.

Wish it did more... Like allowing both defrosters to run and side mirrors to heat in the winter, and maybe open / close windows. Also, wish you could set the time it stays unlocked when remote unlocking. It's super short before relocking. Occasionally remote start just doesn't work even though all the conditions are met. Not sure why. Finally, the speed and convenience of a key fob remote start are still missed. I'd take this over the fob, but both would be much nicer.

Update: terrible experience registering and enrolling. Have been on the phone an hour with representative. Website is slow and not responding. Still not completed with all of their website issues. I would give it 0 Stars. Poor experience setting up Blue Link. Not ready for primetime.

title: AdTranquility Spam Protection
description:
Our mission is to get rid of aggressive advertising forever.

Spam and annoying ads - they're a nuisance we've gotten used to. Why?

You may be used to feeling a lack of control, of not being able to do anything about the nonsense you're bombarded with every day.

Fighting against greedy, unethical, aggressive advertisers isn't an easy game.

But that's where AdTranquility comes in. We want to equip you with the power to say "NO" to misleading, annoying ads.

We want to help you create a distraction-free environment.

So that using your mobile, or browsing the internet is a tranquil and relaxing experience.

The question is - do you want to join our cause? Do you believe that together we can stop abusive advertisers and bring back the beauty of the internet?

==============

Our first proposal for you is the Spam Protection app.

If you're getting bombarded with tens, maybe even hundreds of "push notifications" every day (yes, those annoying messages telling you about how you won a new iPhone), we have the solution.

==> Simply follow these 3 steps:

1. Download the application
2. Follow the simple (one step, one-click) on-screen instructions
3. Click the big button, and clear your current notifications. You won't get any more!

We hope you enjoy using our app. Please, tell your friends about us if you think they'll find this app - or our mission - aligned with their needs!

title: Okta Mobile
description:
Okta Mobile provides single sign-on to applications on your Android device. As a companion application to the Okta Identity Management Service, Okta Mobile lets you simply sign in with your Okta credentials and enjoy immediate access to all of your company's applications.

If your company has enabled Okta Mobility Management (OMM) and you launch Okta Mobile, we prompt you to secure your device by enrolling in OMM. Enrollment is simple and intuitive, and during the process we explain what information is kept private and what is accessible to your company. To help keep your device secure, OMM reports information about your device to your company, such as model and device type.

Learn more about Okta Mobile at: https://help.okta.com/en/prod/okta_help_CSH.htm#ext_Apps_Okta_Mobile

title: Smart View
description:
Smart TV Cast is a Miracast app that standard for wireless connections from sending devices (such as laptops, tablets, or smartphones) to display receivers (such as TVs, monitors, or projectors). It can roughly be described as "HDMI over Wi-Fi", replacing the cable from the device to the display.

Cast App gives Smart Display on wireless TV cast. Mirror any Screen with Wireless tech & gives Live HD over WiFi & Internet.

Screen Mirroring App mirrors your complete screen, including photos, videos, apps, games, websites and documents.

Screen Mirroring for Smart TV that lets you mirror your screen to another device in your WiFi or remote over Internet Connection. You can also create a second screen on another device.

Smart View combines all benefits of most popular streaming and mirroring technologies in one App to give you endless options for screen sharing.

Smart View - Smart TV Connect to Phone is the most powerful app for mirroring and broadcasting your Android screen and audio in real time with high quality!

Features
• Click on the “Connect” button on the bottom of the app TV Cast LG
• Wait for a few seconds for the app to discover your TV/Dongle
• Conduct effective classroom sessions by showing the mobile content on the TV, to all the students and Steps to Mirror to Smart TV
• All your media in one place: music, photos, videos, movies, tv shows etc.
• Its a simple easy to use and fast
• Automatically enable Bluetooth and Wi-Fi - quickly connect a keyboard, mouse, and/or game controller
• Dentify local files like video, audio, photo on your device and SD Card automatically
• Neat & clean user interface to create a good experience
• See the latest trailers and discover movies not currently available on Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Prime subscriptions
• Cast to your TV Casting using Chromecast or Airplay support
• Simple profile-based interface - easy to enable/disable different profiles for different types of displays like duet display
• Quick Actions - quickly and easily run SecondScreen features without creating or editing profiles
• Broadcasting to Twitch, Youtube (Youtube Gaming), Facebook Live, Ustream, and others
• Easy to use for Samsung Smart TV Connect, Samsung Smart TV Connect to WiFi

Screen Mirroring of your smartphone on Smart TV. Mirror Smart View, Samsung Allshare, Allcast and more!
• It can be any Smart TVs: Samsung, Sony, LG, Hisense, TCL, Vizio Smartcast, Xiaomi, Panasonic and so on;
• Roku / Roku Stick / Roku TV;
• Chromecast;
• WebOS and Miracast;
• Xbox, Xbox One and Xbox 360;
• Fire TV and cast to Amazon Fire Stick;
• Apple TV and Airplay;
• Smart View and Allshare
• All other DLNA receivers.

With Roku app you can enjoy videos, movies, sports and tv shows in full HD 1080p on your big TV screen. No cable, no laptop, no server, no complex setup, no additional hardware needed. Just use your Android device to tap and stream. Connecting your phone to a TV screen via Cast To TV app.

Smart View Vidio Cast for TV Mobile Connect and stay connect app To TV shows android device display to your smart tv. watch favorite shows or Sports on your smart tv screen by using Screen Mirroring For All TV. Screen Mirroring app mirrors your mobile display to larger screen without any lag.

Smart View Mirroring your mobile screen on your TV can be useful when you're showing off photos from a recent trip, playing a game or giving a demonstration. With this Screen Mirroring App, you'll be able to duplicate your Android phone's screen on TV Screen.

Video & TV Cast - Miracast Display on tv
Smart TV Mirroring : Display Phone Screen On TV

title: Flash notification on Call & all messages
description:
Flash 3 (New) is the application to blink the Flash when you receive a call or message, notification from the apps. 

Flash 3 is one of the top useful applications that should be available on Android phones. When an incoming call or message arrives (SMS, Facebook Messenger, Whatsapp ...), the Flash of the phone will blinks to notification.

👍 The main functions of the application:
✔ Flash notification when a incoming call
✔ Flash blink when a message arrives
✔ Flash notification for apps: Flash blink when notification from all the apps (when there are messages, calls). 
✔ DJ lights flash for party use
✔ SOS flash: use in important cases, need to create attention around.

👍 Other useful customizations on Flash 3:
✔ Select the blinks style: the application supports 2 different flashing styles that can help you be different.
✔ Change flashing speed (10 different Flashing speeds available)
✔ Smart feature - doesn't flash when you are using the phone
✔ Support both flash front and rear
✔ App compatible with most types of Android phones including all types like Samsung, Oppo, Xiaomi, HTC, Vivo...

Best if you are having party and you can use it as LED lights or DJ lights. In this application you can control the intensity of the Flash.


📮 Contact us
Please contact the email below if you have any suggestions or feedback:
flash3software@gmail.com

comments: This app is awesome! It keeps me informed and maintain a secured worry free protection on my phone. Recently it warned me of a unsecured location at a short stay lodging place.

Used to love this app, but lately it constantly says that I'm over 71% or more of my storage limit on my phone which isn't true!! I hate that stupid orange little bar over to the side on my phone all of the time!!! I have even uninstalled some apps because of it!! Fix it!!!!

Will not work on some androids! This app installs in accessibility, not a good place for anything but true handicap features. Problem: acc'.apps must override battery savers. My Alcatel has factory Smart Manager battery saver that can't be turned off so this app was usually off. After 2 years and 6+ sessions McAfee-No clue. Had to find security that doesn't work in access' Beware: Things in accessibility have lots of control such as 'draw over other apps'. A Huge invitation for vulnerability.

downloaded the mcafee app seemed to work except it kept telling me to creat a profile for the identity theft protection but everytime i tried it always said were working on this feature try again later..so last night i uninstalled it and re installed it now it keeps saying my subscription is expired...i pay $60. a month through metro my subscripsion is free!! and also wants a 6 digit pin?? when i click on forgot pin it says it dosent recognise my phone # or email address!! what a joke....

Can't get past it trying to verify me as a Metro customer. I get an error saying something went wrong and to try later. I have uninstalled and downloaded again 3 times and STILL can't get the app to work. I have literally been trying every once and a while since 3/21/21 after factory resetting my phone due to other system issues. All of my other apps and my system have been working since the reset so it is an issue with THIS app.

title: TimeTree - Free Shared Calendar
description:
◆ Winner of Apple’s “App Store Best of 2015” award!

Sharing allows everyone to view the same calendar and add new events. TimeTree keeps you all in order with who’s doing what and when. 

You can also create multiple shared calendars in TimeTree! Whether it may be amongst family, friends, couples, and coworkers, or just for personal use, our app is adapted to meet various situations for both social and personal lifestyles.

■ Key Features
○ Shared calendar and scheduling

​​・Invite new members via E-mail, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, SMS, and more.
・Create and edit events for all members.
・Set a different color for each member or activity.
・Chat and add photos as if you were using a messenger app for each event.
・Deliver reminders to everyone in the group.
・You can sync your calendar with other calendars (Google Calendar, Outlook etc) .

○ Shared Notes and Lists
It comes with a memo feature that can be shared with other users that can be helpful in planning events, organizing to-do lists, and creating small notes.

○ Multiple calendars for family, friends, personal, work, and more 
TimeTree allows users to create multiple calendars. You can keep individual calendars separate to keep your privacy.

○ Works on PC & Mobile
Use TimeTree from your desktop by logging into the web version.

○ Widgets
TimeTree widgets in your home screen let you check and edit your schedule with ease.


Who is TimeTree for?

○Friends and Couples
Time Tree is a great way to see everyone’s availability.
・All members enter their schedule in one place
・Let all members know which days you are available

○School Life
TimeTree is also great for keeping up with your school life! Organize your class schedule and keep track of what is due next!
・Productive time management and day planning tools to create daily schedules for students!
・Plan ahead knowing what after-school activities you have in the afternoon.


○ Family
TimeTree is great for planning family-oriented events. 
・Organize plans on picking up kids from daycare and school.
・Perfect for creating a shopping list from daily groceries to family BBQs!


Contact us

Your experience is important to us. If you have any inquiries or feedback, please contact us. (support@timetreeapp.com)


Twitter:  https://twitter.com/TimeTreeApp
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/timetreeapp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/timetreeapp_friends

comments: This amazing app is truly helping my family. I love that I can see each of my calendars individually, or all at once! Two suggestions for improvement would be to constantly update events from imported calendars on other apps and to have a way to customize an overview calendar with some, but not all, of one's calendars from within this app. As an example, I would like to see each of my children's calendars at the same time, but not my dinner plans calendar.

My husband and I find this app super helpful in staying on top of everything. But the current day of the week is very hard to find visually. It is highlighted but very very lightly. So at a glance you can't immediately find what day you are in. It would be nice for the current day if the week to be highlighted darker or maybe in a bright color. We have even considered switching calendars because this is so difficult for my husband.

My family and I love this app but recently they have taken away the widgets for the home screen and that has really made it a bit less user friendly. Hoping the next update brings back the widgets so we can fill one of our home screens full of the calendar.

Really love this app, my roommates and I got it to coordinate our work schedules and plans since we are a mixed andriod and apple user household. My only improvement would be a way for my to link this app with my Google calander the same way the apple users can (as I see the option to link apple account for it but it's no use to me with an android) so I don't have to update both my phone calendar and timetree calendar when I get my work rota.

Verry good, I've had this for about a month and it's simple and easy to use, meaning all my family members find it straightforward to understand. Its verry customisable with colours and labels. There are ads on the vertion I use but they arent invasive, they just kind of sit there without pop ups/noise so they are okay

title: Alarmy - Morning Alarm Clock
description:
FREE FEATURES
■ Highest-rated alarm clock app in the world, with 4.6 stars from over 1,000,000 reviews!
■ Crazy loud ringtone sounds for heavy sleepers and night owls, as well as gentle alarm clock sounds for morning people who want to wake up without any worries
■ Photo Mission - Wake up and take a photo of the registered place to dismiss your alarm
■ Math Mission - Solve simple or advanced math problems and kickstart your brain
■ Barcode Mission - Scan the barcode or QR code you registered to turn the alarm off
■ Shake Mission - Shake your phone up to 999 times to wake up your body


TRIAL FOR PREMIUM FEATURES
■ Wake Up Check - If you worry you might fall back asleep, worry no more. Wake Up Check will check on you until you prove you’re fully awake
■ Backup Sound - Sometimes your alarm just doesn’t get you up. But if you wait for too long, you get a second, very loud alarm
■ Time Pressure - Get AI voice dictation of the exact time and a custom message every single minute until you turn your alarm off
■ Typing Mission - Type a few motivational quotations into your keyboard to energize yourself as you get up
■ Step Mission - Get out of bed and take 10 or 20 or 50 steps to get moving right away
■ Ad-Free Experience - Remove all ads, and customize what you do or don’t see, such as the weather & news, or the farewell dialog
■ Start sticking to your morning routine with a free trial today!


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
■ Check current temperature and pick your outfit for the day
■ Customize by playing your own music, songs, and selecting background colors
■ Use Snooze / Gradual volume increase / Vibrate features to wake up smoothly
■ Quick alarm for quick tasks that you can use when you don't have the least amount of time to set up
■ Prevent turn off: This feature helps you wake up by blocking your phone from turning off while the alarm clock rings
■ Prevent uninstall: This feature prevents you from uninstalling this app while the alarm clock is ringing


THE MOTIVATIONAL ALARM CLOCK
It turns your Android phone into a motivational alarm clock that helps you get out of bed first and makes you get all your 'to do's done successfully in the morning. With the various fun missions & loud random ringtone sounds, you can wake up easily, and be refreshed setting up your own success habits on a daily basis 


No.1 IN 97 COUNTRIES!
Dubbed as “the world’s most annoying alarm clock,” Alarmy has quickly become the world's highest rated alarm app becoming the favorite lifestyle app among users. It has been featured in Gizmodo, Cnet, and at Huffington Post, and is currently #1 in its category in 97 countries, including the United States, France, Germany, and South Korea


HOW DOES IT WORK? (Photo mission)
- Take a photo or select a picture of a certain place or an object in your house
- When the photo mission alarm starts ringing in the morning, you have to take the new photo with the exact same angle as you set before. Otherwise it will never stop
e.g.) If you have set up a washbasin picture, you should take the washbasin at the same angle


PERMISSION INFO
CAMERA
- This app needs this permission for the photo mission, which requires users to take a photo
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
- This app needs this permission to load external ringtones
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
- This app needs this permission to save pictures taken by users who are using the photo mission
ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
- This app needs this permission if you want to get weather information in Today’s panel.
BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN
- This app needs this permission if you want to use prevent yourself from uninstalling it
- It uses DEVICE MANAGER permission
SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
- This app needs this permission to display dismiss screen on Android 10 or higher versions

Privacy policy in English: http://alar.my/privacy_policy_en.txt
e-mail : cs@delightroom.com

comments: it's a mind blowing app that will allow you to set different types of missions (click a picture, solve math problems, play a memory game etc) as a part of waking you up. it's like your mom. do this otherwise I'll keep scolding. Hehe. Unlike other apps, this will allow all these features without the premium subscription. However there will be additional features in premium. But the ones that are free are more than enough for a better life, and morning routine. Good luck on your new routine. 🖤

One of the most reliable alarms I've used. And loud... Loud is very important for me since I'm an extremely deep sleeper with my narcolepsy. The loud ringtones, & the Random option, are great. Very rarely an alarm won't show up in my notification bar & won't go off. I'm not sure why but it does not happen very often. Although I do not like the newer message screen after you shut off an alarm. Sometimes if I'm in a hurry it's just an unnecessary extra step I have to wait on & deal with.

Most the time this is just a perfect app but i don't know exactly why but sometimes the alarm goes of for only a split second and then is off Edit: the update removed the cool graph feature to look when you have woken up and how it changed over time, i REALLY want it back, else i need to find a way to extract the dates into my own graph...

Love it! This alarm allows me to wake up to my favorite song through my Bluetooth earbuds. Exactly what I was looking for! The only thing I hate is the monthly subscription. The app should allow playing an entire Playlist or connection to a streaming music service with any monthly charges. The free version has ads and a one song alarm which suffices.

I've used this app for years now on multiple devices. I love all of the new ways they've added to help you wake up. It really does work. If you're one of those people with a changing work schedule, or just have difficulty getting up in the morning like me - this app is a MUST!

title: Bitwarden Password Manager
description:
Bitwarden, Inc. is the parent company of 8bit Solutions LLC.

NAMED BEST PASSWORD MANAGER BY THE VERGE, U.S. NEWS & WORLD REPORT, CNET, AND MORE. 

Manage, store, secure, and share unlimited passwords across unlimited devices from anywhere. Bitwarden delivers open source password management solutions to everyone, whether at home, at work, or on the go. 

Generate strong, unique, and random passwords based on security requirements for every website you frequent. 

Bitwarden Send quickly transmits encrypted information --- files and plaintext -- directly to anyone. 

Bitwarden offers Teams and Enterprise plans for companies so you can securely share passwords with colleagues. 

Why Choose Bitwarden:

World-Class Encryption
Passwords are protected with advanced end-to-end encryption (AES-256 bit, salted hashtag, and PBKDF2 SHA-256) so your data stays secure and private. 

Built-in Password Generator
Generate strong, unique, and random passwords based on security requirements for every website you frequent. 

Global Translations 
Bitwarden translations exist in 40 languages and are growing, thanks to our global community.

Cross-Platform Applications 
Secure and share sensitive data within your Bitwarden Vault from any browser, mobile device, or desktop OS, and more.

developerAddress:
1 N. Calle Cesar Chavez, Suite 102
Santa Barbara, CA 93103
recentChanges:
- Fix for SSO login
- Improvements to button placement throughout login flow
- Other bugfixes
comments: Best by far. Was always the best but would not have always recommended it to those looking for something super user friendly. However, BitWarden now blows away 1Password, Dashlane, Keeper, etc. in all areas like price, option to self host, ease of use across all platforms. It worked better all the way from me using Firefox on Linux to family members on iOS and everything in between. Check reviews, someone is being paid, every site BW has highest user ratings yet other product gets editor choice?

After trying many different password managers I can confidently say this is the best one. It's just so nice not having some big company that just wants to maximize profits in control of my password data base. Not extra bulk, just what I need. Free version is sufficient but I happily pay to support this effort

Another (as someone else put it) "Lastpass Refugee" here. Phenomenal password manager. My only real complaint (and it truly is a very minor inconvenience) is that when I login to an app 99% of the time, I have to select the login from the BW login screen, I don't get the autofill popup over the app. I have tried various "display on top" settings in the app and permissions on my phone, and it will work sometimes, but never consistently and only rarely.

[EDIT : bugs and crash too much when login to an app] [EDIT : there is still bugs with the Android app they take too long to fix - one of them being an annoying pop-up covering other stuffs, or just not disappearing when it should - or fingerprint not working 1\2 times - it still a good service but the app itself could be better]... Looking for a password manager? Don't go any further. Huge load of features for free and it's open source. One of the best out there

Why do I only get one attempt at biometrics unlock on android? This is the only app that gives me just one attempt. My slightly older phone with a glass screen protector isn't the most reliable at under-screen fingerprint scans. So I have to then click on and input a pin at least half the time. Slows me down and is completely unnecessary. Please fix that. As well as on some sites, the password is inputted into the wrong field, namely Amazon Smile and sites with more than one login page.

If you enjoy iTranslate, would you mind taking a moment to write a review on Google Play? We’d greatly appreciate it.
comments: Only couple days, awesome! Has Theasaurus built in so learning is easier. Paid for it, no ads! On 2 months vacay @ CDMX, very limited knowledge Spanish. Better app than the other I used AND off line mode!!! Hope this helps, good luck

The app says it will translate Georgian but after you install it, it tells you it won't work for Georgian. The app wasted my time and it's now taking me a while to figure out how to stop the automatic payments that will start after the free trial is over.

Pretty useless. I'm using offline translation, Spanish to English. Translated a Spanish message that included details of an engine oil purchase, English result was "Ok, I'll be right back, and I'll be right back." How is this remotely useful? Google Translate got it right, thank goodness I had service!
Very easy to use, and for the most part accurate. I'm fluent in 5 languages Italian, German, French, Spanish, and Dutch. And this translator is very accurate in all those. Highly recommend.

Im giving only one star. I used the app once to try to figure out they chinese letters on my car screen and did not work at all. I tried the 7 days free subscription thinking rhat it will help me in getting the translation but did not change anything. Now it just automatically subscribes for a year without any consent and now i have no money because of an app that i don't even use. I emailed for a refund but nothing yet.

title: Any.do - To do list, planner & calendar
description:
🥇 "#1 to do list app out there” - WSJ
🏆 Editor's Choice by Google

Over 30M people rely on Any.do to stay organized and get more done.
It's a simple to do list app with reminders, planner & calendar - all in one.

🥇 "A MUST HAVE APP" (Lifehacker, NYTimes, USA TODAY).

Any.do is a free to-do list, planner & calendar app for managing and organizing your daily tasks, to-do lists, notes, reminders, checklists, calendar events, grocery lists, and more.

Organize your tasks & to-do list

• ADVANCED CALENDAR & DAILY PLANNER - Keep your to-do list and calendar events always at hand with our calendar widget. Any.do to-do list & planner support daily calendar view, 3-day Calendar view, Weekly calendar view & agenda view, with built-in reminders. Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side.

• SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you’ll never forget a thing. Sync your phone’s calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar, or any other calendar so you don’t forget an important event. Even on your Wear OS device.

• SET REMINDERS - One-time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp.

• WORK TOGETHER - Share your to do list and assign tasks with your friends, family & colleagues from your task list to collaborate and get more done. 

---

ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER & CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE
Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list. 
For better task management flow we added a calendar integration to keep your agenda always up to date. 
For better productivity, we added recurring reminders, location reminders, one-time reminder, sub-tasks, notes & file attachments. 
To keep your to do list up to date, we’ve added a daily planner and focus mode.

INTEGRATIONS
Any.do To do list, Calendar, planner & Reminders Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Google Tasks, Evernote, Trello, Wunderlist, Todoist, Zapier, Asana, Microsoft to-do, Salesforce, OneNote, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Office 365, Exchange, Jira & More.

TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE
Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it.

POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT
Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding do@Any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to- tasks.

DAILY PLANNER & LIFE ORGANIZER
Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have. 

SHARE LISTS, ASSIGN & ORGANIZE TASKS
Planning & organizing projects has never been easier. Now you can share lists between family members, assign tasks to each other, chat and much more. Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in-sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list.

GROCERY LIST & SHOPPING LIST
Any.do task list, calendar, agenda, reminders & planner is also great for shopping lists at the grocery store. Simply create a list on Any.do, share it with your loved ones and see them adding their shopping items in real-time.

developerAddress:
Any.do Inc.

156 Begin St. 22nd floor, Tel Aviv, Israel
recentChanges:
- Dark mode is finally here, hooray!
- Recurring reminders issue was fixed
- We added a save button to the task details screen
- Filter your tasks for today, the next 7 days, and all tasks
- Universal search with tasks, events, sub-tasks, notes, lists & tags
- Keep track of how many tasks you’ve completed with Any.do
- Upgraded sorting by time (the 2nd most requested feature!)
- New and stunning reminders & snoozing redesign
- Import tasks into Any.do from your clipboard
comments: The user interface is horrible. The way the tasks show up is very difficult to see and read at a glance, and the font in most places is so small it's not even readable. There are only five predefined color schemes for themes, none of them are at all attractive or easy to read. I set a reminder, and it didn't even go off. For an app this expensive, I would expect much more. There are a ton of free apps that are so much better than this one.

Anydo is great, but... - 1star for no account free option. I value privacy more than cross-platform. - 1 star for upgrade requiring yearly payments. I understand that $3/mo doesn't seem like much to developers, but for people who have many apps and limited funds, subscriptionware adds up. (And we don't hit a coffee shop more than a couple times a year, so swallow the urge to make that comparison) Anydo is simple to use and has a clean, clear interface. Too bad there's no simple upgrade.

This app is really cool. one feature I would really appreciate is if you could allow events to be completed, or allow tasks to have durations/end times. A common problem I have is a task has a specific time and duration, but sometimes I don't get around to it at the exact time so I would like it to only be completed when I actually manually mark it off.

Almost. As in good integration with other apps and intuitive. But, the deal breaker for me as mentioned by others was the nagging to get you to upgrade to premium subscription. Yaaa, No! Uninstalled. To the developers. Especially the one who wrote the snooty response to that guy Jacob: Here's a clue, that is your notice to fix the "bug" Update:7/19/21 And here they gave a carbon copy response to me as well. Ha!

Have been using this for few years and love it. Easy to use so I can not down as things come to mind and I can schedule reminders. It's very simple to use but very effective. And love that when I snooze a task it tells me how long I have been pushing it off for. Keeps me accountable when I am avoiding doing something.

title: Rocketbook
description:
The Rocketbook app instantly sends your Rocketbook pages and whiteboards enhanced with Beacons to your favorite cloud services. Access and share them anytime, anywhere!

The app has a unique seven-symbol shortcut system that gets your auto-cropped and high quality scans into the cloud faster than any other scanning app. Using our Handwriting Recognition (OCR) features, you can search your handwriting inside the app, use your handwritten text as the filename, and get a full-page transcription via email.

The Rocketbook app is designed to work with Rocketbook products including the:
- Core (endlessly reusable notebook)
- Mini (pocket sized version of the Core)
- Wave (microwave-to-erase notebook)
- Color (reusable kid's coloring book)
- Whiteboards enhanced with Rocketbook Beacons (adjustable whiteboard attachments)
- One (single use notebook)

Enjoy the pleasure of writing and the efficiency, organization, and shareability of digitization. Write freely and use our shortcut system to send your scans as PDFs or JPEGs to specific locations in Google Drive, Dropbox, Trello, Evernote, Box, OneDrive, OneNote, Slack, Google Photos, and Email.

For more information about our reusable notebooks, please visit getrocketbook.com. Free Rocketbook PDFs and customizable pages can be found at start.getrocketbook.com.

recentChanges:
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

By the way, App Store reviews are really helpful for us. If you think Rocketbook is great, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review? If you have any feedback, please contact us at feedback@getrocketbook.com. Thanks!
comments: Update Aug 3-The synch issue has been resolved. Would still like the ability to import scans from my old device/cloud. I don't like that you cannot import scans to the app when you get a new device. I get that it's cloud based, and I like that when I'm on my laptop. But it's a pain on a phone to have to log into another app, look for the folder, etc etc. Would be much better if they were handy in the Rocket app. 2 clicks away.

Exactly what I was looking for! I have used multiple apps on multiple platforms. This one is perfect. It has much more capability than I have yet to use, however, I am relieved to finally find the one that I can use consistently and easily!

Able to send scan through email only about once in ten tries. Various email servers tried, no difference. They are not in junk or spam folders either. Goes to Dropbox or Google pics better. Android app.
Easy to use app. Only thing I think could improve is if you could correct the text recognition in a way that it would learn your handwriting and improve future recognition.
Some of the page does get cut off when scanning even though it is perfectly in the camera frame.

title: Simple Alarm Clock Free
description:
Simple Alarm is a free alarm clock application designed to create, edit and remove alarms in the easiest way. You can use Simple Alarm Clock to wake up in the morning or setup reminders for your tasks during the day.

Simple Alarm's main advantage is that you can type in the time for an alarm directly instead of using a selector, pressing arrows or moving through a large list of numbers. You can just press the buttons for the hours and minutes of your new alarm directly in a numeric keyboard on screen, and that's it! You can also edit or remove alarms with just one touch, saving a lot of time when you need to setup your alarms.

Unlike other alarm clocks for Android, Simple Alarm sorts your alarms in the order they will sound next, so you can easily identify which are the tasks you have to do next, if you are using Simple Alarm as a "To Do" tasks list.

If you use Simple Alarm Clock to wake you up in the morning, you will be able to wake up gently from your dreams, in a peaceful and progressive way, because Simple Alarm increases alarm volume slowly instead of starting at maximum volume. This way, you can avoid being startled with a loud sound while you are in a deep sleep.

Simple Alarm has a 3-button deactivation method (optional) that prevent you from accidentally turning off the alarm and oversleep. You will need to be really awake to press all 3 buttons. If you want to keep sleeping for a while, you can snooze the alarm by pressing just one big Snooze button. As everyone has his/her own preferences and needs, Simple Alarm Clock lets you customize alarm's sound (selecting any ringtone, sound or song in your phone), the pause duration between alarms, and many other settings.

If you want to wake up at the same time every day, on work days, weekends or just a few days a week, you can easily select which days when creating the alarm, and the alarm clock will go off on that selected days every week.

For all the reasons above, Simple Alarm is the best alarm clock in the market, and it is much better than Android's default alarm clocks.

Simple Alarm Clock Features:
● Fastest setup method.
● Alarm enabling/disabling with one touch.
● Set a message for each alarm.
● AM/PM or 24 hours format
● Alarms sorted in the order they will ring.
● Repeat alarms every week on certain days.
● Smart alarm suggestions based on your previous alarms so you never forget to go to work or school.
● Select the alarm sound you want from all your phone's ringtones, songs and sounds. Wake up to your favorite music!
● Customize Snooze duration.
● 3 buttons alarm de-activation to avoid turning alarm off and continue sleeping (optional).
● 1 button alarm Snooze.
● Wake up gently while volume and vibration increases slowly.
● The alarm gets extremely loud after some time to help heavy sleepers wake up too. Our default sound has been optimized to be the loudest it can be.
● Available in English, Spanish, French, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Italian, Japanese, German, Korean, Arab, Hindi, Chinese and Indonesian.
● Special design for tablets and big cellphones
● It's free!
descriptionHTML:
Simple Alarm is a free alarm clock application designed to create, edit and remove alarms in the easiest way. You can use Simple Alarm Clock to wake up in the morning or setup reminders for your tasks during the day.

Simple Alarm's main advantage is that you can type in the time for an alarm directly instead of using a selector, pressing arrows or moving through a large list of numbers. You can just press the buttons for the hours and minutes of your new alarm directly in a numeric keyboard on screen, and that's it! You can also edit or remove alarms with just one touch, saving a lot of time when you need to setup your alarms.

Unlike other alarm clocks for Android, Simple Alarm sorts your alarms in the order they will sound next, so you can easily identify which are the tasks you have to do next, if you are using Simple Alarm as a "To Do" tasks list.

If you use Simple Alarm Clock to wake you up in the morning, you will be able to wake up gently from your dreams, in a peaceful and progressive way, because Simple Alarm increases alarm volume slowly instead of starting at maximum volume. This way, you can avoid being startled with a loud sound while you are in a deep sleep.

Simple Alarm has a 3-button deactivation method (optional) that prevent you from accidentally turning off the alarm and oversleep. You will need to be really awake to press all 3 buttons. If you want to keep sleeping for a while, you can snooze the alarm by pressing just one big Snooze button. As everyone has his/her own preferences and needs, Simple Alarm Clock lets you customize alarm's sound (selecting any ringtone, sound or song in your phone), the pause duration between alarms, and many other settings.

If you want to wake up at the same time every day, on work days, weekends or just a few days a week, you can easily select which days when creating the alarm, and the alarm clock will go off on that selected days every week.

For all the reasons above, Simple Alarm is the best alarm clock in the market, and it is much better than Android's default alarm clocks.

Simple Alarm Clock Features:
● Fastest setup method.
● Alarm enabling/disabling with one touch.
● Set a message for each alarm.
● AM/PM or 24 hours format
● Alarms sorted in the order they will ring.
● Repeat alarms every week on certain days.
● Smart alarm suggestions based on your previous alarms so you never forget to go to work or school.
● Select the alarm sound you want from all your phone's ringtones, songs and sounds. Wake up to your favorite music!
● Customize Snooze duration.
● 3 buttons alarm de-activation to avoid turning alarm off and continue sleeping (optional).
● 1 button alarm Snooze.
● Wake up gently while volume and vibration increases slowly.
● The alarm gets extremely loud after some time to help heavy sleepers wake up too. Our default sound has been optimized to be the loudest it can be.
● Available in English, Spanish, French, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Italian, Japanese, German, Korean, Arab, Hindi, Chinese and Indonesian.
● Special design for tablets and big cellphones
● It's free!
summary: Simple, Fast, Easy and Free!

comments: Great, simple, dependable alarm. As long as this alarm doesn't change, I see no reason to ever try another. Yes it's basic, but that's what so many people want. Easy to programme and reliable - unlike so many other alarms that start of well but don't their performance deteriorates over time. Would be nice to have the option to customize, but no great loss really. The only thing that would make me uninstall would be if there were an increase in ads. Thankfully, it's ok at the moment. Thanks 👍

I like this alarm but there are times where it inexplicably doesn't work. It's easy to set, and easy to add new alarms, easy to delete alarms. You can easily choose what you want to have as your wake-up sound and how long you want it to play. It has been helpful but there have been mornings when I thought I slept through the alarm and the case was that the alarm didn't go off. This morning I was awake before the alarm went off, and so was able to watch as it gave me precisely one second of music/alarm, then the tablet went to the lock screen, no more alarm. I have it set to play for five minutes...correction: I HAD it set to play for five minutes. This morning I checked the settings and it says one minute; and it only played for one second. I have no idea why it changed from five to one minute or why it only played for one second and then the tablet went to the lock screen. For that reason the app gets three stars. It's not reliable. When it works it's great. But when it doesn't it could really screw up your day.

I like this alarm. It works well and is easy to operate. It's easy to schedule an alarm, alter that time, add additional alarms, alter the snooze time and vary methods to turn off the alarm. A scheduled alarm can be turned off (say for a particular day) and can simply be turned on again with just one tap. My only CRITICISM is the sound choices for the alarm. I'd like a nice soothing alarm, non jarring option & easier to add different ringtones.

It doesn't always operate the same way. Sometimes the buttons appear over my unlock code, sometimes I have to unlock first. Sometimes i can snooze with the power button, sometimes it doesn't work. Wish it would operate consistently.

It is the best app. You can also buy pro version and can take benefit. Firstly I tried many other apps. Another all was the garbage. Then I found this one. It is excellent. I never wake up late, and its 25% credit goes to this app.

title: Auto Paste Keyboard - AutoSnap Keyboard
description:
Auto Paste Keyboard is a free custom keyboard app that helps users easily fill template text directly from their keyboard without having to switch to another place to copy and paste.

If you find yourself struggle with typing similar text again and again like email, address, phone number, greeting messages,... then this free Copy & Paste Keyboard app is ideal for you to save your time. Just go to the main interface to prepare several templates that you might use frequently. When you need to fill those sentences just tap on the globe icon to switch to this custom auto snap keyboard to fill them easy and fast.

Some people use this copy paste keyboard app to spam friends for fun, some people use it for accelerating their writing work. It's totally up to you how to use this keyboard. Please help us share this app with others if you find this fast keyboard app fun and helpful!

recentChanges: Yoimiya and Sayu are here!
comments: Good app. Well presented information, generally accurate builds, nice themes and tools for the game. I like it. Could use some polishing with the grid layout of the characters though: they're staggered, the top of their box is less rounded than the bottom, the resolution of character portraits is inconsistent, the character image background is stretched and distorted, and there are white bars at the bottom of some characters. Aside from that though, I really enjoy using the app.

This app is overall pretty great! It's informative, and in my opinion makes the genshin experience better and more organized. The only real issue i can see is the graphics which look squashed/stretched at times. A cool thing that would improve the app is recognition of a screenshot of the genshin inventory to automatically log, as logging the inventory every day can get kinda tiring. Keep it up, guys. Great app. :)

I've been using this app for months now and till now it's still my favorite place to check if I'm building my characters right. I love how neat everything is and how there is a calculator for the things we would need to bring a character to a certain lvl. This app is amazing and continues to be every update :))

Amazing! Very helpful. I love the design of the app too. It offers very detailed character builds (i have trouble with that) and can calculate how many materials you need for a character/weapon. I recommend it to everyone

WOW! This app is so helpful! There's literally everything you need! I've always had problem with building my characters, but with this app I understand it better! I can compare weapons and artifacts... Awesome! Also, you can see which materials you can get on a certain day! Helps a lot, too. I recommend this app to every person who plays Genshin Impact! Great job, team! ✨

title: Mopria Print Service
description:
Mopria Print Service enables printing over Wi-Fi or Wi-Fi Direct from your Android smartphone or tablet to Mopria® certified printers and multi-function printers (MFP) from Brother, Canon, DEVELOP, Epson, FUJIFILM, Gestetner, HP, Infotec, Konica Minolta, Kyocera, Lanier, Lenovo, Lexmark, NEC, NRG, Pantum, RICOH, Samsung, Savin, Sharp, TA Triumph Adler-UTAX, Toshiba and Xerox. The companies who make these devices have collaborated to create the Mopria Print Service to make printing easier and create an industry-wide print solution. Print. Scan. Go. 

If you want to check to see if you printer is Mopria® certified before installing the Mopria Print Service, check here:  http://mopria.org/certified-products. 

Easily print photos, web pages and documents when your mobile device is connected to a Mopria® certified printer through a wireless network or using Wi-Fi Direct®. Control print settings such as color, number of copies, duplex, paper size, page range, media type and orientation.  In the workplace, take advantage of the advanced punching, folding, stapling, PIN printing, user authentication, and accounting features.

The Mopria Print Service also allows users to print using the Share feature from many of their favorite apps including Facebook, Flipboard, LinkedIn, Twitter and Pinterest, giving users the power to print easily. When using the Share feature, users will see a Mopria Print Service option is included as an option after email and messaging. The Share icon is conspicuously placed and users simply select the Mopria Print Service option, select their printer, adjust settings and print.  

Mopria Print Service is pre-installed on some Android and Amazon devices. The device manufacturer determines which devices have the Mopria Print Service pre-installed and if the Mopria Print Service can be uninstalled from such devices.

For more detailed information, visit the following website: http://mopria.org/en/faq.

recentChanges:
• Add support for IPV6 network protocol
• Add support for additional large media sizes where the printer supports them
• Improved network support
• Improved printer hiding
• Bug fixes and reliability improvements
comments: I've been spending a lot of time in vain trying to get my HP printer back to norm again. I don't know what's going on with them and other printer apps since June 2021. However, this app right here installed and connected to my printer from my fabulous Android in less than 3 minutes and so far, I'm liking the platform more than HP.

I wasn't expecting this to work as Internet access around here is by 4g/5g only so there's no WiFi for both the app and the device, a Samsung S20+, as the handset's hotspot provides the WiFi to all of the other devices. I needn't have worried though, since the app is perfectly functional for cloud printing. GR9 app, well done.🙂👍

WOW 5 Stars for Now, after spending over a week with HP support they finally told me to try Mopira App and just WOW no login, no nothing, it found my printer on my network and I was able to print immediately thank you HP for directing me to this third party application. I was having issues printing word documents from an Android S8 phone and HP's app did not support printing word documents from Android and Mopria seems to work so far, I will keep you updated! TY Mooria
I'm using different types of multifonctions printers, XEROX, Hp, Kyocera. No problems to print. Easy to connect and easy to use.

For real I do appreciate this app your service is prompt and very responsive at once when needed. Believe me I can definitely give you five stars even more if there were any options but please consider it as five hundred stars. Thanks for your effort to have got us this wonderful app.

title: PingID
description: PingID® is a cloud-based strong authentication solution that enables users to authenticate to applications via their phone. PingID delivers a solution that is easy to use for end users with the security that administrators need. End users are presented with a notification on their device when strong authentication is needed and offers offline support when the device does not have a signal. This application is designed for use with for PingOne® and PingFederate®. Before installing this application, please verify your company or organization has licensed the use of PingID. For more information about this, please contact your administrator or Ping Identity support.

recentChanges: This version fixes an issue where the presented One Time Passcode is wrong on Android 11.
comments: This is the worst second factor authentication app I am forced to use. The notifications never work, getting a new ID is usually a weird process, numbers keep changing every few milliseconds for a while. Test your stuff.

This app is supposed to add security right? I use my fingerprint to unlock my phone on the first try, yet somehow ping ID has yet to recognize my finger print even once. The best part is, after failing the fingerprint test every time, I send the request again from my work PC and I can just approve it with no fingerprint. Even if my phone is locked, I unlock it and just hit approve on the second try. Absolutely minimal security, if I didn't need this app for work, I wouldn't use it.
You have to enter in a code twice. It's still an issue. Also it often doesn't go to the authentication page after I enter in my company ID and password.
My work uses this app to enable me to sign into my desktop and I'm constantly having issues with getting it to pop up on my phone to authenticate me which in turn makes me later to my job.
We were using Duo, it was good ..but once it changed to PingID, we are not getting the notification sometime and it vanish the notification after clicking on the popup without any trace.

title: Send Anywhere (File Transfer)
description:
Send Anywhere: Easy, quick, and unlimited file sharing 

▶ Features
• Transfer any file type without altering the original
• All you need is a one-time 6-digit key for an easy file transfer
• Wi-Fi Direct: transfer without using data or the Internet
• Share files to multi-people at once via a link
• Transfer files to a specific device
• Reinforced file encryption (256-bit)

▶ When to use Send Anywhere!
• When moving photos, videos, and music to your PC!
• When you need to send large files but you do not have mobile data or you have difficulty connecting to the internet
• Anytime you want to send files in an instant!

* While using the application if an issue or error arises, please let us know by clicking “Send Feedback” under More menu

-

APK File
• The copyright of applications sent through Send Anywhere belong to the application’s developer. If sharing an APK file conflicts with current copyright laws then all responsibility falls upon the user.
• Typically, you will not be able to share APK files between OS and Android. First check with application’s developer before cross-platform transfers.

Video Files
• Depending on the video type received, the video may not be pushed into the phone’s gallery. In this case, using a file management application will play the video.
• If you can’t play the videos received, download a different video player that is compatible with the video format.

-

To best use Send Anywhere’s convenient file sharing service, we ask user’s permissions listed below
• Write Internal Storage(Required) : To store files that are in internal storage through 'Send Anywhere'
• Read Internal Storage(Required) : To send files stored in internal storage through Send Anywhere.
• Access to location: To share files by using Wi-Fi Direct that through Google Nearby API.( Bluetooth may be turned on to find and identify near devices, so it may request Bluetooth permissions.)
• Write External Storage : To store files that are received through Send Anywhere in external storage (SD Card).
• Read External Storage : To send files stored in external storage through Send Anywhere.
• Read Contacts : To send contacts stored in your phone.
• Camera : For being able to receive files via a QR Code.

comments: Answering to developers respond, I never said I was using it as a cloud service... I said that when files are transferred from one device to the other they cannot be opened in the receiving device, it says 100% was completed but when you try to open them it is only a grey screen with an exclamation mark... a bit more care on reading the reviews would have avoided me needing to clarify this.

Works to transfer files to my SD card. Others can't get permission or just fail over my wifi. Runs faster than the others too . Has advertising that slows it down especially with getting the key code to begin receiving files, but once I got used to the wait for a 6 digit code, it works fine for me.
I always had a problem sending files from an iphone to an android phone and i never thought I'd find this app. Perfect! Easy to use. No problem so far...been using it for months now.

I still can't believe how oddly difficult it is to transfer files from Samsung to Xiaomi device. Tried with Smart Switch, didn't work. Then tried with Mi Mover, again didn't work. But luckily I have come across this amazing app that has literally saved my life from a big trouble. Perfect.

title: Collect by WeTransfer
description:
Collect is the best way to save everything that inspires you and fuels your ideas. Upload images and videos, save links and anything from across your apps, then organize it all into visual boards. You can share boards (if you want), and work together right in a board!

• Add images, songs, videos, documents and anything else you got

• Save links and cool stuff you find from across your apps
 
• Organize all your items into beautiful boards to visualize your ideas
 
• Share boards with anyone, no sign-up required
 
• Invite others to collaborate on boards so everyone’s on the same page
 
• Use the Chrome extension to save things for later and stay in your flow

------
Whether it’s inspiration, ideas you’re working on, references for later, or stuff you love—you can save, organize, and share it for free with Collect. To backup and sync all your boards and items across your devices, upgrade to Collect Pro.

------
About Us
WeTransfer makes beautifully obvious tools that bring ideas to life. Founded in 2009 as a simple, well-designed file sharing service for the creative community, WeTransfer has grown into a set of products for different parts of the creative process. These include storytelling platform WePresent, quick slide-making tool Paste, immersive sketching app Paper, inspiration-capturing tool Collect, and the WeTransfer.com platform, where 42 million people send one billion files every month.

Amsterdam
recentChanges: The latest version of Collect is better than ever with improved performance (and fewer bugs).
comments: Has made a straightforward method of transferring large files into a ridiculously complicated beast. Don't know how i'll get my photo scans now as I don't have a dvd drive. If you don't want another third party messing with your data do not install. This is another big brother watching you and trying to make you pay for the privilege. As to cross device sharing, I'm happy with Microsoft onedrive. How do I simply download like I used to? I rate this app as zero use to me.

Great app by all means. And functionally and aesthetically! It would be very useful though if there was an option to grant access (for boards) to emails just like Google drive does. But most importantly to block others from having access to boards who might have gotten the link without us wanting to.

Under "All Items" I can only load/select 20 items at a time... When downloading items I have no real time feedback of what is being downloaded and how many items are remaining. When downloading items and no title or description is given it says "Untitled" twice at the top, which looks ugly. The app can be improved.. get to work!

I used the free version of Wetransfer for years to send files to my printers and it never failed. I decided to upgrade to the paid version and have found the Wecollect absolutely dreadful. I have tried everything that the support team asked and nothing makes it work. I now have a huge amount of my work stored in an inaccessible location. How can I extract all my personal pictures and get a refund? I've found it impossible to access my photos. I've wasted hours and hours on this!

I've been using this for about a year now. The amount of times I've set up a board and it doesn't sync is innumerable. An almost completely useless product. In response to the below, I've been using the app with a fully paid WeTransfer account. When I say it doesn't sync, I mean nothing e en uploads, never mind syncing across devices.

title: Notepad - Sticky notes & Notebook, Notes
description:
🔥 Notepad app helps you take notes easily anytime, anywhere

💡 Notepad - notebook, notes has a simple interface, easy to use. Our note taking app always wants to bring the best experience for users. Note app allows users to customize your notebook to create their own style.

📝 Notes app features:
✅ Add notes and to-do lists.
✅ Create new note lists easily and conveniently.
✅ An annotation tool everywhere for you.
✅ Remind you of important notes at the right time.
✅ You can conveniently edit notes.
✅ Customize notebook topic and note list view as well as reminders

📝 Notes Widget:
✅ You can easily move your notes to the widget screen.
✅ Customize the size of the widget notes to fit your needs.
✅ Easily keep track of everyday tasks on the home screen of your phone.
✅ Your various job themes are created and moved easily with Notepad
✅ Handy, easy to use, simple and sophisticated.

📝 Notes with Reminder:
✅ Schedule work reminders so you don't miss important things.
✅ Easy to use note reminder feature with notebook
✅ Help you remember and remind to make your life easier.

📝 Notepad sync notes:
✅ Backup and restore your notes via Google Drive.
✅ You can also log in to different devices without losing notes.
✅ Recover accounts and data with Google accounts with sticky notes app.
✅ Eliminate worry about losing note data when switching phones.
✅ Easy to use with just one sync operation on Google Driver.

📝 Customize your notes:
✅ Easily customize the free colorful note theme.
✅ Backgroud diverse notes, many topics to help your notes more creative.
✅ Customize the checklist view vertically or horizontally according to your preferences.

📝 To do list - Checklist Notes:
✅ Create daily to-do lists, or to-do lists in your plan.
✅ Create to-do list simple list generator with sticky note.
✅ Check the completed tasks to help you track the progress of the job better with notepad
✅ Easy to use interface and handy.

📝 Sticky notes in everyday life:
✅ Update daily to-do list, regularly help you track your friend's schedule and overview the most optimal.
✅ Plan your upcoming projects and things like: Travel, work, shopping, etc. with Notepad.
✅ Use notes app as an indispensable tool to help you be more active.

💡 Notepad is an note app that reminds you to help you be more active in life, be proactive in your work and plans. Notebook app is in the process of developing and finalizing, please send your feedback and suggestions to us so we can develop the best application for your experience. Your suggestions will be very helpful to us.

Thank you so much, Best regards!

comments: using this app for 3 years. Then last week there were updates that made it horrible. I couldn't see the bottom words of my notes because they added a toolbar line that covers it. So adding notes was hard when you can't see what your writing. I emailed the company but no response. Then a few days later, half my notes were not visible. Just blank notes. I use my phone and tablet so it's not a device issue. The only good thing is that you can sync it to google so your notes are saved. Uninstalled

This app is best. But, recently I am having trouble. When I write my notes more than a certain number of lines the screen goes blank and I am not able to edit it. So please check the bug I would transfer myself to other app for now but please look into it. Once it will get solved I will surely return to this app.

Will update when they fix or something. So notes longer than (i am not sure the exact number) like 50 lines that whole notes is just vanshied. Its ok for short notes. But longer notes all gone (you can still highlight them copy and paste) but you cant see them Please fix

Love this app! Been using it for a while. I chose to get Notepad instead tik tok in lockdown. It has all my thoughts innit. However, there has been a minor error recently in my account. I have emailed your support team . Please kindly look into it . As Notepad has made me look into my self . 5 on 5 for me y'all.😎
I have used this app for sometime. But just recently I have lost all my notes and when I try to sync them it fails every time. Why is this happening. I did update the app.

title: Forest - Focus Timer for Productivity
description:
★ Google Play 2015-2016 Best App of the Year
★ 2018 Google Play Editors’ Choice Top Productivity App
★ Google Play 2018 Best Social Impact App Nomination
★ 2018 Google Play Best Self-improvement app in Canada, Mexico, France, Russia, Brazil, Japan, Korea, India, and Thailand!

Can't stop scrolling? Keep off your phone with the cutest focus timer, and unleash your productivity along with 6 million satisfied paying users.

🌟Welcome to Forest, the place where procrastination does not exist!🌟

Staying focused has never been harder in this world of digital distractions. From phone calls to text messages, your attention is constantly being diverted. 

Plant a tree when you need to stay focused. If you commit to your task without getting distracted, your tree grows; if you cannot resist the temptation to use your phone, your tree dies. Over time, you will have an entire forest built from your focus and commitment. 

Free yourself from obsessive scrolling and achieve your goals!

GET MOTIVATED💪
• Break phone addiction and form productive habits.
• Earn rewards by staying focused and unlock adorable trees!
• Grow your very own forest with each tree representing your efforts.
• View your daily/weekly/monthly/yearly progress and learn about your own focus habits.
• Concentrate on a daily routine and manage ADHD.

FOCUS LIKE A PRO ✍️ 
Activate Pro version and access more exciting features that will help you concentrate and procrastinate no more:

• Plant real trees on Earth with our partner, Trees for the Future - We've planted over 1,000,000 real trees so far!🌲
• Set up a customized allowlist - 
leaving Forest and using apps added to the allowlist will not kill your tree.
• Categorize your tasks with tags and see how you allocated your time.
• Track your phone usage and screen time.
• Compete with users around the world.
• Plant with friends - If one of you fail to stay focused, you'll all get a dead tree!

Plant a tree and start building life-changing habits with Forest!

NOTICE
• Forest is available for Android mobile and tablet devices, and can be accessed across all Android devices with Pro version. To download the non-Android version of Forest requires a separate purchase. However, by logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
• Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. 

Permissions Explained: https://www.forestapp.cc/permissions/en/

CONNECT WITH US
Follow us on Instagram: @forest_app
Follow us on Twitter: @forestapp_cc

We also have a chrome extension. Find out more at www.forestapp.cc!

-Sound Design: Shi Kuang Lee

recentChanges: New co-branding statue arrives! Come move the "Statue of Tada" to your Forest!
comments: Forest is a good and really cute app! I just wish that I could arrange the trees in any way I want. Also, it would be really cute if animals could roam in the forest so that the forest won't feel so empty hehehe! Hope you can consider this in the next updates but nevertheless, I'm happy with this app. 😊

After switching to a new phone, it doesn't allow me to restore my pro account. It keeps sending errors 601, 599, 61, 600 ect. I don't know what they all mean. I guess it only allows you to use pro account on one device. And if you loose that device, you can't restore your account again

I love this app!! It's easy to use and not too complicated. It's simply what I was looking for. It would have been even better if there was a feature in which we can customise our forest. Like for example move the plants to where we prefer and design the forest accordingly our preference. But this app is more than brilliant. Love it!

Does exactly what it should! You can monitor how you spend your time with the tags and it's nice to see your forest grow. Premium is very affordable and I honestly think it is worth it to support this app. Great job Forest!

To start, yes it lets u grow little trees during time, but everything else you have to pay real money for. The cute trees is shows in the pictures, real money, the planting real trees, real money, the friends part, real money. And the basic trees you get at the beggining all cost coins which u get for studying certain amounts of time. And half of them dont change or grow so its just a tree/item sitting there while u study. Better off getting other apps.

title: Flashlight LED - Universe
description:
Unique LED Flashlight with the widget and beautiful design. 
Stroboscope for blinking flash with different frequency. Widget with green and red colors.
You can use bright LED light or soft light of display when your family is asleep

- Apk file size 1 MB
- Unique design

comments: Changed from 5 stars to 1 star: why - tried to purchase app for a $1.99, unexpected error transaction declined. (Google 1 tap pay) added different payment methods, uninstalled and reinstalled the app all to no avail. Permanently deleted app scrolled down found a similar app, installed it and removed ads for $1.00 also able to customize the new app with some rather inventive features. Bottom line purchase a different app.
I use it in the evening while takingbmy dogs for a walk. It does a good job, illuminating the path. thanks
Loved it from the start down loaded during a power outage
1 star for ads. Ridiculous.

Just like the Energizer Bunny, I can always count on this app whenever I need it. We had some crazy storms blow through here this evening knocking out our power. I wish this app had built-in a/c but this sure beats sitting in the dark.

title: Kia Access with UVO link
description:
Kia Access with UVO link is the official Kia America owner’s app. Kia Access with UVO link makes getting your vehicle information and services easier than ever. Gain all the benefits of the Kia Owner’s Portal, combined with the convenient, streamlined features of UVO link (if equipped) [1] [2]– right in the palm of your hand.

Download the app to access:

• Owner’s Manual, quick guides, videos, and warranty information
• Vehicle payment information (if financed through Kia Motors Finance)
• Information about maintenance milestones

Vehicles equipped with UVO link may also have access to the following features: 
• Vehicle health reports [2]
• Send locations to your vehicle’s navigation system [3]
• Remotely lock/unlock doors and initiate horns & lights [2]
• Remotely find your car [3]
• Remotely set your car’s cabin temperature [4]

Plug-in hybrid and electric vehicles support special features, including:
• Remotely check battery status and estimated driving range
• Locate charging stations  
• Schedule charging times

Kia Access with UVO link also supports Wear OS smartwatch features. Use the smartwatch menu to access select features.

Get Kia Access with UVO link today! 

UVO eco users – Enjoy your UVO features with Kia Access with UVO link!
UVO luxe users – Enjoy your UVO features with Kia Access with UVO link!

UVO eServices users – Please continue to enjoy the UVO eServices app. 

Create an owner account directly from the app or go to: Kia.com/owners

[1] UVO link is currently unavailable for Model Year 2022 vehicles sold or purchased in Massachusetts. See UVO Terms of Service for more information.
[2] Features only available for vehicles equipped with UVO link. Determine UVO availability for your vehicle by visiting: https://owners.kia.com/content/owners/en/uvo-availability.html/
[3] Vehicle must be equipped with UVO link and navigation
[4] Some vehicles with UVO link may not support remote climate control (e.g., 2019 Optima LX)

Use of Kia Access with UVO link is subject to agreement to the Kia Privacy Policy (available at https://www.kia.com/us/en/content/privacy-and-legal/privacy-policy) and Terms of Service (available at https://www.kia.com/us/en/content/terms-of-use).

UVO features require an active UVO subscription; purchase/lease of a new Kia vehicle with UVO link includes a complimentary subscription starting from new vehicle retail sale/lease date as recorded by the dealer. Length of subscription is dependent upon the specific model year of your vehicle. Use of UVO is subject to agreement to the UVO Privacy Policy (available at https://owners.kia.com/us/en/privacy-policy.html) and Terms of Service (available at https://owners.kia.com/us/en/terms-of-service.html). Contact Kia at 800-333-4KIA (4542) or https://ksupport.kiausa.com/ConsumerAffairs for questions or help with enrollment.

Only use UVO when safe to do so. Message and data rates may apply. Cellular and GPS coverage is required to use most features. UVO features may vary by model, model year, and trim level. Features, specifications, and fees are subject to change. For more on details and limitations, visit https://owners.kia.com/content/owners/en/uvo-availability.html/ or your authorized Kia dealer.

Remote Features: Do not use remote climate control or remote start if your vehicle is in an enclosed area (e.g., closed garage) or a partially enclosed area without ventilation. Close all doors leading from adjacent living areas to the vehicle area before executing a remote climate control or remote start command.

comments: The app is basically OK, I suppose. Remote starting hasn't worked for a while but I'm guessing may be a problem with info/nav system in my K5. That thing is completely screwed up and the service departments at two Kia dealerships seem clueless. Not just about the info/nav system, but about everything to do with this car. Traded in a Mercedes E-class. The Kia K5 is actually a better car in a lot of ways, but the service departments are miles behind Mercedes.

The worst part is when it tells you vehicle status and something is wrong and you take it to the dealer and there's nothing wrong . 360 view. Does not work. They tell you to stick a pin in it. Restart your modem in your brand new car. Crazy will not pay for this. Really Dear Jeff I am following up with you regarding your inquiry for the 360 View being unable to be seen on the app. At this time, the functionality has been moved to the website only on the Kia Owner's Portal. I do see that

It works, except on wear os as this is also advertised to work on. Just the smartphone version works. This app works as planned, only has trouble saving settings one out of every 50 times. The app is plain, no dark mode as there are also no widgets. I would love to have a batter widget for my EV but you can check the battery level of the vehicle in app. The app remote start works well as does the remote lock. It saves the location of where your vehicle is at and it will also show you some charging stations on a map for you to find with the details if the the stations are occupied or not. If they can make the wear os app so you can at least have the basic remote features to lock/unlock, climate control, and check battery status on the watch itself. Then this app would get a 5 star. Other than that the app is okay.

Not to bad. It sure beats having to walk long ways to lock your vehicle doors when you forget to do it. When its cold i dont have to freeze for 15 mins waiting for engine to warm up for heat. If i could change anything i would like to be able to control more features like seat warmers and steering warmerd in the winter. All in all its a good app.

Pretty good but the 360° camera view doesn't display the captured photos on Android, and setting up favorite destinations and uploading to the car's nav system doesn't seem to work. Fix those two issues and I will revise my rating. However, that the Stinger _finally_ has UVO Link convinced me to buy a GT2 Scorpion Edition and I am LOVING it, Kia!!

title: widgetopia iOS 14 : Widgets
description:
From the team behind WatchMaker, the largest watchface design community in the world - get ready to make your home screen unique with widgetopia!

If you got bored of the same old look on your Android smartphone and want to do something new then try this iOS 14 Launcher app.

Try the new aesthetic refreshed look of iOS 14 on your Android smartphone, with all the widgets for iOS 14.

THOUSANDS OF WIDGETS

There are 3500+ pre-built widgets which you can use right away!

CREATE YOUR OWN WIDGET

With widgetopia, you can use our powerful design tools to make your own designs and display any data you need.
- 3500+ widgets, more each day!
- Full designer tool
- Time & date
- Digital clock
- Analog clock including seconds
- 1000 Watch Hands + Backgrounds
- Weather (current, hourly, daily)
- Steps
- Charts
- Countdowns
- Battery Indicator
- Use your own photos
- Javascript expressions
- Moon phase
- Calendar + Agenda
- Activity rings
- Progress bars
- Import widgets
- Themeable widgets
- Transparent widgets
- Custom JSON Endpoints
- Animated GIFs
- Color Widgets and monochrome
- iPhone style widgets like WidgetSmith
- Much more coming soon!

REMIX EXISTING WIDGETS

You can remix any widget you like and customize to your heart's content!


PRICING

Free version allows use of all widgets excluding those with weather data, including full design tools.
Upgrade to the premium version (one-off payment) to unlock all widgets, get regular content updates and remove ads!
No subscriptions or hidden fees.

Privacy Policy: https://widgetopia.io/privacy/wm
Terms of Use: https://widgetopia.io/terms/wm

Requested access:
Calendar - display calendar data on widgets
Google Fit - widgetopia optionally integrates with Google Fit. This data is used to display your step count and activity if you select one of those widget types.
Location - get weather data for your location
