comments: The weather and clocks periodically don't update. I have to delete and repopulate the widget for it to update. Has happened multiple times so I reached out for a refund. No response. Buggy app and horrible customer service. Do not recommend.
A little glitchy, but it's not bad. Also you have to be a premium member to do alot, but overall. I have enjoyed using a few of the widgets that fit my phone aesthetic.

It's a great app lets you customize a lot but the only issue I have is if I try to add a battery symbol to a widget, it shows the battery is 100% but it's actually at 28% or something. I set it to refresh every second but it's still not working. It would be great if u could fix that

Update: all the widgets i have tried that are large havent worked. Ill try on my other device. Ok it works on my LG V60 5G. But still isnt working on Samsung Galaxy Note 10+. --------------------------- ((Just like other review. It just days "Loading". (Device: Samsung Galaxy Note 10 plus) ok i have been messing with it for days. I got the small one to work but big and medium just say loading forever. Tried force stop tried restart device nothing works.))
No manual, or area/place for such, no way to figure out how to use your own fonts or other customizations. Completed widgets, or the app, don't appear when I attempt to use it. Epic fail.

title: SecureW2 JoinNow
description:
You can securely access your organization's wireless network after easy configuration using the SecureW2 JoinNow app. JoinNow only needs to be run once, then you'll be able to connect to your organization's secure Wi-Fi network. 

How does it work? There are two steps that occur when you do the one-time setup:

The app will automatically download your organization's Wi-fi configuration settings and install them on your device.

Your device will connect to the network through a secure, encrypted connection.

From there on, you don't need to do anything beyond leaving JoinNow on your device. You'll be able to effortlessly connect to your network.

Please note:

Deleting the app (or deactivating it through an "app sleep" feature, as seen on Samsung devices) will remove the Wi-Fi configuration settings, interrupting your Wi-Fi connection. 

Google's Android device policy is the reason why you are required to set a screen PIN lock once your device is configured for connection to secure wireless networks. This is not a SecureW2 JoinNow policy. Your screen PIN lock must be enabled, otherwise you may experience issues with connectivity.
 
If you have any questions or issues with the app, be sure to check out our Android Common Issues page here: 

https://cloud.securew2.com/public/guides/android/

You may also read our Privacy policy here: https://cloud.securew2.com/public/general/privacy-policy.html


To learn more about SecureW2 and the services we offer, you can visit our site: https://www.securew2.com/

comments: At least once a week I have to uninstall and reinstall this darn app because it randomly stops working and won't allow me to connect to the university internet. Extremely frustrating when you have to spend an hour setting up internet when you're just trying to write your thesis. Unfortunately there is no other way to connect to the university internet except using this app so I just have to put up with it.

Doesn't work, still can't connect to organizations wifi. Using Android 10, followed instructions to the letter. Tried multiple times. Fails every time. Absolute garbagio, avoid this app at all costs and petition your schools to abandon it ASAP
This app does not work anymore, you guys keep telling people to give you feed back. This has been an issues for over a year now, why isn't this fixed yet?

Will not let me connect to my University wifi. It says I'm enrolled successfully but when I check my wifi I'm still on guest network forcing me to renew my wifi every few hours and will not allow me to connect to my school wifi for full access. Following the troubleshoot instructions did not help either

kann mich mit meinem s20 gar nicht verbinden obwohl die app meint, dass ich erfolgreich angemeldet bin. EDIT: i sent you an Email but its just like i descriped, it just doesnt connect and it use to connect normally

title: Todoist: To-Do List, Tasks & Reminders
description:
🏆 2020 Editor's Choice by Google
🥇 "Todoist is the best to-do list app right now" - The Verge

Todoist is used by 20 million people to organize, plan and collaborate on projects, both big and small.

Use Todoist to:
• Capture and organize tasks the moment they pop into your head.
• Remember deadlines with reminders and due dates. 
• Build lasting habits with recurring due dates like "every Monday".
• Organize your projects in kanban style with Boards.
• Collaborate on projects by assigning tasks to others.
• Prioritize your tasks with priority levels.
• Track your progress with personalized productivity trends.
• Integrate your tools like Gmail, Google Calendar, Slack, Amazon Alexa and more.

Available on any device, Todoist will quickly become your hub for getting work and life organized.

Why you’ll love it on Android:
• Stay organized from your phone, tablet and watch.
• Drag the Plus Button anywhere to insert a new task.
• Simply type details like "tomorrow at 4pm" and Todoist will recognize it all for you.
• All the power from Android: lock screen widget, Quick Add tile, Assistant, and notifications.

Happy organizing!

• • •

Questions? Feedback? Visit get.todoist.help or reach out on Twitter @todoist.

*About Pro plan billing*:
If you upgrade to the Pro plan, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can choose to be billed monthly or yearly. You can turn off auto-renew in your Google Play settings any time after purchase.

comments: Technology is outdated. Worst of all is the popup window structure for opening projects in the web interface. There is NO AUTO SAVE! If you click off the project or task popup you lose everything you've entered. Saving is a bear. Sometimes it is an arrow. Sometimes it's a save button. Entering an alarm is an absurdly elaborate process. Ordering tasks is possible in the app; it's not possible in the web interface. The app has been out for years. I am shocked these issues have not been addressed.

Widget options are very minimal. Doesn't allow pulling in calendar events, so you'll still need to manage those obligations in another app. Subtasks on recurring tasks behave in a disconnected way in that you have to set up their recurrence separately and it can easily get out of sync. Date/recurrence input is unintuitive.

Was pleasantly surprised with nice UI and ability to add and organize tasks. Got everything moved over from G Tasks and set to use Todoist. That was until I was waiting for a reminder to notify me a task is due. A notification of a task due is an integral part of task management. Unfortunately you must purchase the premium version for this to work, which in my opinion makes this app completely unusable.

Just right. It's not crowded with unnecessary features. Which I really like. I know a task manager app is very easy to create so devs usually end up adding too much features just because. A good example is ClickUp. Either way I like it 😉

App used to be good, used it for chores and household tasks. Now the Today page no longer shows which Project and/or Section a task is listed under (I have a Cleaning project with Sections for each room). So now I have two "Clean sink" tasks in my Today page, and I wouldn't know which two sinks it's referring to. Master bathroom sink? Guest bathroom sink? Kitchen sink? Really annoying, I have to now click on them to find out. Bring back the label that showed each task's Project and Section.

title: GitHub
description:
There’s a lot you can do on GitHub that doesn’t require a complex development environment – like sharing feedback on a design discussion, or reviewing a few lines of code. GitHub for Android lets you move work forward wherever you are. Stay in touch with your team, triage issues, and even merge, right from the app. We’re making these tasks easy for you to perform, no matter where you work, with a beautifully native experience.

You can use GitHub for Android to:

• Browse your latest notifications
• Read, react, and reply to Issues and Pull Requests
• Review and merge Pull Requests
• Organize Issues with labels, assignees, projects, and more
• Browse your files and code

recentChanges:
Resolve pull request conversations by tapping the "Resolve" button on pull request comment threads.
Tapping on Quote Reply with selected text will now quote just the selection.
Code options are now configurable while viewing files.
comments: The bestest Mobile App i've ever used. It has zero Adds. Infact it does not have a single Add of Rating etc or something Else. I've come specially to give it a 5 star rating so that they came to know that their App is very Amazing. Its the first time in my life I've done such thing. RESPECT FOR GIT HUB CREATERS.😊

Great for reading through docs, browsing code, and managing issues and PRs. It'd be really nice to also manage Projects, some repo settings (like Pages), and Gists. I don't need to be able to upload code to a repo.
Awesome app. But could there be a functionality to search code base in "browser code" mode? I'll update my rating when this is implemented
Tab sizes default to 8 spaces with no way to change it in the settings. The UI is great, but code is unreadable... thus, the app is useless.

I was logging in after some time and had forgot my password. The only option available for me to reset the password is to solve a puzzle which is to pick the image with dice adding up to 14. Inspite of solving the puzzle correctly I had to solve the puzzle multiple times. Still it wouldn't let me in. I decided to reach out to support. Guess what, the only way to reach out to support is to solve the same dice adding puzzle, and it again did not let me raise a ticket. Not a user friendly app.

title: NETGEAR Orbi – WiFi System App
description:
The NETGEAR Orbi app gives you convenient access to your router’s features:
- Anywhere Access – Monitor and control your home WiFi from anywhere.
- Smart Parental Controls - Filter content and limit time online automatically with Circle® on NETGEAR. 
- Armor Security – Advanced cybersecurity on your network to protect all devices from online threats.
- Speed Test – See if you’re getting the internet broadband speeds you’re paying for.
- Guest WiFi – Set up a secure and separate WiFi network for guests. 
- Traffic Meter – Monitor internet usage over time.
- Easily pause WiFi, update firmware, and more!

The NETGEAR Orbi app is always being improved. Install it today!

For more information about your Orbi WiFi System, visit http://www.support.netgear.com

comments: Latest update (July 2021) is awful. Previously the app was a little annoying at times with screens reloading a few seconds after initially loading so you ended up clicking on the wrong devices to block/unblock. Now, I'm just presented with a list of 100s of devices - most are no longer active due to the way Android randomizes MAC addresses. These don't show up on the web version and so I'm left with a horrible user experience of having to delete each one - one at a time in the app. After investing lots of time and money in getting my Orbi system setup to a reasonable working system, it's just awful that this is ruined by an update I didn't need/want.

DO NOT CLICK THE PAUSE BUTTON. I did so yesterday and discovered that the pause button in the Device Manager "pauses" you connection to the Internet. The internal network functions but the outside world might as well no longer exist. And guess what? There is simply no way to UNPAUSE. I looked through every panel in the web interface; nothing there. The app itself -- once you've "paused" the Internet -- errors out when trying to go to Device Manager. I spent an hour trying to figure out how to unpause and finally gave up. I finally had to do a hard factory reset and manually reconfigure all my custom settings. Pause is an idiotic "feature" that gives no warning that you're about to completely knock yourself offline and gives you no functional way to unpause. I'm also annoyed that upon setting up my network again from scratch, the Orbi app automatically signed me up for the Armor service, which I've specifically NOT signed up for ever. So now Armor is happily scanning every device in my network to tell me the answer I already know: The devices are not vulnerable to any known exploits. And there is no apparent way to turn off the Armor service. I expect after the trial ends that I will get an endless stream of spam from them begging me to pay for the overpriced and unnecessary subscription. I love the Obri hardware. I do not love the Orbi app or Netgear's hard sell of subscription services I know I do not need or want.

Freezes half the time. Says not connected to the network. Drops/clears speed test/Armor result history. Constantly forces ads at you to sell you their services. Drains the battery even when not open. Now with the newest update, it lists every MAC address that's ever connected to your network with no way if filtering to only view active devices. WebUI shows router firmware updates available but app says everything is up to date. I can with confidence say I'll never buy Netgear products again.

Installation was horrible. App froze several times, I waited, it failed repeatedly. Restarting left me guessing what to do. still don't see options to set IP ranges and other tailored setup things. no way to skip the armor 30 day demo. I work in IT and have been doing this stuff for 30 years, I don't know how people who don't have that experience get this stuff setup.

Not a substitute for the web browser interface. Very few available settings can actually be modified with this app, and worst of all the security settings are locked behind a subscription paywall. Either they're behind the paywall or the app actually has no security settings and they simply link to the panhandling $$ ask. Installing this app has led me to regret ever purchasing an orbi mesh router.

title: Wondr Note - Pretty notes, lists, countdown & more
description:
Wondr Note is a creative & unique take on notes & lists. We asked ourselves, "Why can't notes be pretty & useful?". And so we created Wondr Note in the hopes of providing ultimate convenience, productivity & visual appeal. 

From poems to shopping lists to travel expenses to errands checklist. Plan/add errands and todo lists to your day. Countdown to a big event or build an inspiration board for your next project. Keep your notes, lists, mood boards & accounts here. Easily categorize and search through titles and items. Add items to your agendas & customize the app with themes. We try our best to keep it simple, clean & pretty.


▌STUFF YOU COULD DO ON WONDR NOTE

✓ Make a shopping list for tomorrow
✓ Add widgets of your important lists, agendas or countdowns
✓ Add a checklist of your errands & chores in daily agendas
✓ Make simple expense accounts of an outing or trip you just returned from
✓ Add all your favourite recipes with a picture and steps in a numbered todo list
✓ Write short stories
✓ Keep diary entries with an image each
✓ Take down bulleted lecture notes and lists
✓ Make a todo list for assignments or homework
✓ Make a countdown of days to your examinations
✓ Create a board with your wishlist of things you want to buy or do
✓ Categorize and color all the above
✓ And many more…! 

▌FEATURES

★ Notes
★ Lists with options for checklist, numbering & bullets
★ Basic accounts
★ Mood Boards of images with description
★ Day countdown
★ Widgets (Notes, lists, countdowns, quick-add & today's agenda)
★ Autosaving
★ Tags(pick or add your own)
★ Themes
★ Backgrounds (pick or add your own)
★ Share notes to your friends or apps
★ Share info from other apps and save as a note

Add daily agenda

★ Add items from lists & notes into daily agendas
★ Add new items to agendas

Themes, backgrounds & customization

★ Choose from over 20+ themes free and 20+ more premium
★ Beautifully themed throughout the app according to your selection
★ Customize and create your own premium theme 
★ Add color to your notes, lists, accounts and countdown
★ Add a feature image to your notes, lists, accounts and countdown
★ Choose from over 20+ backgrounds free and 20+ more premium
★ Add your own background

Other features

★ Drag & drop features to manually organize your notes, lists & more
★ Categorize all items & easily search for them
★ Pick list or grid view
★ Share notes to your friends or apps
★ Share info from other apps and save as a note

Privacy Policy

★ Only you own, and have access to all your data
★ Your data is stored in the internal storage of your device inaccessible by other applications
★ We do not collect or store any data
★ Backup & restore your data in Google Drive (Beta)

Coming Soon

★ Calendar
★ Font customization

recentChanges:
An awesome new update for you guys! With all your valuable feedback, we have added more features and improved design as well as usability!

- Autosave! Everything saves automatically

comments: I have used Color Note since 2017 and this is so much better. It's cuter and a lot more functional, and you can add tags to keep up with everything, kind of like hashtags. You can add pictures, agendas, lists, and even keep track of finances, as well as a lot of customization features at your disposal. I had it crash on me but support was responsive, however I recommend to people to back up often just in case it crashes. The customer service is awesome, and I will recommend this app to my folks!

I honestly don't usually write reviews but the latest update was so good that I have to sing it's praises. The slicker UI makes navigating the app, which already was good, a breeze. The new agenda features which let me plan ahead, as well as the UI making it a pleasure to use, has made me switch to using this as my main ToDo list. Fantastic! I applaud the team behind such a wonderful app. Keep up the good work!

Really cute note taking app! It's a little confusing at first but well made. It would be nice to have a feature to toggle dark mode/light mode from within the app though. Also, maybe an easier way to delete notes from the main screen! Keep up the good work!

It's still a new app, so features are limited, but I really like it! The functionality it does have works well and I really appreciate the visual customization. Can't wait to see what else the devs have in store for this gem!

Wish I didn't pay for premium. The widgets don't work,I can open the app and make agendas but I can't put it on my homescreen because the widget doesn't work for me. Smh, it's too bad because it's cute af and I would love to be able to use it.

Worst app ever..pls don't waste ur time on this stupid app. Back while, I was preparing presentation for my seminar and suddenly an error msg popped and the app stopped working. comments: A better app needs to be made , with actually things that help make pH service work correctly, but leave it to Q-link, to never be there for ya with the right answer. This app blows, it does no options of changing any thing that needs changed, so what's the point of installing this app? Or it's just another form of Google tracking everything you do kind of things, bet that's the whole point to even have a useless app such as this one.👎

My problem is not so much with the app, it is with my service. My phone is on roaming at 100% of the time, and my data is throttled to a speed that is almost unusable. I got my tablet, but there is no SIM card in it so I have to connect it to the internet. I wanted to use the hotspot on my phone but my signal isn't good enough to maintain a connection I am supposed to have unlimited everything. I have been a customer for almost 3 years and everything was okay until they sent out the new SIM card

I have an unlimited everything plan because I brought my own phone and number, twice now my data has been throttled or in this case completely shut down. I called customer service to find out what the problem was with mine account they told me that I had used an excessive amount of data in a short amount of time, therefore if I wanted to use more data I would have to purchase a data package. What good is a lifeline if you cannot access anything should an emergency arise.

Used to give 5 stars but recently as in end of June I placed an order for a new phone and I had to call on the !!!!26th!!!! OF JULY because I was still receiving acct Inactivity and I'm like shhhhh ***t can't use service if you don't send me the phone I payed for since my Moto is broken. So I call customer support who assures me that I will definitely receive my phone since" they just got phone back in stock and I will get an email with in 2 days time confirming ,BS no email and NOPHONE

I rarely give 1-star reviews, but I hate this app! It does nothing for me–can't login (customer service won't reply), can't uninstall or change permissions! Rude to make customers keep apps they don't want + I believe they sell user data. And why did FBI raid them 2 weeks ago? Things that make you go hmm! ⊙﹏◎ I object to forced surveillance by apps. Gov't EBB $ubsidy reimburses Q-Link well above the value of the piece of s-*^ SLOWEST, cheapest outdated 2GB RAM tablet! SHAME ON YOU Q-LINK 💩🤏

title: Evernote - Notes Organizer & Daily Planner
description:
Capture ideas when inspiration strikes. Bring your notes, to-dos, and schedule together to tame life’s distractions and accomplish more—at work, at home, and everywhere in between. 

Evernote syncs to all your devices, so you can stay productive on the go. Tackle your to-do list with Tasks, connect your Google Calendar to stay on top of your schedule, and see your most relevant information quickly with a customizable Home dashboard.

Note: The new version of Evernote is available for Android version 10 and newer. Users of Android version 9 and older will receive the Evernote Legacy app. The new Evernote for Android will be made available for Android versions 6, 7, 8 and 9 in a future update.

"Use Evernote as the place you put everything … Don’t ask yourself which device it’s on—it’s in Evernote" – The New York Times
 
“When it comes to taking all manner of notes and getting work done, Evernote is an indispensable tool.” – PC Mag
 
---

CAPTURE IDEAS
• Write, collect, and capture ideas as searchable notes, notebooks, and to-do lists.
• Clip interesting articles and web pages to read or use later. 
• Add different types of content to your notes: text, docs, PDFs, sketches, photos, audio, web clippings, and more.
• Use your camera to scan and organize paper documents, business cards, whiteboards, and handwritten notes.
 
GET ORGANIZED
• Manage your to-do list with Tasks—set due dates and reminders, so you never miss a deadline.
• Connect Evernote and Google Calendar to bring your schedule and your notes together.
• See your most relevant information instantly on the Home dashboard.
• Create separate notebooks to organize receipts, bills, and invoices.
• Find anything fast—Evernote's powerful search can even find text in images and handwritten notes.

ACCESS ANYWHERE
• Sync your notes and notebooks automatically across any Chromebook, phone, or tablet.
• Start work on one device and continue on another without missing a beat.

EVERNOTE IN EVERYDAY LIFE
• Keep a journal to keep your thoughts organized. 
• Go paperless by scanning receipts and important documents.

EVERNOTE IN BUSINESS
• Keep everyone up to date by capturing meeting notes and sharing notebooks with your team.
• Bring people, projects, and ideas together with shared Spaces. 
 
EVERNOTE IN EDUCATION
• Keep track of lecture notes, exams, and assignments so you don’t miss important details.
• Create notebooks for each class and keep everything organized.

---

Also available from Evernote:
 
EVERNOTE PERSONAL
• 10 GB of new uploads each month
• Unlimited number of devices
• Create and manage tasks
• Connect one Google Calendar account
• Access your notes and notebooks offline

EVERNOTE PROFESSIONAL
• 20 GB of new uploads each month
• Unlimited number of devices
• Create, manage, and assign tasks
• Connect multiple Google Calendar accounts
• Access your notes and notebooks offline
• Home dashboard - Full customization
 
Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Where applicable, your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may not be cancelled for refund except as provided in Evernote's Commercial Terms. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.

---

Privacy Policy: https://evernote.com/legal/privacy.php
Terms of Service: https://evernote.com/legal/tos.php
Commercial terms: https://evernote.com/legal/commercial-terms

recentChanges:
Fixed
- Reminder notifications now appear at the correct time.
- Smoother scrolling through search results.
comments: The app was great on Android until the last month with the new updates. 1. It takes 2 minutes for the app to open. 2. It crashes and sometimes doesn't save my note. 3. My note when I lightly swipe my screen. 4. When I open a note, it opens in view only mode and doesn't allow me to edit. I have to close and re-open and refresh a few times to use it. I have had to use another app so I can quickly jot down notes. Considering using Onenote if this issue isn't fixed. At least it saves my work.

I've been using this app for the last 8 years and it has been amazing, but the last updates have made the app completely unusable. There is simply no way to launch the app as it crashes before opening... This is part of the reasons I have not purchased the Pro version yet... There's always issues either with the widgets or the app. There is no support, and now, no app either. Please fix this ASAP or like many, I'll be forced to use a different app or even the default apps of the phone.

Great app, I use it a lot in conjunction with my rocketbook. Just wish it had more widgets like a calendar, todo list, sticky note, alerts, etc that correlated with their in app stuff... it really helps to remember things to have up front reminders in my face all the time on my phone and computer. I'm very forgetful. My desk is covered in sticky notes lol

Seems that data integrity was quite low on their list of priorities for the new version. Also requires a full time internet connection if you want to view even your offline notes. Offline doesn't seem to mean what it used to. No good for fieldwork with unconnected tablet. Need to use some other note app and then copy notes to Evernote once an internet connection is available.

Horrible just horrible. 10-year subscriber. What have you done to this app. If you try to save something to Evernote using Android share mode it automatically assigns a tag from some previous note and you can't get rid of it unless you save it and then reopen it and then delete that tag. Multi-step process. Come on man. Pathetic. In edit. You still can't add a tag if you try to save a note. Have to save the note reopen it, clear tags then add a tag. Bad

title: Smart Eye Tech-File Protection
description:
Screen Privacy and Document Security

Whether it’s private personal documents, photos or videos; or highly confidential business documents, contracts or presentations; no one should be able to view or have access to them except for you and anyone else you want to see them.  No one else. Period. It’s none of their business.  

Protect your files, your intellectual property, your privacy.  Keep sensitive documents private and confidential with Smart Eye Technology.  

Working at coffee shop? In line at the airport? Can you be sure no one is looking over your shoulders viewing that important file on your phone?  Smart Eye is the only authentication security platform that blocks unauthorized viewers with continuous biometric identification. 

When you open and view any type of file in the Smart Eye app, your device authenticates your identity and access through continuous facial recognition. Moment by moment the device scans your face.  If you put your phone down while the file is still open, a warning sign pops up to prevent passerby’s from seeing the file. The device also scans for any unauthorized faces that come into view. If someone does a warning sign pops up blocking their view and alerting you.

Secure File Sharing and Document Control
• Send and receive documents with confidence. Smart Eye Technology puts you in complete control over who can view your documents and how they can access them.  

Secure file sharing begins with using multiple biometrics to authenticate access to documents you send. Select the number of biometrics you require to authenticate the receiver.  Default is two.  

Then control over document access is at your fingertips. How long can they have access? 24 hours? 72 hours? Where can they access it? At the office only? Can they share it? Can they download the document? Default is no. Changed your mind and want to delete access after sent? Done. Get notifications and keep track of activity on your document. 

Secure Platform
• No document hacking through emails. No passwords to remember or hack. Smart Eye provides vigilant protection with its pioneering biometric security platform and the most advanced end-to-end encryption (256 bit encryption). 

Smart Eye Technology is Technology for Your Eyes Only.  Download Smart Eye today, and we’ll keep an eye out for you.

Smart Eye Features:

Privacy & Security
• Protect your privacy with continuous biometric recognition
• View documents in a public place without fear of eavesdroppers
• Continuous facial recognition ensures you and only you can see your screen
• “Multiple viewers” warning when someone peeks at your screen
• “Away from phone” pops up when you’re not at your phone

Biometric ID
• Facial recognition
• Fingerprint recognition
• Print behavior 
• Voice recognition
• Iris recognition (COMING SOON)
• Sign documents with facial recognition

Advanced Document Control
• Upload, review, send, receive, store and sign e-documents
• Protect documents you send with multiple biometrics
• Control document access limits
• Document tracking with real-time notifications
• Set retention requirements to keep information secure

Take control of your security. Protect your documents with Smart Eye Technology.

Visit us at:
www.getsmarteye.com

Protect your files, your intellectual property, your privacy. Keep sensitive documents private and confidential with Smart Eye Technology.

Working at coffee shop? In line at the airport? Can you be sure no one is looking over your shoulders viewing that important file on your phone? Smart Eye is the only authentication security platform that blocks unauthorized viewers with continuous biometric identification.

When you open and view any type of file in the Smart Eye app, your device authenticates your identity and access through continuous facial recognition. Moment by moment the device scans your face. If you put your phone down while the file is still open, a warning sign pops up to prevent passerby’s from seeing the file. The device also scans for any unauthorized faces that come into view. If someone does a warning sign pops up blocking their view and alerting you.

Secure File Sharing and Document Control
• Send and receive documents with confidence. Smart Eye Technology puts you in complete control over who can view your documents and how they can access them.

Secure file sharing begins with using multiple biometrics to authenticate access to documents you send. Select the number of biometrics you require to authenticate the receiver. Default is two.

Then control over document access is at your fingertips. How long can they have access? 24 hours? 72 hours? Where can they access it? At the office only? Can they share it? Can they download the document? Default is no. Changed your mind and want to delete access after sent? Done. Get notifications and keep track of activity on your document.

Secure Platform
• No document hacking through emails. No passwords to remember or hack. Smart Eye provides vigilant protection with its pioneering biometric security platform and the most advanced end-to-end encryption (256 bit encryption).

Smart Eye Technology is Technology for Your Eyes Only. Download Smart Eye today, and we’ll keep an eye out for you.

Smart Eye Features:

Privacy & Security
• Protect your privacy with continuous biometric recognition
• View documents in a public place without fear of eavesdroppers
• Continuous facial recognition ensures you and only you can see your screen
• “Multiple viewers” warning when someone peeks at your screen
• “Away from phone” pops up when you’re not at your phone

Biometric ID
• Facial recognition
• Fingerprint recognition
• Print behavior
• Voice recognition
• Iris recognition (COMING SOON)
• Sign documents with facial recognition

Advanced Document Control
• Upload, review, send, receive, store and sign e-documents
• Protect documents you send with multiple biometrics
• Control document access limits
• Document tracking with real-time notifications
• Set retention requirements to keep information secure

Take control of your security. Protect your documents with Smart Eye Technology.

Visit us at:
www.getsmarteye.com
summary: Secure Document/Photo Sharing

Peachtree Corners Georgia 30092

comments: This app solves the biggest problem in the world that being cyber security. I've been waiting for something like this for years. PROBLEM SOLVED!!!
Love the file and picture protection provided from this app. Biometrics on steroids!!!
Good aap for security of important documents.
Great security application

title: Adobe Creative Cloud
description:
Take Creative Cloud with you to manage your files, view tutorials, and discover apps on the go. It's all on your device, wherever you are.

LEARN MORE
Get the most out of your Creative Cloud apps with engaging videos and tutorials. Filter by your favorite apps and track your progress through a series of tutorials.

ACCESS YOUR FILES
Search, browse, and preview design assets like Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign files as well as PDFs, XD prototypes, Lightroom photos, mobile creations, and Libraries, both online and off. Add files to Creative Cloud from your mobile device. Get your graphics from Adobe Stock and Creative Cloud Libraries into other apps by saving to your camera roll.

2GB OF STORAGE
Free, basic Creative Cloud membership includes 2GB of complimentary storage for file syncing and sharing.

ADOBE APPS
Discover the newest Creative Cloud mobile apps to complement what you’re already doing on your desktop.

COLLABORATE
Send designs and comments to your team, and get instant notification of their feedback. Publish your work to Behance to reach a broader audience.

SAVE YOUR WORK
Screenshot syncing lets you annotate, mark up, and sync them with your desktop automatically. Then get a link for easy sharing.

THE FINE PRINT
You must be at least 13 years old and agree to Adobe's terms and privacy policy:
http://www.adobe.com/privacy/policy-linkfree.html
http://www.adobe.com/special/misc/terms.html
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html

comments: Tried to cancel and they want 20.00 to do it. Apparently I agreed to this so the small print must be smaller than the normal small since I didn't see it. Not backwards compatible with windows 7, (lightroom and photoshop) what a waste of my time and MONEY. You get these options and it's confusing so you may be charged as well.

Works fine for the limited things it can do, I wish it had the font feature on mobile though... there's surely some way to translate the formats for some of them. Edit: thanks for the reply, will do when I'm at my pc and have a minute.
A really good way to link your work at home or the office with your device. I use it to help me refine ideas while I'm away from my PC and make minor adjustments that I can do on my phone.

When will the full apps be available on Android? I can access Photoshop, Illustrator or any of the apps I need on my Galaxy Tab S7+. This is limiting and even MORE frustrating. Especially when Adobe Creative Cloud comes installed and has a customer app build for Samsung. What's the purpose if you can't fully utilize it?!?
I've changed my rating. The app hangs a lot. It was awesome in the beginning. It takes ages to do something on it...

title: Xodo PDF Reader & Editor
description:
Xodo is an all-in-one PDF reader and PDF annotator/editor. With Xodo, you can read, annotate, sign, and share PDFs and fill in PDF forms, plus sync with Google Drive, Dropbox and OneDrive.

• Fastest PDF viewing engine and smooth navigation
• Write directly on a PDF, highlight and underline text, and more
• Auto-sync your PDF edits with Dropbox, Google Drive and OneDrive
• Open MS Office Word, PowerPoint, and Excel files for reading and annotating, and save as PDF
• Annotate PDFs with others in real time
• Fill PDF forms and sign documents
• Take notes on blank PDFs
• Powerful file organizer
• Complete PDF support and compatible with Adobe Acrobat® and other PDF viewers supporting standard PDF annotations
• Optimized for tablets and phones, Xodo is full-featured and a pleasure to use
• Integrated with our in-browser Chrome app: http://goo.gl/IVsRl0

HIGHLIGHTS:

PDF Reader

• Bookmark PDF pages for future reference
• Night Mode for comfortable PDF reading in dark environments
• Tabs allow you to quickly work across multiple PDF documents
• Crop pages to fit content precisely on small screens
• Reflow reading mode shows the PDF text at a size of your choosing
• A PDF table of contents allows you to jump chapters and sections
• Printing on KitKat and Lollipop
• Full screen mode on KitKat and higher
• Enjoy continuous vertical scrolling while viewing in single page, two pages, and cover page modes
• Support for Samsung Multi Window
• Full text search with navigable, detailed list of search results, page rotation, high levels of zoom, and more

PDF Annotator and Editor

• Draw and type directly on PDFs
• Highlight, underline and strikeout text
• Add arrows, circles, lines and more
• See all annotations at a glance with the annotation summary, and just tap one to navigate to it
• Scroll and turn pages by using two fingers while you annotate
• Merge and split PDFs; rotate pages
• Optimized for SPen and other select styluses
• Thumbnail browser for deleting pages, changing page order, and inserting blank pages

Sign & Fill PDF Forms

• Fill out, save, and send PDF forms
• Sign a document by hand, and save your signature for later reuse

Convert & Create

• Use your camera to scan a page, or open an existing image to create a new PDF (tif, jpeg, gif, png)
• Create new blank PDFs and use Xodo to take notes

Dropbox & Google Drive Sync

• Auto-sync annotations back to Dropbox or Google Drive
• For Dropbox, data use is minimized by uploading only the changes you make, not the whole document

File Manager

• Rename, copy, move, or delete docs and folders with Xodo’s built-in file manager
• Recent files can be quickly accessed, and will automatically open to the last page visited
• Grid view shows thumbnail previews of PDFs and easy access to file details

Make Xodo Better:

Have an idea to make Xodo even better? We'd love to hear it! Please add your idea and vote on other ones here: http://goo.gl/mE8lrv. Community interest plays a big part in how we prioritize upcoming features, so let us know what's important to you.
 
BETA PROGRAM

Want to try out the latest features, and help iron out any problems before the update goes mainstream? Then join the Xodo beta program: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.xodo.pdf.reader
 


Xodo | Transforming how the world works with PDFs | @XodoPDF | http://www.xodo.com | http://www.xodo.com/legal

Xodo is powered by PDFTron | http://pdftron.com

recentChanges: - Fixes a number of ANR/freezing issues
comments: Xodo is hands down the BEST pdf creation and management app available on Google Play. I pay a monthly subscription fee for all features of Xodo and I use it every day. So I wasn't very happy that Xodo required complete access to my device's file system as well as cloud services without any guardrails. However, they recently updated to give users the ability to choose which files to allow Xodo to access. Love it! Thanks for being a responsive company and dev team!

I've been using this app for months now, and it functions well, no bugs or whatever that interrupts you from what you are doing in the app. One of the best things about this is that, it doesn't have any ads nor have any distractions. And the worse thing about this app is that the "Reading Mode" feature doesn't seem to be pleasing for reading because the letters are not arrange perfectly... Please fix it :))

This is a great free pdf viewer. Every feature works nearly flawlessly, if a little slow every now and again. My biggest complaint, and what kept me from giving a 5 star review, is that in order to get the Pro version, you have to pay a subscription. A one time fee would be plenty understandable, but unless you are providing new content regularly, a subscription for a mostly static app, in terms of features and content, is just ridiculous and insulting. These companies need to get it together.

Pages turn black all of a sudden. I have to exit the app and again open it in order to fix this and also when I add pages they randomly add on a different page rather than the selected page. When I try to zoom in on something important again the entire page becomes black. I get frustrated by this all the time. Please fix this.

New update which makes the draw function unuseable kills the app. You write one letter and it highlights the letter to change it's size. You have to unclick it by tapping the page to write another letter. Useless for talking notes just because of that. But the line is thicker now too for some reason. Inane, app killing update from an app which used to be fine.

title: Calculator
description:
Simple calculator.

Made with practicality in mind, Calculator is a simple and easy calculator app, ideal for your everyday use.

It is easy to use with large buttons, clean and stylish design, and provides the basic functionalities most people need for daily calculations.
For example, Calculator is perfect in situations such as adding up receipts, calculating taxes or discounts when shopping, doing homework study for school, some calculation at your workplace, or even when you calculate a tip at restaurants.

*This is a free version of Calculator, which displays ad at the bottom of the screen. Ad-free version is also available.


[Features]
 - Beautiful, simple and stylish design
 - Easy to use with large buttons to minimize errors
 - Option to choose from 3 keypad layouts (Standard / Stylish / Ergonomic)
 - Option to choose from 12 themes (Material - Indigo, Red, Green, Amber, Pink, Brown / Original - Black, White, Blue, Green, Red, Yellow)
 - Option to turn on/off vibration on touch
 - Option to turn on/off memory buttons
 - Displays calculation history
 - Displays calculated expression
 - Percentage calculation available
 - Backspace button to delete the last digit to correct a simple mistake
 - Backspace button can also clear all by pressing and holding it
 - Copies calculated result to clipboard by touching the display area
 - Supports both portrait and landscape mode
 - Displays operator symbols during calculation
 - Displays your calculations with thousand separators to make it easy to read


If you find a bug or have any suggestion for improvement, please feel free to contact me at: support@tricolorcat.com
You can also check the news and updates for Calculator on my website: http://www.tricolorcat.com
Thank you!


*2015/09/25: This app was renamed from "Daily Calculator" to "Calculator".

comments: This was a great app until a recent upgrade(or something). Now it starts to blare loud music(connected to ads) when I am using it. There is no way to stop the music except to close the app. However, as soon as I reopen it and try to work, the horrible music starts again. Plan to uninstall.
This app is so amazing💗. It can change themes and ✨even calculate quick 🖤. I really like this app .💕❣️💕
Thank you so much🙏🏽, I really needed privacy.. i trust the Application, so far it's been the best.
Too many blinking ads..hard to concentrate on numbers 😡
Calculator is very usefull to me specially the scientific calculator

title: Dashlane Password Manager
description:
Dashlane is more than just a password manager. It fills all your passwords, payments, and personal details wherever you need them, across the web, on any device. It’s the app that makes the internet easier.

All your passwords, on every device

- Store an unlimited number of passwords and access them anywhere
- Sync your Dashlane data to every device automatically, even if your phone and computer run on different systems
- Create secure passwords with Password Generator
- Share passwords safely and conveniently
- Import your passwords easily from Chrome

Log in automatically

- Autofill the right username and password on every app and website, every time
- Log in to Dashlane with a tap using your fingerprint
- Securely store personal info you need to keep safe and accessible, like addresses, credit card numbers, and IDs
- Fill addresses and other forms with a tap

Purpose-built for privacy

- Get alerted about breaches and hacks that affect your data—and learn how to take action
- Learn if your data is on the dark web with Dark Web Monitoring
- Built-in VPN for safe, anonymous browsing
- Secure your info and add a second layer of protection with 2-factor authentication (2FA)
- Enjoy peace of mind with patented, best-in-class encryption methods

We don’t want your data

- We believe you should control your data, and we'd never sell it—even if we could see it. Dashlane is designed so that we can't see any of the information you store in it.
- Securely export your data, any time you need or want.
- Other companies don’t store your data safely because it’s not their job. At Dashlane, it’s what we do.

Your Dashlane account starts with a 30-day free trial of our Premium plan—no credit card required.

Trusted worldwide

- 14+ million users across the globe

Awards & recognition for Dashlane

- PC Mag "Editors' Choice Award"
- Webby Award "People's Voice Best Mobile Services & Utilities App"
- Kiplinger's "Best Identity Theft Prevention Tools"
- Inc.com's "Best for Passwords and Checkouts"
- Techlicious "The Best Security Apps"
...and many more

recentChanges: Thanks for using Dashlane! Each new version includes bug fixes and stability improvements to deliver you the best Dashlane experience. We’ll also update you regularly about new feature releases and improvements.
comments: The UI is the most significant USP of Dashlane, no other password manager offers an experience as smooth as Dashlane. VPN, dark web monitoring, etc are some cool nifty features but the service still has room for improvement. Most importantly - let the users manually enter the security key instead of using the QR code scanner when enabling 2FA for a website/app (like Instagram or Snapchat) through the in-built Dashlane authenticator.

A lot of useful options but the most important one does not work the way it supposed to. Despite the fact I set Dashlane as a main autofill service, it works only occasionally. The thing that buggers me the most is the fact that the app ignores websites on which I'm trying to sign up. I was so impressed by the price and the possibilities that I bought the family subscription blindfold but I'm about to ditch the idea because, for example, Gboard autofill JUST WORKS. Disappointed.

I have tried various password managers till date like lastpass,1password,passwarden and many more but the features dashlane offers as per the price are phenomenal...ya but the experience on windows 10 app was not quite good....which needs to be improved... rather gr8 for chrome extension and Android...1password beats dashlane in user experience but is quite much more expensive as compared ....in addition the free version of dashlane is pretty much usable as compared to other competitors...

Easier to use than most password managers. Great on a PC but it stumbles with a cellphone. Also, dropping the desktop app in favour of a browser app has meant loss of info and the notes have not been carried over. The older version was a 5 star app but they had to go and "fix" it! 🤦‍♂️

Easy to use and good features. Overall my favourite password manager. However a few areas still for improvement such as the VPN, which is a super helpful addition although only seems ro be available on mobile and frequency drops connection without warning (presumably leaving the connection exposed).

title: Calendar App - Handy Calendar 2021 Reminder ToDo
description:
Calendar which is a very simple calendar and sync with system calendar includes most common calendar functions, and let users manage their schedules easily. 
Get this Calendar app for your Android phone to save time and make the most of every day.

This is one of the most simple Calendar apps which can connect your Google Accounts easily and can be synchronised to automatically display events, programs and appointments on it .
Calendar contains all your needs (features) in google play store, including Day , Week, Month Views , variety modifies,and connection across different accounts.

comments: I had this on my other phone, never an issue. It does what I want it's a calendar. I've not had a problem with app if I don't give a bunch of permissions.
App will only work if you give it full access to your other calendar, phone contacts, files, etc. Screw that.

Too intrusive, do not give this calendar permission to manage phone calls. No calendar needs to be managing my phone calls, which means the developer will have access to all your contacts. Dont do it. Delete this app as i did. Its bad enough apps want all our personal info. No way in hell is a calender having access to my phone calls. Unnesasarry use of infringment from a developer
I really enjoy the convenience and oraganization of the calendar. I love the way you can use it no matter where you go.

It works Great. My Problem Now is that it got transferred to a new phone 📱, it has extra days of "old plans" I don't use anymore. Everytime I try to take the extra things off of my calendar 📅, it QUITS. I'M GETTING TO NOT LIKE IT ANYMORE.

title: Cards - Mobile Wallet
description:
Some of our users may experience connectivity issues! we are working hard to fix these issues as soon as possible. We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience.

Cards is a mobile wallet that keeps your cards in one app.

Enjoy a walletless life: Cards is more useful, safer and faster than your wallet. 

With Cards you can pay, catch a bus, open doors, grab loyalty offers, identify to officials, get into shows etc.

NEW! Cards Apps™ turns your digital cards into information hubs allowing you to check out messages, discounts, store locations and much more from your favorite cards!

Cards Apps™ allows engaging card specific actions directly from your favorite cards: ordering a pizza from Pizza Card, flight tickets from Airline Card, tracking parcels from Courier Card etc.

Cards Quick Card™ lets you instantly open any card without opening the app. You can open cards using our Quick Card™ unlock popup or using the cards shortcuts in the notification bar.

NEW! Present Cards directly on your Smartwatch using Android Wear.

You can keep: 

• Loyalty Cards
• Payment Cards (Credit/Debit/ATM)
• Transport Cards (Bus/Train/Metro)
• Identity Cards (Driver's License/Student/ID)
• Tickets (Shows/Movies)
• Key Cards (Work/Car/Home Entrance)

*** Cards acceptance depends on technology availability from the specific card brand, based on your country's regulation.
*** Some functions may not properly work in some regions.

What can I do with Cards?

• Load any card to your phone
• Send cards by tapping your phone on card readers (using NFC contactless technology)
• Send cards by presenting Barcodes
• Cards Apps™ - Perform tasks from within Cards without downloading bloated & unfamiliar apps
• Quick Card™ - Instantly access any card 
• Read important messages from your card brands


How secure is Cards?

• Remotely lock your wallet
• Unlock Cards with your fingerprint or PIN code
• Sensitive data is double-encrypted in the cloud


Where can I install Cards?

• Cards is available for FREE on Google Android, Apple iOS, Microsoft Windows 8/10 & BlackBerry OS.


What are "Community Powered" and "Official" Cards?

• "Community Powered" Cards are non-official cards based on crowd sourcing, information contributed by Cards users themselves, much like Wikipedia.
• "Official" Cards are operated by the official organization that issues the card.


What about developers?

• We ♥ developers. Cards is all about inter-connectivity, crowd sourcing & community support. Go to https://cards.app/dev and connect your app, website or NFC reader using our free and extremely easy to use SDKs (Java, C#, NodeJS, C++, Python) and APIs.


You can use Cards as a replacement to the discontinued Beep'n Go app by Mobeam or Samsung Beaming Services.

• Bug fixes

Our team is constantly working to improve Cards. We really appreciate your feedback! Please contact support@cards.app with any issues or suggestions - we actually shape Cards according to your suggestions.

Thank you for using Cards.
comments: App is poorly designed and buggy. Starting with entering your password, it doesn't ask you to confirm it and covers what you entered, so if you've miss typed something, you'll never know it. When doing a reset using 'forgot password', the first email never came to reset it. Fortunately, the second one did, but that still didn't matter because the app would not take the reset password. Nor does the app allow you to use your finger print to log in. This was one of the shortest lived apps on my android phone.

Not bad, but please show card numbers, not just QR codes. I need to be able to see the number of my identity card. Also, if I enter barcode manually, I want to see a barcode, not QR code. And app should ask me about card number when I add a new card.

Used to work ok. Just came back from a grossery store being unable to use my offline cards which are essensially just screenshots of barcodes because "the service is unavailable". Don't tell me there needs to be a service and an internet connection to show a simple image I could take with my camera. I absolutely believed 'offline' mode is actually offline. Very disappointed. I cannot longer trust this since I have no idea if it will fail the next time I check out.

I really love this app! That is why it makes me sad that I can't give it five stars ✨ It's really great because you can carry your reward cards 💳 stored in your phone so you don't have to carry around the additional card holder. The only problem is that sometimes it doesn't want to load. Then you end up either holding up the line or telling them nevermind because you can't access the cards you want. Love that I can even take a picture of the cards if I want. Has saved me a few times in a pinch!

I get locked out every night. The short cut goes from my home screen and when I try to log in it says my email address is wrong. However when I change my pass word I do get an email with a link to change it but after In putting the new one. It states again wrong email or password. Even when the fields are blank. My wife has the same problem. The app is becoming too glitchy to trust with financial commitments.

title: Microsoft SharePoint
description:
SharePoint infuses AI into the mobile app experience to keep you focused and productive while on the go. AI builds an understanding of what you work on, how you work, and how your colleagues' work relates to you. When you need expertise, content, or resources when you're on the go, SharePoint is a great place to start looking.

 • Browse your sites, files, people and more to get back to what you were working on 
 • Use search to find and discover important content
 • Access your personalized view of team sites, communication sites, and news posts 
 • Tap on a user to get to their contact card and see who they work with and what they are working on
 • Create news posts on the go and share your updates, reports, status, and experiences with your team
 • Sign in to your SharePoint sites, whether they're in the cloud or on-premises.  The app works with SharePoint Online and SharePoint Server versions 2013 and higher
 • Add multiple accounts, and easily switch between them

Note: To sign in to SharePoint, your organization needs to have an Office 365 subscription that includes SharePoint Online or an on-premises SharePoint Server.

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://aka.ms/spandeula/

This app is provided by Microsoft. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country/region where Microsoft or its affiliates maintain facilities.

comments: User experience is horrible. PowerPoint presentations are always in present mode and you can't got to a specific page. Going back from anything brings you back to the homepage. Switching from portrait to landscape takes you out of presentations. This app is just an afterthought, you're better off using a tablet, laptop or desktop.
Really helps the productivity of my business. Links smoothly wirh one drive, teams and windows 10. Really good for on the go work and responding to client and colleagues as needs arise.
It is overall a good solution, has some issue with viewing Excel documents natively in the app. But it is good especially when used with the office installed on your device.
Using SharePoint is a great resource for keeping a team informed and allowing them to perform at their best.
Horrible, i hate this app. Its not user friendly if you have an android phone. The only ones who seem to be able to use it fairly easily are Apple users and I'm NOT buying into that monopoly giant.

title: To Do List
description:
What is SplenDO?
SplenDO is smart task list for everyday use.
It is truly usable with great user experience.
No matter who you are and what you do - you will be better organized!
At home, at work and in your free time - you will focus on really important things!
SplenDO is powerful in its simplicity and convenience of use.


Key Features
• User friendly task management
• Grouping tasks in handy task lists
• Smart home screen widgets show instantly what to do
• Intelligent notifications exactly when you need them
• Syncing with Google that just works


More Details
• Adding tasks via voice
• Notifications use sounds, vibrations and built-in speech synthesizer (TTS)
• Icon widget - icon with optional today's and overdue tasks counter
• List Widget - resizable widget displays upcoming tasks
• Status bar - component (in the notifications area) keeping you up to date
• Quick Task Bar - to add something hot quickly
• Support for recurring tasks
• Time for shopping? Need to add many tasks at one go? Great, batch mode is on-board!
• Support for tasks without a due date, all-day-long tasks and tasks at a specific hour of the day
• Bidirectional synchronization with Google Tasks
• Many useful configuration options
• Predefined task lists
• Actions on group of tasks (bulk actions, long-click selection support)
• Integration with sharing on Android - sharing tasks with other apps and receiving shared data
• Creating tasks from the content of system clipboard
• SplenDO is free to download and use
• Splend Apps support and more!


About Us
• Visit SplendApps.com: http://splendapps.com/
• Our Privacy Policy: http://splendapps.com/privacy-policy
• Contact Us: http://splendapps.com/contact-us


Follow Us
• Twitter: http://twitter.com/SplendApps
• Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SplendApps
• Google+: https://google.com/+Splendapps

comments: Cool app that keeps me organized. I recommend it. Especially if you're like me, a dumb blonde who almost drowns when it rains. Or, you have limited time to try and remember tasks you need to get handled each day. I'll pay the $4 to get rid of the ads. Once again,I can't afford the time that is wasted watching ads. I have a fricken universe to run man. Get errr done already. Download dis and handle your business.

App is simple and works, and as much as I hate to drops stars due to ads, the ads in this app got out of hand. LOUD and obnoxious ads that intentionally hide the mute button so you have to frantically look for it while your phone is blasting game sounds. Basically have to avoid the free version in an office, library, around sleeping kids, seminars, you name it. By far the most jarring ad scheme I've ran into. As much as I'm used to the interface, I'll be moving to a new app due to this.

Great app...Just wish it could have better notifications on upcoming events and tasks... Sometimes I schedule events weeks or months in advance and as those events near, I often schedule things that conflict with them...I would love to be able to schedule my own notifications as reminders that work best for me... Can you give us the option of custom notification reminders for any event on our list? I would give the app 9 🌟stars out of 5...

Nice app but you can't select days of the week for a repeating reminder. I wanted a reminder for Friday, Saturday and Sunday every week. The only way to do this is to set three separate recurring reminders. One for each day.

Would be good without full screen ads. I've used it and it was fine but ever since the full screen ads came, I hate it, hence the 2 star. So, I switched to MS To Do, as I have an account anyway. Ad free, so this went uninstalled.

title: Line2 - Second Phone Number
description:
Line2 is your complete business phone system for your Android device. Give your customers a professional call experience no matter where you are and keep your personal and business lines separate.

Multiple phone numbers: Add multiple virtual business phone numbers to your device and receive or make calls from anywhere.

Local and toll-free numbers: Go local with your business with localized numbers or give your customers toll-free numbers to call. You can also port your existing phone number to Line2.

Unlimited call and text: Get unlimited Voice over IP calls and texting across the United States and Canada. Also, get free calls and messaging between other Line2 users. 

Auto-attendant: Guide your customers to right call queues like sales and support using the auto-attendant feature, along with on-hold music and pre-recorded call greetings. 

No cellular data needed: Make and receive calls or texts using VoIP technology. No need for expensive cellular plans or hardware. 

Call features: Screen and block unwanted calls with call screening and call blocking. 

Designed for mobile business professionals, freelancers, and entrepreneurs, Line2 lets you keep your business and personal communications separate and eliminates the need to purchase and carry a second mobile phone.

More powerful features:

• Use your Line2 number across your smartphone, computers, and tablets.
• Share media with MMS and group messages with anyone in the U.S. and Canada.
• Quick and easy setup with no additional hardware required.

Questions or comments? We’re here to help, 7 days a week at http://help.line2.com or tap Settings -> Help from within the app.

Note: Your cellular provider may prohibit or restrict VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) on their network. It’s your responsibility to check with your cellular provider about their VoIP functionality, and any additional charges it may incur.

recentChanges: Thanks for using the Line2 app! In this version, we've made some general bug fixes and performance improvements based on our customer feedback.
comments: The app is horrible, mute sound on your phone without permission! Same problem even after update, when I connect to my car via Bluetooth the app make your phone silent to all notifications!

It's really handy to have a 2nd number, for the most part it functions well. On Android 11 the aggressive optimizer will prevent you getting your calls/messages, go into settings for battery & unoptimize, it will function better then. 1 thing I hope developers will remedy, after an app update, you're logged out UPDATE If you're experiencing issues, email the developer and tap the help tab in the app, I'm currently working with support team and running a beta version which works better 07/20/21
Since update won't open. Crashes constantly

This app is awful. Scrolling through a text message causes it to crash, each and every time. I've been a Line 2 user for several years, never had a problem until the most recent update last February. Now it's almost unusable. Cleared data, cleared cache, uninstalled, reinstalled, still the same result. Crash. The Line2 dev guys need to fix this thing and provide an update.

It works but there is an annoying bug. Every time after a phone call, it tends to mess with my music/video audio. For example, after the phone call, all of the audio plays from my phone speaker that is only used for phone calls. Same with my car audio, it thinks I am in a phone call. The only way to fix it is by closing the app from my multi-task viewer. Hope you can fix it soon because it is annoying.

comments: exactly what i need. minimalistic design, great user experience, everything fits to its place, very easy to export and restore backups. this app have everything i need. adding more features would be a shame. keep it like it is. EDIT: would like to change display of notes, to see them in list style

ever since that update with google, my phone has been so slow. i can't open wattpad, so i can't write. so, ive been hopping notes apps. this one is so aesthetically pleasing and easy on the eyes! highly recommend!! edit; ive been using it for a while, and the option to add pictures into your notes would be wonderful!!

This is a great little app for writing notes when you don't have access to pen and paper handy. It's very user friendly and I especially appreciate the dark theme because I'm high photosensitive from chronic migraine and the black screen is not nearly as irritating to my head and vision. All in all a great app!

So far this app has been exceedingly helpful for planning my life and organizing my notes in my phone. The black background also helps in keeping the light low so it doesnt bother my eyes. I cannot recommend this app enough.

I enjoy good notebooks and this is a keeper . The checklist keeps me on track when im shopping and for goals in general. And like most will also comments the black background is easy on the eyes. At first i almost wanted to get another note app but im more than happy with this one

title: Ridmik Keyboard
description:
Features

1. Bangla phonetic keyboard (like your favorite Avro keyboard)
2. National & Probhat layout
3. Full set of emoji
4. Continuous voice input
5. Beautiful themes
6. Next word suggestion
7. Emoji in suggestions
8. Number pad
9. Number row: Use large or small number row as fifth row
10. Clipboard with recently copied texts
11. New text editing options
12. Arabic and Chakma language add-on
13. Move cursor using space key when using globe button to switch language
14. Customize keyboard height in landscape and portrait mode separately

Permission Explanation

বাংলা লেখার সবচেয়ে নিরাপদ ও সবচেয়ে বেশি ব্যবহৃত লেখার মাধ্যম রিদ্মিক কীবোর্ড। গত ৮ বছরে রিদ্মিক কীবোর্ড কোন ব্যক্তিগত তথ্য ও ডাটা সংগ্রহ করে নি। আপনার ব্যক্তিগত তথ্য সুরক্ষার ব্যাপারে আমরা অত্যন্তু মনযোগী ও সচেতন।

Ridmik Keyboard respects your privacy and data. In the last 8 years, it never collected any personal data. Any permission you see, is for the benefits of the users and users only.

Record Audio: For voice input
Internet: For voice input
Contacts: To show suggestions from contact names. You can disable this in settings
Read/Write user dictionary: Get/save word suggestion from/into android's built-in user dictionary
Write external storage(SD Card): Save new learned words data to SD card and show suggestions from them.
descriptionHTML:
Features

1. Bangla phonetic keyboard (like your favorite Avro keyboard)
2. National & Probhat layout
3. Full set of emoji
4. Continuous voice input
5. Beautiful themes
6. Next word suggestion
7. Emoji in suggestions
8. Number pad
9. Number row: Use large or small number row as fifth row
10. Clipboard with recently copied texts
11. New text editing options
12. Arabic and Chakma language add-on
13. Move cursor using space key when using globe button to switch language
14. Customize keyboard height in landscape and portrait mode separately

Permission Explanation

comments: Amazing. Very very usefull to useing our local languages. But i've questions you know play store offers latest app for user. that ridmik keyboard version 2021 is not bad but i remember ridmik keyboard older version future systems and emojis etc were the best future ever from every kinds of user experience. really it is the best app for every android user. Thanks

It's a great app. I would say one of the best keyboards for Bangali typing. Have been using this app for many years. But still I'm rating 4 as this keyboard is unable to suggest the right words depending on my typing history and all, which G-board does finely. It's not capable to guess the next word and suggest, no matter if I write the same sentence a million times. Technically, the word suggestion option is not beneficial but for the spelling correction. Upgrade it, if possible.

Developer brothers, please update it regularly. This is my favorite keyboard. In last 2/3 months, I have found it problematic whenever I try to type anything with ে, ো, ি, ু and attached alphabet. It becomes মৃতয়ু when I wanted to type মৃত্যু। I have to type it again to make it correct as it doesn't work in the first phase. Same thing happens when I type "ভাই", it became " ভআই"....I don't know why! And spelling like this, everything got glitched. Please take immediate actions.

I am using this app from many years in my & family's all android devices. There were no problem. But in this (Redmi 9 Power) device the keyboard layout has some key's label are white color like Capitalize, 123, emoji, coma, period & bacspace. I checked all settings and uninstall the apps with restart the device. Same result. Are you listening me?

A great app. But if it would contain Arabic also, it could have been more useful for people. Because, We have to keep more one keyboard for Arabic beside this app. This app can a great package with Bengali, English & Arabic for Bangladeshi people.

title: CallDetector
description:
EXCLUSIVELY DEVELOPED FOR TRACFONE WIRELESS

Stop unwanted calls today with CallDetector!

CallDetector gives you the ability to block any unwanted phone calls (including companies or individuals you just won’t want to talk to) and automatically blocks all known scam callers. CallDetector now also includes CallerYD®* to let you know not just who is calling, but WHY.

CallDetector empowers you and saves time by identifying unknown numbers and blocking unwanted calls directly from your smartphone.

CallDetector Features:

•	Scam Call Blocking 
•	Block calls from unknown or anonymous callers
•	CallerYD® to know who’s calling and why
•	Block callers by entire call category types such as Telemarketers, Political Callers, Account Services (financial information including collection activities) and more
•	Unlimited real-time Caller ID**
•	Unlimited reverse number lookup
•	Call Center notifications to take immediate action against unwanted calls, including Telemarketers
•	File FTC complaints against abusive telemarketers & unlawful collection activities from Account Service providers 
•	Ad-free subscription at no cost


This application was developed specifically for TracFone Wireless® and is free for loyal customers of the following brands: 
•	TracFone®
•	Net10 Wireless
•	SafeLink Wireless®
•	Straight Talk®
•	Total Wireless™
•	SIMPLE Mobile®
•	Telcel® (US customers only)
•	Page Plus®
•	GoSmart Mobile® 
•	Walmart Family Mobile customers

Your device must be running CallDetector app version 3.0 or higher to receive all listed features free. This is only compatible with devices running Android version 4.4 or higher. If you are not a customer of one of the qualified brands listed above, you will receive a “Lite” version of CallDetector which features are limited to scam protection, personal number blocking, complaint filing and CallerYD®.

CallerYD® is only available for select caller types as a method of providing you additional information about the number calling you.

Real time Caller ID requires a network connection. 
-----------------------------------
We’d love to hear your feedback, questions, and suggestions so please reach out to us:
-CallDetector FAQ:  Link: https://calldetectorsupport.privacystar.com

comments: It does a good job of detecting calls, not perfect but plenty good enough. An update: the feature which allows you to block area codes does not work. I've tried un installing and reinstalling but still doesn't work. I've looked over other call-blocking apps and they seem no better. This one's free with NO ads. I'll stick with it and its imperfections.

No ads from what I've seen and used and this app is legit it truly tells the phone number and the identification of the person or who ever is on the other end of the phone call. It also lists the call duration along with giving you options on how to respond to phone call. So to me this app "Call Detector" has been really useful & super helpful I'm so glad I came across this application. Thank you!

The only plus is that it shows what city the call is from but barely from WHO. Has never blocked a call yet! No way to include detail on scam/nuisance calls so how on earth can this app work to eliminate the garbage overall? I see that the last update was 12/19? Database needed to determine whether missed call falls into a blocking category or to indicate such call is coming in. Deleting this memory eater. TRASH! "Should I Answer" is a much better app.

Does a pretty goid job ... doesn't catch everything. But it's a big help. The identification window goes away pretty quickly and I have to later look at the list on the app. So, I may have let some calls go unanswered until I have a chance to check. I am still learning how to work with it and form a safe contact list.

Call detector is a must-have a must-needed app takes all the worries out of unnecessary unwanted calls the classifies them and then give you a little notice telling you block or not block I don't know where I would be without it but I would probably be going crazy and pulling my hair out thank you call detector great job

title: WinZip – Zip UnZip Tool
description:
Get the world’s #1 zip file opener on Android! Create Zip and Zipx files, extract files, encrypt, open zip files, send large files by email, share to clouds.

Whether you receive a zip file as an email attachment, or want to extract and view the contents of a zip file from the web, just “Open with WinZip”. Sharing files is safe and simple too, with direct integration with multiple clouds.

WinZip makes it easy to handle major compressed types of files on your Android device!

Now you can: 

• Connect directly to your cloud accounts to zip, unzip and share files
• Zip your cloud storage files, unzip files to your accounts, and create and save .zip and .zipx files to your accounts
• Protect your files before you save and share with powerful 128- or 256-bit AES encryption 
• Open and save email attachments to your connected cloud storage accounts
• Easily view all images in a Zip file with the enhanced image viewer 
• Browse your Photo Album and easily multi-select, zip and share photo collections 
• Unzip and view most common file types, including: .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx,.pdf, .jpg, .png, .bmp, .gif, .tif, and more
• Send or copy links to your files in your cloud storage accounts
• Copy files from your cloud storage accounts and save them on your device
• Unzip major compressed file types with just a tap 
• Choose Zip or Zipx format to compress and email large files, photos and videos with ease 
• Zip and share photos and videos from your device
• Use WinZip to access music files on your device and save them to your cloud accounts

Notes: These features are Premium only:
• Create and protect Zip and Zipx files with 128- and 256-bit AES encryption 
• Immediate access to ‘Zip & email’ feature
• Direct integration of multiple cloud storages

WinZip for Android lets you open other popular file types in third party apps:
- Word documents (.doc, .docx) 
- Excel spreadsheets (.xls, .xlsx) 
- PowerPoint presentations (.ppt, .pptx) 
- PDF files (.pdf) 

WinZip for Android lets you view:
- Photos and images (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .bmp, .gif) 
- Text files (.rtf, .csv, .txt, .ini, .inf, .bat, .js, .log, .xml,.css, .java, .cs, .h, .m,.cpp,.c,.sql,. properties) 
- Web files (htm, .html,.jsp,.asp) 
- Apk files (.apk)
- Comic book files (.cbz)

Compatible with Android operating systems from 4.0 to Android 11.0.

WinZip for Android is available now as a free English app.

FAQ
Q1: I used WinZip to protect a folder of files with a password, but the list of files can still be viewed. Why?
A1: Even though the files or folder is encrypted, the file names can still be viewed (but not the file content). For this reason, we recommend that you avoid using confidential information in file or folder names. For example, avoid using account numbers or ID numbers (such as a social insurance number) in file or folder names.

Q2: I am using WinZip to compress JPEGs, but the size didn’t change much. Why?
A2: In order to compress your photos as much as possible, without any loss of photo quality, in the app Settings, choose Zipx (Best Method). This compression method examines each file and selects the compression option most likely to supply the best compression results.

comments: Catastrophic errors on instructions and links. I have spent over one trying to get registered. I have paid and want to know how to get my money back.
