comments: Same issue as everyone else. Must click okay, but the ok button is not able to be clicked. Would be nice if the developers would at least acknowledge this issue and fix it. Looks like this has been on-going for at least a week...I'd really like to use my printer app as it is vital for what I do.

Annoying window pops up without ability to hit Ok. No matter if I select the checkbox or not. Uninstalled, reinstalled, same result, box does not go away. Samsung Note 9. Update: After looking at another phone I attempted same install. A smaller font size exposed 2 checkboxes. After I reduced my font size, i could see the 2 checkboxes. The application was not designed to account for a larger font size. The print service plugin now works as normal.

No issues until today. Now when I try to print, it won't let you proceed until you click "ok" on a terms/conditions pop up and the "ok" button is grayed out. I need to print docs for a customer who insists on ink signing vs esigning, and now I'm going to have to go to FedEx to print. Unacceptable!

No problems until today. I go to print and cannot connect to any printer until I review the terms and conditions. When the box pops up, I click the checkbox to share info, and the "OK" button at the bottom corner does not work, no matter what I do. Uninstalled for now so that I could use one that will work.

Loved this app for years, now with most recent update I cannot get beyond the question if I want to share data to improve app! It doesn't matter if I click the box or not, hitting the ok does nothing and it won't let me print until I got ok to clear it from screen. Please fix this!

title: Smart Note - Notes, Notepad, Todo, Reminder, Free
description:
Smart Note is a succinct and efficient notepad that allows you to capture and organize your ideas. 
You can manager your schedules and notes with Smart Note. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes or to do list. It makes to take a note easier than any other notepad.

🌟TAKE NOTES
Smart Note providers different way to take notes and capture your thoughts.
- Write notes, Start with a text, add photos、checklists and files, all in the same text note.
- Add voices to your notes
- Create checklists to get stuff done with the dedicated checklist notes.
- Scan documents and add to notes.

🌟ORGANIZE NOTES
Keep yourself and your work organized.
- Create category stacks by grouping notes together.
- Search note in your all notes by key words.
- Add a reminder for note, don't let you miss anything important.

🌟BACKUP DATA
You can easily backup your notes to Google Drive to avoid data loss. It’s also easy to recover from Google Drive.

🌟PASSWORD PROTECTION
Set your password and turn on the security lock to better protect your data! Prevent others from peeking at your privacy

🌟HOME SCREEN WIDGET
More convenient to see your notes. You can add widget to your home screen and look over your notes.
To put widget on your home screen, go to your home screen, tap and hold a free space, and select widget option.

🌟CUSTOMIZE
Choose the color you like as the theme of the app to make it more enjoyable!

Smart Note is 100% FREE. Boost your productivity for free. 
It's a colorful notepad. color note. Use the notepad to take your notes.

comments: Upon launch there is always an obscure ad that i) you can't close for a while and ii) is difficult to locate the 'X' or close button. Pretty unnecessary. Also, no way to change the font size. It's pretty basic with an unattractive UI. There is better out there. Keep looking.

Great app for handwriters! I use this app on my tablet to take notes while Studying for CPE credits. For me, handwriting what I learn is essential for success. My handwriting is fair to good and this app does a pretty good job deciphering. Its dictionary suggestions could be smarter: much of what it proposes when confused appears in no dictionary. that aside, this app is making my study time double or triple- effective Vs. before.

PERFECT OMG!!! Ive been looking for an app that's quick and easy to take notes on. Some note apps take FOREVER to load 😩 anyways this is super efficient, you can add attachments (videos, photos, whatever) oh AND its extrenely private and secure bc you can set a password!! Also, you can turn your notes into widgets for easy acess! The only drawback is that there are some ads but they arent that intrusive yknow.

After a few unexplainable losses of information things are beginning to be much better. I do miss my old memo pad that allowed me to draw as well as type. This is easy to use. But I will get back to my comments as I learn more about what is available.

So far so good I just downloaded about 30 minutes ago and it has done good for me takes a little used to but once I get used to it real good I bet you it's going to be another five star seems like to me.

title: Anti Theft Phone Alarm - Don't Touch My Phone
description:
Very often you are in a situation where you may need anti-theft features to protect your android phone from being forgotten or simply picked up by petty thieves, or even innocent children curious of your catchy screensaver. Don’t touch my phone feature comes to the rescue whether your are at the airport, college library or any other public place. Anti-theft function comes with intelligent options to protect your lovely smartphone with the following smart detection -

1. Proximity Detection
2. Motion Detection
3. Charger disconnect detection
4. Handsfree Detection
5. Wifi Detection
6. Battery full detection

Proximity Detection
Smart app protects your phone from theft as the alarm assistant goes off if the phone is moved or pulled from pocket using the proximity detection sensor. Security Alarm Mobile Anti-theft app keeps your phone safe from unauthorized access. Alarm Anti Theft starts to vibrate or a loud theft or police siren is blown if someone picks your phone. The loud alarm siren won’t stop even if any power or volume buttons are pressed. It will stop only if correct password is entered in the anti-burglar security utility interface.

Anti Theft Alarm - Don't Touch My Phone - Charger disconnect detection
Charger detection with Don't touch my phone like features is quite useful in public places where you must charge your phone due to low battery. Pickpocket alert and secure your phone from theft by triggering alarm on movement or disconnection of anti theft charger function. Anti Theft Alarm-Don't touch my phone, will again sound a loud alarm which cannot be stopped until correct password is entered in the secure app interface thereby protecting your phone from theft during smartphone charger connected.

title: Dell Mobile Connect
description:
Dell Mobile Connect minimizes distractions by conveniently allowing you interact with your phone from your Dell computer.

Features:
• Hands-free phone calls – Make and take phone calls without picking up your phone.
• Text messaging – Send and receive SMS and MMS messages from your computer.
• Contacts – Search your phone’s contacts and interface with them from the app.
• Notifications – Receive and interact with your phone notifications on your PC.
• Screen mirroring – Control your phone with your PC keyboard, mouse, or touchscreen.
• File Transfer – Securely copy files between your phone and your computer.

Instructions:
• Download this mobile companion app.
• Download and install the Dell Mobile Connect application on your PC (available on the Microsoft Store).
• Launch Dell Mobile Connect and follow the on-screen prompts. It’s that easy!

System Requirements:
• Android 8 and above.
• A 2018 or newer Dell computer with Windows 10 19H2 and above.
• The Dell Mobile Connect PC app (available on the Microsoft Store).

Support:
For troubleshooting and other questions, please contact Dell at www.dell.com/support

comments: I was happy with version 3.3 as it was easy to use, didn't take up much space, and I could easily connect to my phone while working and not lose any time. But I got sick of the popup, which happened EVERYTIME I wanted to use the app, so I downloaded the update. Big mistake. I am not impressed with the new interface. As others have said, it takes much longer to connect, messages are slow to load, if they even do. I'm constantly having to close and reconnect and even then, it isn't working. I don't like the dashboard, which is messy. When it works, it's fine, but not ideal. When it doesn't, which is most of the time, it's frustrating and a time waster.

I really like the new features and layout. However, when I choose to uncheck "Send anonymous statistics from my phone" it will. Everytime the app is closed or is restarted, it's checked again. Same thing is happening with the desktop app. I don't want to send any data. Hope this is just a bug that can be resolved. I til then, I'll leave it at 3 stars and probably won't use the app often.

EXCELLENT!!!!!! I can select many photos or videos at once to load onto my PC. Notifications are going through just fine, calls too. If you follow directions and scan code it works perfectly and instantly! MAKE SURE TO ALLOW ACCESS!! I see lots complaints but everything works great for me! Better than last version and I absolutely loved that one too!!

The new Dell Mobile Connect would not stay connected, Every time i went to use the app, I had to wait for the connection. I had Dell technicians try to troubleshoot, but the connectivity problem continued to exist. I uninstalled the new Dell Mobile Connect and reinstalled the Dell Mobile Connect 3.3 and it is working just fine.

This update contains more organization in terms of laying out widgets (features like messages and contacts) that can be used simultaneously unlike version 3.3. It was a few days after that I am getting problems accessing my phone messages on my computer. I tried disconnecting and reconnecting, but nothing. The rest still works well.
